1b1(mdo): rgya kar skad du.a ti ma tI ya byA ka ra na ma/ 
1b2(mdo): bod skad du/ 'phags pa khyams pa lung bstan pa zhes byag/ 'phags pa
1b3(mdo): byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi sde dpon khyab bdag dpal/ 
1b4(mdo): shes rab chen po sha ri'i bus// 'jig rtend
1b5(mdo): rnams lo snying bache'i phyir
1b6(mdo): stodad pa la ni yongs zhus la// sdom dang phyi ma'i/ mdo la las ni
2a1(mdo): thams cad dang // rgyal la rab tu nyan 'tshal na// de ni kyigyi mchog bdag la gsungs// de la stond pas bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas byams pa gyi mchog de'i/ 'byor dpo rgyas pa khyod
2a2(mdo): lung bstan bya yis nga la nyon// de yi tshe na rgya mtsho'i ni// khor yug du ni dpag tshad brgyal// skam par gyur pa de yang ni// 'khor los sbyar ba'i lam bzangs yin// de tshe 'jan
2a3(mdo): 'i gling 'dir yang // chu zheng mtha' gru mnyam par ni/ dpag tshad stong phrag bcu' pa ste// 'byung po kund kyi gnas dasu 'gyur// de yi tshe na yul gyi gyi// dar cing 'byor
2a4(mdo): la chags pa byed// 'tshe myed byin de dag kyang // dge' ba byed pa dag tu 'gyur// sa gzhi'i tsher la myed pa dang / mnyen zhing ne'u bsing sngo dang ldan// 'phar zhing dems zhes byed pa ste/ 
2a5(mdo): shing bal 'dab ma bzhin du 'jam// dang ma zhing tri ni zhib pa'i// sa lu ma mos par skye'o// sna tshogs tshon gis mdzes byas pa'i// gos gi sngon shing 'byung bar 'gyur// me tog lo
2a6(mdo): 'bras ldan pa'i// ljon shing 'phang du rgyaH grags 'byung // de dag rnams kyi tshe lo ni// brgyad khri khor thub par 'gyur// sems can de dag skyon myed cing // nyes bral sprob che dang ldan// lus
2a7(mdo): kha dog ldan pa ste// tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan// nad ni gsum zhig 'brung 'gyur te/ 'dod dang mya ze dka' ba'o// bu lo lo ni lnga brgya' dang/ 8/ len nas khyod la bka mar 'grol// de tshe
2b1(mdo): tog ldan zhes bya ba'i/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'byung 'gyur te// sre ga chanas dge' ba'i las byed pa/ sems can rnams kyi gnas yin no// chur ni dpag tshad bcu' gnyis te// brgyar ni
2b2(mdo): dpag chad bdun yod pa/ bsod nams byas pa rnam dag gis/ grong khyer yid 'ong 'byung bar 'gyur/ rin cen bdun las byas mtho' ba'i/ rab 'bang bu rgyang grags tsam// shing
2b3(mdo): thabs dang ni sgo rnams gang // rin cen sna tshogs gang gis brgya dang / rin chen po lag gis chags shing / khad sa ud pa la gcal du bkram/ dUr pas mdzes par byas pa'i/ dzan
2b4(mdo): kyang 'byung ba khon pa 'gyur/ 'khor khrag dun te la'i// 'phreng ba bdun gyim yongs su bsko// dril bu'i drabs yongs thum pa'i// ri cen pani 'a rgya mi ta sa dag/ rlu
2b5(mdo): bskyod tas de dag sas/ sad pa'i sman 'di sa pang ra/ sel ldan ya lag lnga ldan pazhid/ rnamapa ming 'ong ma grags 'gyung// rgyarnam pa da nga/ 
2b6(mdo): lcags/ mnga' bdag 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung / dpung gi yan las bzhis 'byung dang / 
2b7(mdo): rin chen bdun dang yang dag ldan// rgyal po de yi sras rnams ni// steng du ni/ 
3a1(mdo): par 'gyur/ kyi'i dbang po de yang na// sa 'di rgyam tsho mams klas par/ chags pa byed kyi mchos dang na// mthun tha yongs su myong bar 'gyur/ 
3a2(mdo): 'dzi payad me za kyideyidi bad na dang // rgyal po ya da/ ldas pa/ 'thung
3a3(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dod du 'dug dang gsang sngags 'dzid/ drad ldan rigs byed gzhung 'gres dang / srengs skye brtsam pa ma cid/ bdang phrod ni
3b1(mdo): rnam pa nyid du 'gyu/ lol sog tu gyu na pa den/ grogalas nas ni 'byung 'gyur te// dpenan tshwa giphung ba nas// nyil 'byung ba bzhin chags // dzas
3b2(mdo): tshul la bdas pa ni/ sangs kyis 'das gis kyi gas sa/ khams gsum 'di dag bams cadas/ 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs par 'gyur// de nas brgyal byen la
3b3(mdo): bde phyogs sapa bdag dga'agyur / byams parkang gnyis mchos kya dpa/ bltas pa'i tshan med par 'gyur// de sde ga sums pag tu yang // rnam
3b4(mdo): dag 'dor bar 'gyur// gom pa re rer gter dang ni// pad ma rer 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhi dag tu zigs nas ni// bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ 'di
3b5(mdo): yin yang srid yod ma yin// yang dang yang du phyi ra gyi 'ong // zag myed mya ngan 'das 'grol zhes// gsung yang rab tu bka' rtsa la to// klu rnams kyis
3b6(mdo): ni chu'i rgyu dang / bsil dang 'jam pas sru bsil 'gyur// dam mkha'i ngos nas lha rdzas kyi// kos dang me tog 'bab par 'gyur// de'i dbul la gdugs kar 'gyur
3b7(mdo): lha rnams kyis ni 'dzand par 'gyur// mtshan mchog sum bcu'i gnyis mnga' ba// byams pa dpal gyis 'bar ba do// ma mas yang dag blangs nas su// yum
3b8(mdo): phyag du 'bul bar 'gyur// rin cen sna tshogs kyis brgya nad pa'i// khyogs ni yid du 'ong ba la// sras dang bcas par bzhugs gsol nas// lha rnams kyis ni khyo
4a1(mdo): khyer bar 'gyur/ sil snyan stong phrag du ma dag/ sgra 'byin 'khrol ba'i grong khyer de// byams pa gshegs btsam gyis ni/ me tog ri ba
4a2(mdo): par 'gyur/ de'i nyid par sprum pa'i// bud byed rnams kyang bca' bar 'gyur// de dag thams cad nyams bde' zhing / bdel legs su ni bca' bar 'gyur/ 
4b1(mdo): mchod sbyin gyis ni mdun drangs te// bram ze dag la rab tu dbul// mchod sdong yid 'ong rim chen rkun// de ni phul ma thag tu yang // bram ze stong po rnams kyis ni// de'i
4b2(mdo): mod la 'ged par 'gyur// byams pa mchod sdod de'i ni// myi rtag nyid de mthong nas kyang // 'khor ba'i mtha' dag rnam bsams te// rab tu 'byung bar nges 'byung 'gyur// de tshe bdang
4b3(mdo): ni byang chub shing // bdud rtsi'i kong 'phang reg 'gyur dang // skye bo 'chi'i bdag na dga' ba'i// 'jigs las grol bar 'gyur snyam zhing // byams pa gang zag mchog gyurd te/ 
4b4(mdo): stong phrag bzhi' bo dag dang ni// brgyad cu dag gis mdun pa dang / sa// rab tu 'byung bar nges 'byung 'gyur// de tshe bdan dki byang chub shing // klu shing zhes bya 'byung 'gyur te/ 
4b5(mdo): de'i yal gaganas 'phang du// dpag tshad tsam du yang dga'aphags// de tshe byang chub zhing de'i// yal ga 'gepa thams cad du// kho ra khor yug rgyang grags drug/ 
4b6(mdo): khyabs pa kho na dag tu 'gyur/ byams pa kang gnyis mchog myur da pa// de'i drung du bzhugs nas su// bu myed byang chub na pa ni/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom byed// gang sa
4b7(mdo): nub mo khon la// rab tu 'byung ba mngon 'byung ba// de'i nub mo kho na la// byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur// de'i 'og tu thub mchog de// dam chos bsdug bsngal kun spong nas
4b8(mdo): zhi ba yan lag brgyad pa'i// gsung gis stond pa mdzad par 'gyur/ skye bor ba dag gzigs nas ni// bsdug bsngal bsdug bsngas kun 'byung dang / bde' bamya da 'das 'gro
5a1(mdo): 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa'i// bded pa dag kyang stond par 'gyur/ de'i chos de thos nas kyang // bstand pa la minan tan sbrub/ me tog
5a2(mdo): byas pa'o// bskyed mas tshal dung 'i 'khor// dpag chad rgya khyod gang bdag/ yang dag 'dru ba kho dar 'gyur// 'das kyi dbang rgyal po rung // rmugs pa chen po thos
5a3(mdo): ni// sbyin pa grangs myed byas nas kyang / rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur// rgyal po stong phrag pazhi 'dang de// brgyad cu dag gis mdun bang bte// khyim das nges par byung nas
5a4(mdo): rab tu 'byung bar 'gror bar 'gyur// byams pa'i yab dang pa 'di du// de'i mtshad dang mnyam 'dzi// bram pa rnams kyis 'dun padapadas// rab tu 'byung ba 'gro bar 'gyur// 
5a5(mdo): ded des kyis bdag ni// nang pa sangs zhes ni nam grags pa/ chos kyi bdag nyid stong dag gis// bsgom das rab tu la/ zung bar 'gyur/ dung gi phud byed rin pa'o/ 
5a6(mdo): gzhesaninam chags pa// bud med stong zag pani dang / btsun rgyad/ gis bdun par te// de 'og tu mngon zungs rab tu 'byung ba 'tshal bar zung // dam
5b1(mdo): 'jig rten 'gon pos 'di dag kun// b.rad pa'i lam ni bskyed das kyang / do dang gis pa'i bstad la btang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bdad dang / dri dang 'phreng ba drug pa dang / rol mo spa bsan bad/ 
5b2(mdo): ba yis/ shag kya thub la mchod nas ni// nga yi bstadad la lhags pa yid// gur gu rbu yis gdab pa dang // can dadagis ni thug pa yis// shag kya thub pa'i mchod rten la// mchod nas pa'i stan la lhags// de je sangs rgyas chos dang ni
5b3(mdo): dka' 'dun la yang skyabs song zhing // dka' ba'i las kyang byas nas ni// pa'i stan la lhags pa yin// shag kyi seng ge'i bstan pa la// bsrab gzhi' yang dag grangs nas su// ji ltar gsungs bzhid bsgrubs nas ni// nga yi ltu
5b4(mdo): la lhags pa yin// dge' 'dun la yang chos gos dang // zhal zas da nga ni btung ba dang // snyun gsos sna tshogs sbyin pa rnams// phul nas pa ya~M ste nad la lhags// bcu' bzhi' dang ni bzo' lnga dang // de bzhin
5b5(mdo): thathigasas brgyad dang // so shul gi ni thabs// ya lag rgyad legs nyam gnasacing // bsnyen gdas ga sa'i skyong byam dpa ni// nga'i bstad sngags so nas// don 'dis tu gsung bar 'gyur// sa
5b6(mdo): nyan thos rnams kyang ni// cho 'phrul gsum gis 'dul bar 'gyur// de che de dag thams cad ni// zag zang 'grogs na bde' bar 'gyur// de'i 'dus pa dang po ni// nyon mongs sred pa bcad gyu rad pa// dung srur phrag dku' bye phrag dru/ 
5b7(mdo): tshang ba'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur// de'i 'dus pa gnyis pa ni// nyan thos 'ching ba las sgrol ba// dung phyur phrag dku' bye brag bzhi'i// tshang ba'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur// de'i 'dus pa gsum pa yi// sems zhi na
5b8(mdo): par grol gyu rad pa// dung phyur phrag dgu' bye brag gnyis// tshang pa'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor das// lha dang byi rnams rnam 'atul te// nyan thos dge' 'dun thabs gcig tu// grong du bsod snyoms
6a1(mdo): gyod la hUM// de nas tog ldan dga' ldan lha'i// grong khyer deng ni gshegs pa ni// grong khyer der ni gshegs pa na// grong khyer mchog tu man da ra'i// me tog char chen 'bab par 'gyur// thub pa grong khyer gshegs traMH
6a2(mdo): kha/ me tog 'thor bar 'gyur// rgyal ba ched pa bzhi dag dang // brgyal byin sum bcu'i rtsa gsum dbang // tshangs pa lha tshogs thabs gcig tu// de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// lha'i bu ni mthu' chen gis// ud pal bad ma ku u teHdza~Mts+tsha
6a3(mdo): ma kar po tri ni ma dang / a ka ru dang can dan dang / de bzhin sa rdzas 'phreng ba dang // lha rdzas gos kyang 'thor bar 'gyur// 'jig rten 'gon de grong khyer ge// mchog tu gshegs pa ma thong 'das ni// king bal 'dab ltar 'jam pa'i/ 
6a4(mdo): sa der gding ba rgya chen 'dings// de dag lam kar 'phreng ba ni// sna tshogs dang yin par 'grems// lha'i bu ni mthu' chen dang // myi rnams yid ni ra ba dang ba// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang // spos dang phreng ba byug pa dang // rol
6a5(mdo): mo sgra snyan bsgrags pa yis// stond pa la ni mchod par 'gyur// brgya 'byin myika stong lha rnams kyi// rgyal po bde' brdzogs bdag po de// rab mgu' thal mo sbyar nas ni// 'jig rten 'gon la stod par byed// skyes
6a6(mdo): bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zag mchog gyur bcom ldan 'das// skye dgu'i kun la thugs rtser mdzod// de yi tshe na lha yi bu// mthu' chen bdud ces bya ba 'byung // de yang thal mo rab sbyar nas
6a7(mdo): 'jig rtend 'gon la spyod par byed// tshangs pa'i 'khor gis yongs pa skor cing // tshangs pas kyang de mdun bdar te// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni sgrogs bzhin du// dam pa'i chos ni gsung bar 'gyur// 'ad nyas pa das bres pa'i// srid pa/ 
6a8(mdo): 'ibacing ba rab spangs pa'i// dgra' bcom rnams kyis sa 'di ni// thams cad kun tu gang bar 'gyur// lha dang myi dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin dang di srin po klu// mthu' chen rnams ni mgu'agyur nga nas// ston de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ 
6a9(mdo): gang dag byamapa sa 'i bstan pal// tshangs par spyad pa phyir 'gyur ba/ de dag nyi da kyim padi// nyon ma ma gyid pa nas / gang rgyam ma ze'i bathud pa la// dngas par spangs myong cir 'gyur// de dag na
6b1(mdo): byem pa da// srid pa'i dra ba bcad pa dang // bamam gtad rdzogs par byas nas de// dga' dang bde' dang ya bdag ldan// 'thung po kun la thugs rtse ba/ byams pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ la'i dug khri'i bar du yang // ngas
6b2(mdo): chos ni stond par 'gyur// de de srog chags brgyal stong yang // 'brum phrag na yang 'dren pa ste// dam pa 'i chos la btul nas su// de nas mya ngan 'da' bang 'gyur// thub pa chen po byams pa de// yongs su mya ngan 'das ras kyang / 
6b3(mdo): de che de'i dam chos ni// lo khri dag tu gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba shag kya thub de la// sems ni rab tu dang bar gyis// de nas byams pa rkang gnyis mchog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas chos dag dang // dge'
6b4(mdo): 'dun tshogs kyi mchog bcas la// mos ni rab tu dang gyis dang // don chen nga rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// thugs rje che ldan de lta bu// byas pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// de tshe mnyes par byas nas ni// de nas mya ngan 'da'
6b5(mdo): bar 'gyur// ya mtshan 'di dag thos gyur da cing // 'byor da pa myi nyung ma tho nas ni// nag po'i rigs kyang dang 'gyur na// mkhas pa su zhig dang kyi 'gyur// de phyir 'di dag bdag nyid che// 'dod cing bdag la lekA
6b6(mdo): 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bstanang pa dran bzhin du// dpa 'a chos la gus par bya// 'phags pa byas pa lung bstad dpa// rdzogs so// rgya gang gang du/ ma rgya mu 'a bani byu hanas/ ma nya yan su tra/ khod na
6b7(mdo): du/ 'phags pa bde' bcan gi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i ma do'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub mos dpa' thas cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di dag bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na// bcoM ldan 'das mnyan yod na// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
6b8(mdo): tshal// 'gon byed zas sbyin gi kun dka' ra ba na// dge' slong stong nyis rgya lnga bcu'i/ dge' slong gi dge' 'dudan chen po// gnas gtan nyan thos chen po dgra' bcom pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ gnas gtan sha ri'i bu dang // me'u 'ag rgya
6b9(mdo): gi bu chen po dang / 'od srungs chen po dang // ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang // nga / sapa bzhi dang / nam gru dang / lam stan blun po dang / dka' bo dang / kun dga' bo dang / dgra' gcon zin dang @
7a1(mdo): dang / la byed dpa po dang / 'akus dang / sa 'dags pa dang / de dag dang / nyarnams na ga / dang / byang chu thams dpa' thams dpa
7a2(mdo): ma 'dis the/ 'dra sa dngas gnon dung byu pa dang / byung chu'i sems dpa' ba sa dpa' chen po sgyu 'dra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tha mos kyi srung po dang / byang rgya
7a3(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu 'artson dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu bgyod pagyi/ 'dor pa dang / de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan mang
7a4(mdo): po dag dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / skye mched kyi de dag po tshangs pa dang / de dag dang / swa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po gzhan dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhug te
7a5(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pag ri'i bu sa bka' stsa lang pa/ sha ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ad ra nub phyogs migs su/ sangs rgyas kyi ni byer
7a6(mdo): khrag khrig 'bum zag 'das par/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba zhig spyod de/ dres de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med pag byed ces kyi
7a7(mdo): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong zhing bzhes la chos kyang stond to// sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems 'jig rten gyi khams de ci'i phyir bde ba can zhes bya zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'jig rten
7a8(mdo): kyi khams bde ba can de na/ sems can rnams kyi lus la sdug bsngal myed/ sems la sdug bsngal myed cing / bde ba'i rgyu tshad myed pa yod de/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde
7b1(mdo): ba can zhes bya'o// sha r-i'i bu gzhan yang 'jin rten gyi khams bde ba can ni/ kha khyer rim pa bdun dang / shing tA la'i 'breng ba rim pa bdun dang / dris bu g.yeng ka'i dra ba rnams kyis
7b2(mdo): kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ bkra ba bsta na stug pa'o// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ rin po che sna bzhi 'di lta ste/ kaser dang / dngul dang / bye dur+ya dang / shel
7b3(mdo): dang / rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan bkod pa dag gyis legs par brgya nad pa'o// sha ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'jig rted kyi khams bde ba can na/ rin po che sna bdun
7b4(mdo): gyi rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po'i yad mas khyebs pa/ bya rog gis btung tu rung bar kha ta chad du gyu dad pa/ gser gyi bye ma
7b5(mdo): bdal ba dag yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun na/ them skas bkra' ba/ blta na stug pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / bye du s+ya dang / shel dang
7b6(mdo): rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa bzhi bzhi yod do// rdzing bu de dag gi 'gram na/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa/ rin po che sna bdun la 'di lta ste/ kaser dang / dngul dang / bye dur+ya dang / shel
7b7(mdo): dang / mu ti ke dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug gi shing bkra' ba dang / blta na stug pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag kun nas pad pa skyes pa 'di lta ste// ka ser/ kaser gi
7b8(mdo): kha rog gser gyi 'od 'byung ba/ gser sa bur ston pa sngon po/ kha dog sdod po/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ sdon po lta bur ston pa ser po/ kha rog ser po// 'od ze
8a1(mdo): 'byung ba/ ser po lta bur stodad pa dmar lo/ kha dor dmar po/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dmar po lta bur spyon pa dkar po/ kha dog dka
8a2(mdo): dkar por 'byung ba/ dkar po lta bur ston pa bkral ba/ kha dog bkra' ba/ 'od bkra ba 'byung ba/ bkra ba lta bur ston pa/ shi brta li 'phang lo tsam du skyes so// sha ri'i bu
8a3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sangs rgyas kyi did kyi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gos legs par brgya dad pa'o// sho ri'i bu gzhan yang 'jig rtend kyi khams pa
8a4(mdo): cad na/ lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra rtag tu 'byung ngo // / sa chen po dge ser gyi kha rog lta bu ste/ nyams dka' ba'o// sho ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sangs
8a5(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyand pa'o// sha r-i'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhi bde na nyin lan gsum mtshan
8a6(mdo): lan gsum cu tan ma mam ngas ga sa// des sems can gang dag skyes te/ de dag kyang snga dro gcig bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du nga
8a7(mdo): sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum zag la phyag 'tshal zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang me tog ston bu bye ba phrag 'brum mngon pa na to to/ tor nas nyin mo gnas pa'i phyi
8a8(mdo): slar 'jig rten gyikyi khams de nyid du dang // sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'i/ yangs sum kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod rnam pa de sa bu dag gis migs par brgyad
8b1(mdo): sho ri'i bu gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams pade ba can da/ rang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ma gya dag yod de/ de dag kyang nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 'dus nas/ klu dbyangs
8b2(mdo): lend te/ rang rang gi skad kyis smra'o// de dag sma dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ki sma dag dang 'byung ngo // sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag
8b3(mdo): gis / sgra de thos nas/ sangs rgyas yid la byed pa skye/ chos yid la byed pa skye/ dge 'dun yang la byed pa skye'o// sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems sems cad de dag tud
8b4(mdo): 'gro'i skye gnas su chu dang po yin snyam du sems pa ltan/ de ltar myi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ma sems can dmyal ba dang / 
8b5(mdo): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / kaushin rje'i 'jig rten dang // yi dgas kyi yul du skye ba'i myang yang myed do// bya'itshogs de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed
8b6(mdo): de nyid kyis chos kyi sgra byung ba'i phyir sprul pa dag go// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgya dad pa na
8b7(mdo): sha ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i/ shing ta la'i 'phreng ba de dag dang / dril bu ka yer ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis phoka cing / rlung gis bskyod na/ sgra snyan pa dang / mid du 'ong ba
8b8(mdo): nyams dka' ba dka 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo mkhan gyis/ yan laka bye ba 'bum dang ldan po'o// lha'i bsil snyan blangs pa bzhin no// der myi dka kis skra de dag thosan
9a1(mdo): la can sa su dran pa dang / gesu / 'i du sas rgyas kyin / 
9a2(mdo): yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgya dad pa'o// na mi'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed ces bya zhe na/ sha ri'i bu re ba zhin
9a3(mdo): na pa pa byed pag tu byed kyi zhidag da / na ri'i bu gzhan sa de bzhid gshegs pad me da
9a4(mdo): nye ba ni ga yogs pa'i byang chub sems das/ sha stag go// sha ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshad ni
9a5(mdo): brjod par sla la ma yin te/ gzhan du na myed/ grangs myed ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/ rnam pa lel
9b1(mdo): chu dag gis sogs par brgyad pa pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rab pa rnams gus par yongs su
9b2(mdo): bsngo bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir len/ 'di ltar skyes bu dpa de lta bu dag dang phran par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sha ri 'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba rin rod tsam gyis ni bcom ldan 'das de ba'in gshegs
9b3(mdo): me dpag myed de'i zhing du skye bar gyi 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ched dpag byed de'i mtshan thos la/ thos nas kyang
9b4(mdo): ma byed cing nub gcig gas/ nub gnyis sam nu gsum 'am/ nub bzhi 'am/ nub lnga 'am/ nub drug kas / nub bdun du g.yeng ba myed pa'i sems kyis yid la byed na/ 
9b5(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de/ 'chi bo'i dus kyi tshe phyin ci log myed pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
9b6(mdo): myed nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa'i bdun na bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
9b7(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/ don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gus par smon lam gdab par
9b8(mdo): bya'o// zhes de skad bshad do// sha ri'i bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des/ da ltar yongs su brjod pa de bzhin du/ sha ri'i bu shar phyogs na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa
10a1(mdo): zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po zhes bya ba dang
10a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa sun zor snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam sgra zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jas dbyangs zhes byal dang / de dag las sogs pa/ sha phyog sa rgya
10a3(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams/ ljags kyi dbang pos khyebs par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa brjod pa/ 
10a4(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grang sa 'di la yid ches par gyis shig/ ces gsung ba mdzad do// de bzhin du lho phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i
10a5(mdo): smon ma zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa zhe sa bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'di 'phro ba'i phung po zhes
10a6(mdo): byal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'artson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10a7(mdo): 'das kang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams/ ljags kyi dbang pos khyebs par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa
10a8(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad de// de bzhin du/ nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed ces bya
10b1(mdo): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa phung po dpag byed ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rgyas mtsha dpag myed ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ces zhes bya ba dang / de bzhi gshegs pa 'od
10b2(mdo): ze snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po'i tog chen po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ze ma dag pa zhes bya ba dang / de dag la phyogs pa nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
10b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams/ lcags kyi dbang pos khyebra par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis kyi khyab papa yongs su brjod pa
10b4(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su 'azung ba'i chos nam grangs 'dis yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba yangang ro// de bzhin du/ byang phyog lan de bzhin gshegs pa
10b5(mdo): 'od 'gro 'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sgrol po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin na/ shegs pa rab tu thul dkal zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshes/ 
10b6(mdo): gnyi ma 'byung zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung nas zhes bya ba dang / de dag la stsogs pa byang phyogs kyi sangs
10b7(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dka/ rang rang gi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod
10b8(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba dang / 
11a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grags la 'od ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos shes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzinod
11a2(mdo): ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyam mtshan zhes bya ba dang / de dag la phrogs pa 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
11a3(mdo): rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khyebs par mdzad do// khyed cag yon tan bsam kyis myi khyab la yongs su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par
11a4(mdo): gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// de bzhin du steg gi khyog/ sa na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa skar mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / 
11a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'od ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi phung po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ram
11a6(mdo): cen me tog shind tu rgyas pa'i rigs zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin ces mud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshes
11a7(mdo): pa mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba dang / de dag la phyogs pa steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
11a8(mdo): rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khyabs par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i
11b1(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba we// 
11b2(mdo): bya zhe na/ sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan thos par gyur pa dang / thos pa dang / thos par
11b3(mdo): 'gyur ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu sems can gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed de'i
11b4(mdo): ngas rgyas kyi zhing rosamajig rten pa thams dasangs rgyas kyis smon par byed pa byas pa par 'byung ba nga/ rnams
11b5(mdo): byed pa ya bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chul las kyi ldog go/ byi ma log go// byir myi ldog par 'gyur lo// 'i wa 'i ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rlon
11b6(mdo): tan zas pa gyis kyi khyab ma yongs su brjod pa/ de bzhin du/ ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / ngam man tan bsam gyis kyi khyab pa yongs su brjod do// sha ri'i nus
11b7(mdo): gso ma ldar 'dus pagakya thu sa kyi'i rgyam thos pams pa'i stegs pa dang / nyan mongs pa'i snyigs pa dang / sems can gyi snyigs pa dang / sa pa'i rigs pado/ 
11b8(mdo): tshe'i snyigs ma yi/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mched du/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chum mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang kyi thun pa'i na
12a1(mdo): bstand pa ni ngo mtshar la gos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ sha r-i'i bu snyigs ma lnga'i tshe/ 'jig rtend du ngas gang 'jig rte nang gi khams kyi mched dus/ 
12a2(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad dang myi mthun pa'i chos bstand pa de ni/ mchog tu dka' ba byed pa'o// 
12a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa la nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sho ri'i bu dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
12a4(mdo): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bde' ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdol/ 
12a5(mdo): rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya badz+ra dwA dza pa r-i nA ma na// bong swa/ da du 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngol ba/ 
12a6(mdo): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu dang myi rgyu'i 'jig rten sman slad du// / byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur dang da ltar gyi// rang byung thub dbang thugs rje ldan
12a7(mdo): nams la/ bdag gis bdag kun btud de phyag bgyi'o// chags pa dang ni zhe sdang gti mug gis// bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yi rnams kyis/ 'i na / / na/ 
12a8(mdo): par bgyil/ de bzhin gshegs kyi 'asod dmas mdzod gang dang / byang chub sems dpal sas byung bsod nams dang / gang sang nyan thos rkyend kyi theg chen dang / 'jig rten ma mngon pas
12b1(mdo): de la'ang yid rang // byang chub snying por thog mar gang sarjes rgyas/ pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyad mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas zla myed mtha' yas de dag la// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor/ 
12b2(mdo): bar bskul/ phung po ma lus mya ngan 'das dbyings su/ gshegs par gang bzhed myi dang lha'i lha/ 'gon de dag la 'jig rten pan slad du// bzhugs dang sangs rgyas sku don mdzad byar gsom
12b3(mdo): phyag 'tshal ba dang bshags pa'i bsod nams dang / bskul pa dang ni gsol ba gdab pa dang // de bzhin yi rang bsod nams mi mchis te// byang chub dam pa mchog tu bsngo bar bgyi// 
12b4(mdo): bdag ni bsod nams bsags pa 'dis rtag tu// byangachubasems ni brjid par ma gyurd cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpal dang // dge ba'i bshes nas
12b5(mdo): mnyes par byed gyur cing // myi lom gnod brgyad do na spong byar shog/ bzod dang ldan zhing mtshan gyis lusand pa// rten tu skye dran sems ni gyi rmongs dang / 
12b6(mdo): rab des pha rol byind la brtson gyur da cig// dbang phyug rgya rje chos kyi dbang phyug dang / yon tan 'byung nam nyid ni 'gyur byed zhog/ g.yog 'khor mang po yul bar ldan pa dang / bsam
12b7(mdo): ba mthud zhing rgya che dag gyur da cig/ bsod nams phyi zad rnam dag blo ldan dang / sog yon tan dag la dgal bar shog/ bsam gtan mngon shes so so yang dag rig/ dbang ba
12b8(mdo): dag la bdag dbang bgyid rgyu rad cig// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lam rdzogs pa// de dag sangs rgyas go 'phang myur thob shog// de la gang dag lam kun ma rdzogs pa// de dag
13a1(mdo): chags kyi ma pabyed gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad thun myed pa'o// bya chub tu byo lnga sru 'drems zhin/ de la das bcas pa ni brtan gyur cing / byang chub
13a2(mdo): thob sbyin den gzhan byed ma gyu dang // lus tud dbang po dag pas rab rgyas shog/ nang byed ribras nad myed cing mya ngan bral// tshe ringani dang ska ni yid 'ong dang / sdig las ldog cing dad/ 
13a3(mdo): la 'jug 'gyur dacig/ sems bral zhing zang zing myed chos kyis// rtag tu bas tshun 'dod pa myed par shos// gzhan du snying rje dang ni ldan gyu rad nas// 'dod pa myi mnga' bde bar
13a4(mdo): gshegs gyur cig/ 'gro ba zug bsngal gyingal yan ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub zla ma myed mchog tu/ rdo rgyal mtshan mongs pa sgo rgyal po gang // desan/ 
13a5(mdo): rang gi bsod nams yongs su bsngo// bde gsheg/ sa kun tu 'bang dag sa nad pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i bsngo dge ji lta ba// de bzhin bdag dang / 
13a6(mdo): ma bya ma myod pa/ rgyal bdas pa kun tu ya pa ga/ @/ tshul med kyim ngos/ yongs su gro ma
13a7(mdo): ga yad mas ka chul pa tin 'i lta gas bod nalags pa de bzhin gshegs pa
13a8(mdo): kyi bya las kyi med par rgyas pa zhes tshig yin pa mamangs/ yangs rgyas dang byang chum sems dpa mams cad / 'dzin pa na gimasam chus
13b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yangs pa can du byond te/ yangs pa can rol mo'i sgra can gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na dge slong brgya stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal
13b2(mdo): sum khri drug stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
13b3(mdo): po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dang
13b4(mdo): sems dpa' chen po lta na sdug dang / byang chub sems dang / la sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
13b5(mdo): dpa' chen po bsam pa legs par rnam par sel pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po brtsegs padang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang
13b6(mdo): sang po'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtse 'dzin rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / de dag la stsogs pa
13b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong dang zabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyid dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding pa dang / myaM 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
13b8(mdo): chen po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du daste
14a1(mdo): pa ma dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po'i chos stodad cing chos kyi gtan gyis sems can rnams tshim par mdzad yang dag par dka' bar mdzad
14a2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stand las langs te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pas/ 
14a3(mdo): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang / klu dang / 
14a4(mdo): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang // nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto la 'phye chen po dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / khyim 'das/ 
14a5(mdo): rang kyi dang / myi ma lags pa mang po dag chos nyapa'i slad du 'dus shing mchis pa/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhugs pa me par dgongs te/ chos rnam
14a6(mdo): mi pa sems can thams cad than myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubalas phyir gyi ldon par 'asgris pa yoms cad kya na sangs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / bdud ldas
14a7(mdo): can gyis kyi rdzi bar 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / rjod kyi smon lam kyi khyad pa rgyam pa da sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gnas bshad drug so med/ 
14a8(mdo): ma ldan 'das de bzhid gshegs pa rnams lan gyi gzigs pas sarnas pa kyis bye kyis bas/ rgas 'i bye ba zhag cig 'am grong ga ga'i rga gi ce sa / tshus mas kyi
14b1(mdo): snyed dag kyang dbyer na// dong 'am sang gi ltar dgongs pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dang po byang chub kyi thugs yid la mdzad pa dang / sngod kyi smon lam dang / de bzhin
14b2(mdo): gshegs pa la dmyigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan bkod pa dag brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstand par spyod na bcom ldan 'das slar mo'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma
14b3(mdo): tshadam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can thams cad rjes su bzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lakhas pa mang po dang / sngon gyi smon
14b4(mdo): lam gyi khyad par rgyas par bcom ldan 'das kyis bad ru gsol da/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de zhin gshegs pas ka la khying ka'i sgra skad du/ dbyangs
14b5(mdo): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la legs so zhe sa bya ba yin te/ 'jam dpal legs so// ledas so// 'ag 'jam dpal khyod snying rje dang ldan pa ste
14b6(mdo): 'jam dpal khyod kyis snying rje dpag tu bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su ga
14b7(mdo): bya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i lha dang / gyi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa ni yang legs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin
14b8(mdo): gshegs pa'i byin kyis rlabs kyis khyod kyi spobs pa 'di skyes so// 'jam dpal de'i phyir rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ ngas bshad do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
15a1(mdo): pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no nags pa zhes gsol nam/ bcom ldan 'das stir nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsald to// 
15a2(mdo): 'jam dpal shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sang ba rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lagazhan gyis myi thub pa na/ de bzhin gzhes
15a3(mdo): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs su bsgrags pa dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ zham 'breng ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgyad
15a4(mdo): stong du ma dang ldan pa bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhesachos kyang stonang la yod de/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gtse/ gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 
15a5(mdo): mtshar legs par yongs su bsgrags pa dpal gyi rgyalapo ro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ shi da tu yongs su dgazag um dpag tshad brgyad stong du ma yod pa 5
15a6(mdo): mthil ltar mnyam par gyurd pa/ ngan so pa dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra myed pa/ bud byed kyi dngos po myed pa tsher ma dang / g.yangs pa dang / ri dang / rdo dang / gsegs dang / rgyam
15a7(mdo): myed pa/ 'jam pa/ sa'i ngos reg na bde ba/ lha'i dri gsung dang ldan pa/ lha'i rin po che'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i seng ge'i 'i
15a8(mdo): legs par brgyand pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag la phyir myi ldog pa'i sa/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo li ka ser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig gis brgyand pa'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa'o// 
15b1(mdo): 'jam dbus 'jig rtend kyi khams don byang chub sems dpal dag sa mas gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ni rdzus te skyes pa rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma las byung ba sha stag go// 
15b2(mdo): de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam thob shig/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
15b3(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan logs par yongs su bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po thugs dang po spyod pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ des smon lam chen po brgyad
15b4(mdo): rgyun ma chad par btab bo// brgyad gang zhen/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byar/ 
15b5(mdo): chub mngor bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sem sa can gang la sa dag na ba'i nad sna tshogs kyis / lus yongs su gzi rang te/ snying nad dang / gshed byed dang
15b6(mdo): byad dang / mo sa ngas dang / 'jigs pa rnams kyis gtses pa/ de dag bdag gi sathus/ bdag gi phying las bcud brjod pas/ de dag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig/ 
15b7(mdo): byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rims dang sdig pa can gyi gdon gnod pa rnams byed par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs
15b8(mdo): pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag long ba dang / 'on pa dang / myos pa dang / sha bka' dang
16a1(mdo): nad tshabs chen pos btab par gyurd pa/ de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mying lan bdun brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar de zug
16a2(mdo): ki bar du/ dbang po thams cad yongs su tshang bar gyur da cig/ sdug bsngal dang nad thams cad rgyun chad par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag pa
16a3(mdo): 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa den/ sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / kati muka gis bsgribs pa/ 
16a4(mdo): 'tshams myed pa lnga byed pa/ bya ba ma yin pa spyod pa mang ba/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ sdig pa myi dge ba'i las sna tshogs byed pa/ ngan song gsum dang / sems can
16a5(mdo): dmyal bar 'gro ba de dag/ sems can dmyal ba chen po/ ra skyes nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba de da ga bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing
16a6(mdo): bdag gi mying yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag gi mtshams myed pa lnga las stsogs pa/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing yongs su zad par gyurd cig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
16a7(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pam sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang / sems cad dmyal ba dang / ngam 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur da cika/ lA'i yul pa'i lha'i bde ba dang / myi'i bde ba'i ro myong bar
16a8(mdo): gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smod lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
16b1(mdo): rgyas pa der sems can kang su dag dbul bar gyurang te/ zas dang / sbom dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gyi bdog pa de
16b2(mdo): dag bdag gi mthus // bdag gi phying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi myeng yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ dbyig dang / gos dang / nopa dang / 'bru dang
16b3(mdo): mal cha dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba 'phel bar gyur na ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po lnga pa ni kang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pan
16b4(mdo): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag bcing ba dang / bdeg pa dang / go rang gzhug pa dang / mtshon cha'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs
16b5(mdo): kyis lus yongs su gzi da ba de dag bdag gi mthusabadag gi mying yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bcings pa dang / brdeg pa thams
16b6(mdo): cad las yongs su tha dad par gyurd cig/ lus kyi gdung ba thams cad rgyu nad chad par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs
16b7(mdo): dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag 'gon myed par gyur da pa/ lus la gtung ba'i me 'bar
16b8(mdo): ba dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug pa'i nang du chud de/ srog la 'jigs skrag cing / 'gon myed de/ sme sngags sna tshogs 'dod pa de dag bud/ 
17a1(mdo): gi mthus bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mying lam bdun yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lus la gdung ba'i skye thams cad
17a2(mdo): bar gyur da cig/ seng ge dang / sdug dang / dos dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug par dag kyang byams pa la gnas par gyur cig/ 'jigs pa byed pa dang / ni ba'i gnas la sas
17a3(mdo): par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bdun pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
17a4(mdo): ba den sems can gang dag phan tshun 'thab pa da// thod pa dang / 'byed par gyur te/ 'khrugs zhing 'jigs skrag nas spangs pa de dag bdag gi mthus
17a5(mdo): bdag gi mying yad la gnas shing / bdag gi mying lan bdun yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar da thug kyi bar du 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / chod pa dang / 
17a6(mdo): 'gyed pa dang / thams cad rab tu zhi bar myur da cig/ phan tshun byams pa la gnas par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni// pagi che bdag ma 'os
17a7(mdo): pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can de dag chu'i nang du song ste/ zung zhugs pa gling myed
17a8(mdo): pas phyind pa srog 'dod pa/ chu klung dang / rgya mtsho'i nang du song ste/ smre sngags sna tshogs 'dod pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi myi yid la gnas zhing / 'dag
17b1(mdo): mying yid kyis lan bdun brjod pas// de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ chu klung chen po las dbugs phyind pa sbyin par gyur de cig/ 'jigs pa myed par rgal bar
17b2(mdo): gyurd cig ces btab ste/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs su bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po des/ smon lam chen po brgyad po de dag btab po// 
17b3(mdo): 'jam dpal de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de'i thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ bzung ste smon lam dang / ting nge
17b4(mdo): 'di da kyi stobs kyis/ gnas dang / sems can yongs su smyirnyed par mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
17b5(mdo): dang/ rim 'gro mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'phrul da/ pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / zhe mo rabab byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa
17b6(mdo): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpalas brtul gnas pa rnams ma gtogs par nyan thos
17b7(mdo): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lo brgyar yang brjod par myi nus so// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po na
17b8(mdo): khyim bdag yon tan don tu gnyer ba rnams kyis zhe sdang dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bral bar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan bzung bar bya/ klag par bya ste/ rab tu gus pa
18a1(mdo): de bzhi das chod pa rgyas 'i na pa mas sa kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / rang thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ ma tham
18a2(mdo): sems dpa' rnamapa la zhes pa chen po 'i gtam 'jam/ 'in ma // 'jam dpal de bzhin nags pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de sngon
18a3(mdo): kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan smon lamachon po brkyang brtan no// brkyang gang zhe na/ de'i smon la mchen po dang can/ ga gi che bdas ma 'ongs pa'i rgyas na
18a4(mdo): bdag blan myed pa yang dag por rdzogs po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang da ni rnalas kyi mtha' dang tsho la dgal ste/ g.ye ba sna tshogs mang 'o
18a5(mdo): dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams pa dang / byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa ma pa yongs su nyams ste/ de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnaMs mangs su tha dad par gyur cig/ 
18b1(mdo): so song 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong ba dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus
18b2(mdo): bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gis mying yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ bsams
18b3(mdo): ma thag tu bgo ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / nor bu dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser rnams 'byung bar gyur da cig/ dkon
18b4(mdo): chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar gyur da cig/ bya / chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang myi bral bar gyur da cig// ngan song gsum dang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
18b5(mdo): las yongs su thard par gyur da cig ces btab bo// bcom ldan 'das de'i smon las chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang
18b6(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal skyes pa 'am/ drod gshes
18b7(mdo): los skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa la stsogs pa'i sems can gang dag grang ba dang / tshang ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas lus yongs su gdungs shing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyams thag/ 
18b8(mdo): pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi mying rna lam tu grag cing / de dag gis bdag gi mying dran pa dang brjod pas/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa de byang bar gyu dang cig/ skye ba de yang tha mar gyur du cig/ 
19a1(mdo): blar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par bar rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi ba du bye ba'i mug bsngas thams cad las yongs su ba dad par gyuradad cig/ su mo/ 
19a2(mdo): ba'i lha'i bde ba myong bar gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gsum po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs po'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
19a3(mdo): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po li 'jig rtend gi khams de na bud myed gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis lus dayongs su gang zhing byung byed kyi skye
19a4(mdo): gnas la spyod pa dang / gang dag bcas pa'i dus na stug sAl gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag gi mchus zadag gi na ngan lam du grag cing de dag gis bdag gi myir dran pa dang / 
19a5(mdo): ces btam po// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gdage mo bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dum na/ zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa der// 
19a6(mdo): sems can gang dag 'chi ba dang / dkra dang / gnod pas gces pa dang / phan tshun du ba ma dang / sring mo dang / mdza' bo ba dang / nye ru'i mya ngan myong zhing sdug bsngal dang
19a7(mdo): bya na thus rdzas yum la zug pa dag bdag gisamasabadag gi myong na sam tu klag pa dang 'aton tu bton pas byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'phel dang / dgra dang / 
19b1(mdo): rgom pa'i rjod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur dacig mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur dacig ces btab bo// de'i smod lam chen po lnga pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs dus na
19b2(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag mtshan mo mun pa mun nag rnam par rgyu ba/ las kyi mtha' rnam pa sna tshogs la zhug+sa
19b3(mdo): sdig pa can gyi gdon sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ 'jigs nas sme sngags 'dod pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mying yid kyis brjod pas/ byang chub
19b4(mdo): mthar thug gi bar du/ mun pa mun nag thams cad myed par gyur da cig/ sdig pa can gyi gdon thams cad byams pas gnas par gyur da cig/ mchod pa dang rim 'gro bya ba
19b5(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par brtson par gyur da cig ces pab bo// de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni/ kang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang
19b6(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag dman pa la mos shing / shes rab chung la dran pa rmongs te/ dge ba'i chos rnams dang / 
19b7(mdo): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzi nad dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa las yongs su nyams pa de dag gi mthus
19b8(mdo): bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi myi yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du ting nge 'dzind dang / dran pa dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
20a1(mdo): gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon tu myur da cin/ shes rab chen po rjes su rgyu bar gyur da cig ces bta // de'i smod lam chen po bdun pa ni gang gi tshe bden
20a2(mdo): 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag dman pa la mos shing / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / 
20a3(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'dod pa skyed de/ de la gnas shing / bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la/ rgyab kyis phyogs par gyurd pa de dag bdag gi mthus
20a4(mdo): bdag gi myong yid la gnas shing / bdag gi myang yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
20a5(mdo): bar tubla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur da cig/ nyan thosadang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rgyab kyis phyogs par
20a6(mdo): myur da cig/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar gyur da cig/ de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla myed pa yang
20a7(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag skal pa chen po zad pa'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar 'khrum
20a8(mdo): par gyurd te/ ngu zhing mya ngan byed la sngon gyi myi dge ba'i las kyi rgyus/ sdug bsngal myong zhing skyabs myed pa/ 'gon myed pa'i sems can de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi myi
20b1(mdo): yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mying yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag sdug bsngal dang mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar gyur da cig/ bsil ba'i dngos po thob par gyur da cig/ de nas shi
20b2(mdo): 'phos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pad ma'i snying po'i khri sa ke'i khri la rdzus te skye bar gyurd cig ces btab ste/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
20b3(mdo): smon lam chen po brgyad po de dag btab bo// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang / pad ma'i sa rab tu la
20b4(mdo): brgya nad pa mkhas pa gzi' brjid kyi sla dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni banyam pa/ zag gyur che dab/ yangs pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur da pa
20b5(mdo): sA'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis rab tu brgyan paspos gtsaba'i ngaspyor byed pa dang / lha'i spos dang me tog kyis rab tu brgyand pa/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra skad dang / 
20b6(mdo): klu'i nga ro 'byung ba/ lha'i rin po che'i dril bu gser ka'i dra bas legs par brgya nad pa/ lha'i rin po che'i seng ge'i khri mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rin po'i rdzing kyis brgya nad pa
20b7(mdo): sa'i gzhi 'jam zhing snyan pa/ rI dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma myed pa/ bud myed kyi dngos po myed pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa myed pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
20b8(mdo): dpar gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag las cad kyang / pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te byung ba/ lha'i rin po'i rgya nad dang / gos kis mdun legras par
21a1(mdo): brgya dad pa shA stag so// sangs rgyas kyi ni bde sa bsams ma bag sa cas gyis gos dang ga zas dang / skom dang / mal dang me tog dang / sbos dpag 'byed
21a2(mdo): pa dang / rgyand dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod thams cad dang / sems can gyi tshogs thams cad dang / lha'i rin po che'i longs spyod la thams cad byung ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi
21a3(mdo): de rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas ma/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das de
21a4(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang / zla ba dang pad masarab tu brgya dngad pa/ mkhas pa gzi'i brjid kyi sgra dang dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan// nyin san gsum mtshan lam
21a5(mdo): gsum yid la bya rab tu gus pas gzung bar bya/ dad par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyang byed du gzhug me tog dang / bdug pa dang
21a6(mdo): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / mar me rnams kyis mchod par bya/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snyen gnas la nye bar gnas par byas la/ nyin mtshan gtsang yang
21a7(mdo): byas la/ sa phyogs gtsang mar gzhag par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam gdab cing / sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje'i sems su byas na/ de la de bzhin
21a8(mdo): gshegs pa dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang
21b1(mdo): gas su byang bar 'gyur ba/ kyang chus kyisams yid la byed pa dang kyi rgyal 'ang 'gyu / da gas dang ni sdang dang gta nga// tshu na pad byen
21b2(mdo): par 'gyur ngo ro// gang bsams pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang cod pa dang 'byed pa thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'dim
21b3(mdo): shi 'thos pas sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der pad ma'i snying po 'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin du dang / gzu
21b4(mdo): kyi sgo rnams mngon tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal ban ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'dzind par ni de ltar yon tan mang po dang ldan pa yin no// 'ja
21b5(mdo): dpal shar phyogs kyi logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'anas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung kyi snyed 'das bAn 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyis yongs su
21b6(mdo): gang ba rin po che bsags pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzer bzangs dri myed rin chen sdang brtul zhugs grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
21b7(mdo): 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston da cing / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong du yas bskor ba yod do// 'jab dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
21b8(mdo): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam chen po bzhi btab bo// bzhi gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni
22a1(mdo): gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang dag srog gcod pa
22a2(mdo): gyi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa srog chags rnam pa sna tshogs kyi srog gcod pa byas pas/ tshe thung zhing nad mang ba dang / chu dang dug dang / mtshon dang / me dang / nad sna tshog
22a3(mdo): kyis 'chi bar gyurd pa de dag gis/ bdag gi mying thos nas 'dzin pa dang / mchod pas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang ste tshe ring bar gyur da cig/ nad myed par gyur da cig/ su yang rus ma
22a4(mdo): yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par ma gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po/ dganyis pa ni/ kang gi bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
22a5(mdo): bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag sdig pa myi dge ba sna tshogs byas te/ gzhan gi rdzas 'phrog
22a6(mdo): pas dbul po'i khyim du skyes te/ sgren mo dang bkres pa dang skom pas lus yongs su gdungs shing sdug bsngal myong ba de dag gis/ bdag gi mying thos nas bzung bas/ bla na byed pa lnga
22a7(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sdig pa thams cad byung bar gyurd cig/ ma tshang ba myed pa thob par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon
22a8(mdo): lam chen po gsum pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag gnod
22b1(mdo): sems dang ldan pa de dag gis bdag gi mying thos nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ phan tshun pa ma ltar byams pa la/ 
22b2(mdo): gnas par gyur dacig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs po'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
22b3(mdo): sangs rgyas pa de nasems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis bsgribs te/ tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur da nas/ de dag sdig pa kun tu spyod de/ 
22b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa dral bas/ ngan song gsum du ltung ba dang / sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'gyur ba de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi myong bos nas
22b5(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ las kyi sgrib la thams cad yongs su sbyang bar gyur da cig/ nye ba'i nyon
22b6(mdo): mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur da cig/ tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin cing / lus dang ngag dang yid sdom la gnas par gyur da cig/ byang chub kyi sems
22b7(mdo): yid la byed pa dang myi bral bar gyur da cig ces btab ste// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzangs dri myed
22b8(mdo): rid chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na/ smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab bo// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
23a1(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sa gzhi la rin po che'i spos sna tshogs gnas pa tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri
23a2(mdo): dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa yangs pa/ zag sum pa tsam ngas sprul gyi snying po'i dri'i shing ljon pas yedzes par byas pa/ sgo'i nor bu dang / rgyad 'breng ba dang / rin po tshe spangs
23a3(mdo): lha'i nor bu rin po che'i spos chus yongs su dag pas mdzes par byas pa/ dang gi lnga ldi bres shing dbyangs pa/ rin po'i che'i skud pas myig mdangs ris su brim
23a4(mdo): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ dang yid myi bde ba dang bud myed kyi dngos po myed pa byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams kyis rol mo'i sma dang
23a5(mdo): sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs ma blangs par sgra 'byung pa/ sil snyan de dag las dngos po 'i ngo bo nyid taM sgra dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam gyi sgra 'byung ba
23a6(mdo): sgra de zos pas/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smodan lam kyi thabs ma
23a7(mdo): gsangs rgyas kyi zhing mi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gzangs dri byed rin chen sdang brtul zhugs grub pa des
23a8(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis/ byang chub kyi shing du bzhugs te/ sems can 'dod
23b1(mdo): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis bsgribs pa rnams gzigs shing nad sna tshogs kyis gzi dad pa / 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dkon pas gnod par gyu rad pa tshe skal dpa/ 
23b2(mdo): thub pa'i sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba'i sems can rnams gzigs nas/ sems can de dag gi don dang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yod/ 
23b3(mdo): su zad par bya ba'i phyiragazungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so// tad yA thA/ sid de snyid de/ su sid dwe/ mo tsa ni/ mo kA Ni/ mug ti/ byi muka ti/ a ma le/ 
23b4(mdo): bi ma ye mang ka l+ye/ hi ra N+ya ka rbe/ rad na/ sarba a rA sa rda ni/ ba ra ma rA sa dza si/ ma na se/ had pu te/ a t+ya bud te/ bi dAb+hA ye/ su ba ne/ 
23b5(mdo): pra mA kro She/ pra ma d+hA ni te/ sa ma ma che/ dzi te/ sa ma tram pa tiH te/ tu/ lud ta ko ti/ zin te/ nam sa rba ta thA tA nas pA hA/ 
23b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di gsungs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad dang rdzu brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
23b7(mdo): skyong ba thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ sdig pa thams cad
23b8(mdo): bsal ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di lta bu 'di dag bka' stsald pa legs so// 
24a1(mdo): legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal bu 'am/ dge bsnyen dang
24a2(mdo): dge bsnyen ma yon tan don tu gnyer ba gang su yang rung ste/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag don tu 'dzi nad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / dad par byed pa dang / nyin lan gsuM
24a3(mdo): mtshan lan gsum du/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems yi la byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / mar me rnams kyis mchod pa dang / gtsang bar
24a4(mdo): byas te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan par byas na/ de'i mtshams myed pa lnga las stsogs pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// 
24a5(mdo): 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rtend kyi khams der skye bar 'gyur te/ pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i lardzus te skye bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar
24a6(mdo): 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa'i gdon thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'tsho ba'i dus kyi tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par 'gyur/ re ba dang bsams pa
24a7(mdo): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan myed pa na
24a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong zhing bzhes la chos kyang stond pa yod do// 
24b1(mdo): 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan byed mchog dpal de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mi lag mthil ltar mnye ba/ 
24b2(mdo): zag glu che bayangs pa/ mya ngan dang / ngan song dang / stug bsngal kyi sla myed pa/ bud myed kyi dngos po myed pa/ sa gzhi 'jam zhing shin tu snyi ba/ lha'i spos kyis
24b3(mdo): bdug 'i nang bu rin ma che'i zhing ljon pas mongs par byas/ zhwa'i 'dzam bu'i nA pa'i gser gyi bram la na ma tsha
24b4(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
24b5(mdo): reg par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed mchog dpal gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa yang de 'dra'o// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
24b6(mdo): dkri bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed mchog dpal re/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad la spyod pa na/ smon lam chen po bzhi bta' po
24b7(mdo): de'i smon lam chen po dang ni/ kadra kI tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can ga
25a1(mdo): dag mya ngan dang/ sdug bsngal dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mang ba dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba der/ sems can kang dag gis
25a2(mdo): bdag gi mying thos la zos nas kyang yid la byed pa de dag gi mthus mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid myi med pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig
25a3(mdo): su yang stug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar ma gyur cigacha ring por gyur da cig ces bta mo// de'i tshe smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs
25a4(mdo): dus na/ za na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chumangon par rdzogs pam sangs rgyas pa den/ sems can gang dag sdig pa kyi dge ban ma tshogs byas
25a5(mdo): sems can dmyal ba chen po stir byed pa che po ni pa sun nag can du skyes pa de dag la bdag gi da ni sums ma 'odag pa 'i spang 'i 'dis margya
25a6(mdo): sa sems can dmyal ba ded reg cing mthong ma mam kyi/ sdig pa thams cad byang nathams cad rgyal po chen po// mug pa sngal dag sa ma yongs su zar ngas brgyad dacin
25b1(mdo): pa de na sems can gang dag sdig pa myi dge ba byas te/ gzhan gyi rdzas phrogs pas dbul po dman pa'i khyim du skyes nas/ gos dang / zas dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / rgyan
25b2(mdo): myi bdog pa/ grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba dang / mal cha dang / rgyan myi bdog pa/ grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong bas/ bkres pa dang / skom pas ga ng+ga zi rad cing
25b3(mdo): mdog ngan pa de dag gis/ bdag gi myong thos nas brjod pasabla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bgo ba dang / bza' ba dang
25b4(mdo): btung ba dang / mal cha dang / thams cad yongs su lo sa sprad par gyur da cig/ lus la lha'i lus kyi kha togagis brgya nad par gyu rad cig ces btab bo// de'i
25b5(mdo): smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ sems can kang dag gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za rnam sa kyis gces shing / mdangs phrogs te/ nad sA
25b6(mdo): tshogs kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba de dag gis bdag gi mying thos nas/ bdag gi mthus/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
25b7(mdo): kyi bar du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha zla mangs la phrogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig/ byams pa la gnas par gyur da cig/ nad kyi suka
25b8(mdo): bsngal sna tshogs las yongs su zard par gyur da cig ces btab po// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das des/ smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab bo// 'jam dpal gang dag
26a1(mdo): dang mas can thams cad ma nabya/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la yang / de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ mya ngan dang / sdug
26a2(mdo): pa mi gyi da yos su da ga tud byed par / sun mi dul pa thams cad yongs su ma dad pa gyu
26a3(mdo): byang chub kyi mtha nga thug gi du log par srung ba 'gro bar gyi 'gyur/ skye sa dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin / gas pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ rin po snga bdun
26a4(mdo): ldan no// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon kyi smon lam kyi khyad par rgyas pa gapa yin pa de/ 
26a5(mdo): ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs gam nyan thos dang / rab sangs rgyas thams cad kyis brjod par gyi nus so// 'jas da
26a6(mdo): shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten kyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan na/ de bzhid gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
26b1(mdo): sangs rgyas chos grags mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes tshal chos kyang stond pa yod do// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yA/ 
26b2(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos grags rgya mtsho la'i dbyangs zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de/ shind tu yongs su dag pamanyam pa/ dri ma myed pa/ 'od gsal pa
26b3(mdo): an da snyil kyi rang bzhin can/ cig pa dang / ra ba dang / skar zhug dang / rta bams dang / dra ba dang / ba kam shel las grub pa/ sa kazhi' lba'i rin po che'i shing ljond pas
26b4(mdo): mdzes par byas pa/ gser gyi skud pas dmyig yang sa ris su bris pa/ rin po che'i shing ljond pas mas par byas pa/ gser gyi skud pas dmyig mangs ras/ 
26b5(mdo): su bris la/ rin po che'i shing ljond pa la yang/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bris shing sbyangs pa lha'i dang kyi lnga ldi dang / lha'i me tog dang / spos kyis mdzes
26b6(mdo): bar byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing/ lha'i spos chus yongs su gang ba dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag kyang rlung kyis bskyod cing bskul na/ lha'i yid du 'ong ba/ sems can
26b7(mdo): thams cad yang dag par dka' bar byed pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi sgra skad 'byung ba/ lha'i sil snyal dang / rol mo rnams las theg pa chen po'i chos kyi sgra
26b8(mdo): skad 'byung ba/ sems can gang dag chos kyi sgra de thos pa de dka/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang pa dang / kati mug dang bral bar 'gyur ba/ byang chub kyi sems kyi 'arjed pa zhes bya ba'i
27a1(mdo): ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal gyi sgra myed pa/ nye ba'i nyond mongs pa myed pa/ bud myed kyi dngos po
27a2(mdo): byed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de sngodan kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam chen po bzhi btab bo// bzhi gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni
27a3(mdo): gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa den/ sems can gang dag sog par smra ba can kyi khyim du/ 
27a4(mdo): skyes pa sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun sem spyad pa/ byang chub kyi mapa yid la byed pa sari tu ma dad pa de da da bya
27a5(mdo): bdag gi mthus/ las kyi sgrib pa de zad par gyur nasabyang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ yang dag pa'i du gyur ci/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / da
27a6(mdo): dun pa nga gyus/ da pa byed 'ad ldog par gyu sa/ de'i mapa ma tshan mi nyis padi/ gi ba ma
27a7(mdo): sa kyi pasargyas lam la lag rag tu skyes te/ kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyi nus/ zin pa'i sas byed pa dag dan rnas kyi na
27b1(mdo): rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyur pa de dag la/ bdag gi mthus bdag gi mying rna lam du grag cing / chos kyi sprin dang / rgya mtsho 'i sgra 'byung bar gyurd cig/ de dag gis chos kyi sgra de
27b2(mdo): zos nas/ sngon las zad par gyur da te/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang myi 'bral bar gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam che
27b3(mdo): po gsum pa ni/ gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag gos dang
27b4(mdo): rgyan dang spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang ma la cha dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / bral zhing myi ldan pa'i dbang gis/ sdug bsngal myong zhing / 
27b5(mdo): sdig pa byed pa de dag bdag gi mthus gos dang rgya nad dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa da nga/ mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yongs
27b6(mdo): su spyad pa dang / longs spyod rnams bsams ma thag tu 'byung zhing myi ldan pa myed par gyur da cig/ byang chub kyi mthas kyi bar du su yang ci dang yang myi ldan pa myed par gyur da cig/ 
27b7(mdo): ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa
27b8(mdo): de na/ sems can de dag sngon kyi las kyi rnam par smi pas phan tshun zab mo dang / 'tha' pa dang / thor ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / gcig la gcig gnod par bya ba dang
28a1(mdo): gsad par bya ba'i phyir/ rtul ba dang / mtshon dang / dbyig pa las stsogs pa slar lag par gyur da cagamada' dang / dbyig pa dag gis bsnun pa de na
28a2(mdo): gang dag gis de'i tshe bdag gi mying thos shing/ yid la gnas pa de dag gi mthus/ yid kyis brjod pas/ mda' dang / mtshon dang / dbyig pa la stsogs pa slar log
28a3(mdo): par gyur da cig/ phyir phyogs par gyur da cig/ dgra thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas par gyur da cig/ su'i srog gi dbang po yang 'gag par ma gyur dacig/ byang chub kyi
28a4(mdo): mthar thug gi bar du/ rang rang kyi rdzas dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag gis chog shes par gyur da cig/ ces btab ste/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de
28a5(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs palosangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ smon la
28a6(mdo): chen po bzhi po de dag btab bo// 'jam dpal gang la la zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya ma
28a7(mdo): dbyangs de'i mtshan thos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / dad par byed pa dang / rab tu gus par mchod pa byed pa de dag gi sdig pa thams cad yongs su bya nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mas kyi
28a8(mdo): gyi ldog par 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nam du yang byang chub kyi sems dang myo 'bral bar 'gyur/ skye la thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang za 'a 'gyur
28b1(mdo): rtag tu nad myed cing tshe ring bar 'gyur// 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang log par ltung ba myi 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skye bar bsam su zag tu
28b2(mdo): gos dang/ rgyand dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang/ yo byad dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal bcom
28b3(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de'i mtshan 'dzind pa dang / nyan pa ni de ltar yon tan mang po dang ldan no// 
28b4(mdo): 'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyeda'adas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i
28b5(mdo): rgya mtsho'i legs par gnas pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho'i mchog gi blos
28b6(mdo): rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyend pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa chos kyang stond pa yod do// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon gyi byang chub
28b7(mdo): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam chen po bzhi btab bo// bzhi ka zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
28b8(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang su dag zhing las dang / sa bon 'debs pa dang / tshong byed pa dang / zab mo
29a1(mdo): cod pa la slo ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag thams cad kyis bdag gi phyir thos nas/ bdag gi mthus bsams ma thag tu 'chog chas thams cad 'byor da par gyur / 
29a2(mdo): cig/ gnod sems mang bar ma gyur dad cig/ rtag tu dge ba'i chos spyod par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 
29a3(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang su dag myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par
29a4(mdo): blangs te/ yang dag par blangs pas/ sems can dmya de la bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag gis/ bdag gi mying thos dan/ bdag gi mthus dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang
29a5(mdo): ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can gang yang sems can dmya la bar 'gyur bar ma gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i
29a6(mdo): dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can gang su dag ji snyed cig gzhan gyi dbang du song ste/ 
29a7(mdo): chad pas bcad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / go rang bzhug pa dang / gsad par 'os pa de dag gis/ bdag gi pying thos na/ bdag gi 'od kyis na byang chub kyi mthar zug kwi bar du bcing ba dang / 
29a8(mdo): brdeg pa de dag chad par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni sems can ga su dag tshe thung bar 'gyur ba 'i
29b1(mdo): sdig pa myi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bdag gi mying rna lam du grag par gyur da cig/ de dag gis bdag gi myi thos nas/ bdel 'gro
29b2(mdo): mtho' ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur da cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lha dang myi'i bde ba myong bar gyur da cig/ sdig pa'i las thams cad yongs su byang bar gyur da cig ces btab ste// 
29b3(mdo): 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blo gros rnam par rold pa mngon par mkhyend pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
29b4(mdo): pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab mo// 'jam dpal 'jig rtend kyi khams rin po che rgya mtshor legasapar gnas pa de'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston tan bkod
29b5(mdo): pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa ci 'dra bar yod pa de 'dra'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang reg/ sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis yang dag
29b6(mdo): pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po de dag gi mtshan thos zos nas kyang 'dzind pa dang / blangs nas yid la byed pa dang / dad par byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 
29b7(mdo): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rim mo'i sgra dang / sil bstan dang / be ga rdob pa dag gis mchod pa dang / glegs pa ma la bris te/ 'chang ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs/ 
29b8(mdo): 'di yi ker 'dri ba dang / yaM kar 'dring 'dug pa dang / sems btud de gzhan la nyan pa dang / chos smra ba de la yang 'chog chas dang / yo byad thams cad kyis mchod par byed pa de mangs
30a1(mdo): rgyam thams cad kyi byed byirlabs par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal zhag phyogs mnan
30a2(mdo): su sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang ka'i klud kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye dur snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom
30a3(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su sngona'i bde zer gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla ma byed pa
30a4(mdo): A dang gyi rnams kyi ston dpa/ sangs rgyas bcomam 'das smad gyis bye du mya'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// 'jam dpal macom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ldan
30a5(mdo): kyi lha bye dUr+ya'i 'od de/ sngon byang chub sems dang na// spyad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam chen po bcu gnyis pa/ ste'adi dag btab bo// bcu gnyis po gang zhen/ 
30a6(mdo): de'i smon lam chen po ni kang ki che/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i che/ bdag gi lus kyi 'od
30a7(mdo): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed dpag tu myed cing / dpag gis myi lang pa dag lham melhan ne/ lhang nger/ gyur da cing / sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
30a8(mdo): bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcus legs par brgya nad par gyurd te/ bdag mi 'dra ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur da cig ces bta' 'o// 
30b1(mdo): de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang/ 
30b2(mdo): chub thob pa na lus nor bu rin po che bye du r+ya ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar phyi nang shind tu yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma byed pa la 'od gsal ba dang / kho laka yangs shing che ba dang / dpal
30b3(mdo): dang bzil 'arjid 'bar ba dang / legs par gnas pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba bas lhag pa'i 'od gzer ki dra ba rnams kyis legs par brgya dad par gyur da cig/ den sems can
