166b5(mdo): ra su// rgyal ba'i mishes mtshungs myed 'tshang rgyas kyi / khyod kyim sngod cang su tshogs rin me ro/ ga pangs pa 'i sras kyang btang bar kyang // dang srong chen po de'i
166b6(mdo): dus 'di// chos kyi rgya mthal yas 'gro la phye// khyod kyi tshul khrims ma nyams dri myed dge// sngon chad rtag tu khyod ni mchog gyis brgyar// drang srong chen po khyod khrims 'dra ba byed// 'gro ba nyod mongs
166b7(mdo): rnam pa mang las krol// khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni bzod pa spyad// khyod ni 'gro bas ngan brjod rnam mang bzod// bzod pas bzod cing dul bas nges pa'i bdag/ rkang gnyis bdag po mngon par 'byung/ 
166b8(mdo): blo gsi// khyod brtson brtan zhing myi g.yo'i g.yol pa myed// bdel bar gshegs sngon mthar rgya cher gyurang // g.yon can bdud ni sde dang bcas brtul te// ngan sdong gsuM po mtha' dag skams par gyur da // 
167a1(mdo): gang phyir khyod kyis brtul zhugs rgathub kyang // dus ngang nyon mongs snyigs ma bsregs kyis la// khyod kyis bdud rtsi'i chu bo'i char phob ste// 'gon myed ring nas skom pa tshis par gyis// 'chi myed
167a2(mdo): mya ngan byed gnas sangs rgyas te// skom pas nyams zag bdud zi tshim byas zhes// khyod kyis sngon smras tshig mchog dran byos te// grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung // khyod ni shes rab mchog gi myod pa mkhas/ 
167a3(mdo): khyod ni ye shes mtha' yas dri myed che// mongs pa yid gnyis lam la gnas rnams la// shes rab 'od 'gyed dam pa mdzes par gyis// khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni byams pa s+yad// snying rje dang ni dga' mchog btang // 
167a4(mdo): snyoms dang // khyod kyis pyod pa dam pa gang gyad pa// gyod de nyid 'gro la rnam par phye// phyogs bcu'i rgyal pa dag gi gzi brjid kyis// yon tan me tog sna tshogs bcad 'di// sil snyan
167a5(mdo): dag las rnam mang yid 'ong grag/ mal na 'dug pa'i gzhon nu de la bskul// gang gi tshe na dga' byed bud myed rab tu dga' pa rnams// shi nad tu mdzes shing rab tu snyan pa'i sil snyan
167a6(mdo): spogs pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu' dag gi rgyal ba lha myi 'dul ba mdzad nas kyang // sil snyan dag las gsung mchog ha cang myi che rjes su sgrog/ 'gro la bar byed yon tan mang po ldan khyod 'gro rnams su// rnga
167a7(mdo): par rgyu ba'i tsher rgyal ba'i yon tad gnyug mar byas// sngon gyi tus zhugs gzub kyad pa dran gyis te// shing mchog drung du byung por 'chi byed go 'bang lob par gyis// lA gyi dag mi gan tu sgos zhing rgyas
167a8(mdo): pa'i yon tan bral// khyod ni shin tu stobs ldan bdud rtsi'i ri bo rtag tu sbyin// stobs bcu'i ro bro dam pa mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod byas pa// bdud de myi dag khyod kyis myur du rnam par bye// rgyal
167b1(mdo): ba'i yon tan 'gro la phan pa byed la dga' ba po// khyod kyis sngon gyi srid pa nor dang nor bu gser rnams btang // chung ma bu sU ka dang grong khyer rdal bcas sa dag kyang // rang gi 'go' dang myig dang lag/ pa dag/ 
167b2(mdo): dang rkang pa 'ang btang // myi mchog khyod ni mna' sngon rgyal po dge bar gyurd pa'i tshe// myi zhig khyod la mngon gsum phyogs nas 'di skad tshig smras te// grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di kho bos byin zhes byas/ 
167b3(mdo): de'i tshe na rab tu dga' zhing 'khrugs par gyur pa myed// gna' sngon khyod ni rgyal po'i bram ze dge' bar gyur pa'i tshe// skye bo bla ma bsnyend bkur byed pa gzhan la 'khro myi byed// bram ze dam pa dag dang skye bo mang po dag/ 
167b4(mdo): la bkod// de nas chi mo srid pa'i 'gro ba lha'i gnas su skyes// sngon khyod rgyal po'i bu las drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe// rgya la po ngan pa khros pas khyod kyi yan lag bcad pas na// khyod
167b5(mdo): ni yid 'khrugs gyur pa myed par 'chi ba'i dus byas te// de'i chen khyod kyi rka lag dag las 'o ma zags// sngon khyod drang srong sngo bsangs zhes bya gang tshe gyur pa na// ri mchog gnas na rtul
167b6(mdo): shugs rga zhing bla ma la yang dga'// myi'i bdag pos dug mda' dag gis khyod la sbun pas na// khyod ni rgyal po de la yid 'khrugs myed cing snying brtser gyur nga // khyod sngon ri dgas bdag po yon tan can du gyur pa
167b7(mdo): tshe// ri gzar 'bab chu chen pos myi zhig khyen par gyurd pa na// phan dang ldan pa khyod kyis myi de phyang ste zad la gzhag/ khyod kyi dgra po khrid de 'ongs pa na yang yid ma 'khrugs// myi mchog khyod sngon pra ze/ 
167b8(mdo): 'bur ni gang tshe gyu rad pa na// khyod kyi nor bu rgya mtsho chen po yangs par ltung ba'i tshe// khyod kyis rgya mtsho' chen po zad par bya ba brtsams pa dang // stobs brtag khyu mchog khyod kyi nor bu de tshe phyir la rnyed// skye
168a1(mdo): bu mchog khyod mama' sngon drang srong ngas par gyur pa'i tshe// bram ze gcig gis bdag gi skyabs gyur da shog ces khyod mna' 'ongs// sbas pa brab mengs pa kho bo dgra las phyung zhes byas// khyod kyi/ 
168a2(mdo): rang lus btang gi bram ze de ni ma btang ngo // mna' sngon shing gi gnas su drang srong sngo bsangs drung 'ongs te// 'dod pas spras pa shing gi lol du song drongs shes byas// shing de lo ma ji snyed yod pa rab bgrangs rab
168a3(mdo): mkhas pas// khyod kyis de bzhin nor pa myed cing mthun par tshig tu brjod// khyod sngon ne co yon na gyurang zhing la gnas pa'i tshe// zad par gyur nas kyang sngon gi drin la bsas te de ma spangs// lha'i dbang po/ 
168a4(mdo): khyod kyi yon tan dran nas rab tu dga'// snga mkhol bzhin du shing mchog de ni dpal dang ldan par byas// / khyod kyi brtul shugs rkaHdpa myang ba de dag mtshungs myed de// yon tan ldan pa yon tan la
168a5(mdo): la spyad pas yon tan mang // khyod kyi dus la dpab grong khyer bcas pa lis yang thong // 'gro ba dag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan spyod la myur du 'khod// gang gi tshe na bud myed rin zang po'i
168a6(mdo): gos kyis lus brgyan te// sil snyan dam pa mchog rab yid du'o nga ba'i sgra ni rab sgrogs pa// de tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i gzi yis tshogs bcad sna tshogs pa// sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag sil snyan dag
168a7(mdo): gi sgra las rab tu byung // rga dang shi las zin pas 'jig rten dgas bdag ni bskyabs gyurd ces// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyis bskal mang snga rol smon lam de skad btab// myi'i seng ge khyod kyis sngon gyi sngan kya smon
168a8(mdo): lam dag ni dran gyis te// rkang gnyis dbang po byed nga mngon par byung ba'i dus ni de yin no// khyod 'dir srid pa khrag khrig dag tu sbyin pa mang po du ma byin// nor dang rin po che dang gser dang gos bzangs rin chen
168b1(mdo): spras pa dang // rka lag dag dang myig dang phangs pa'i bu dang rgyal srid 'byor pa dag/ khyod kyis btang yang khyod kyi slong ba rnaMs la za ba zhe sdang myed// khyod 'dir zla ba'i tog dang mche' ba bzang dang rgyal po zhi bar gyu dang / 
168b2(mdo): snying brtse snying rje yi yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gtsug na nor bur gyurang // rgyal po dpa' bo btan dang myig bzangs dang na de las stsogs pa byas/ rgyal po khrag khrig mang po spyan dga' na par 'gyul pa nyid khyod// mdang ba gsheg pa kyas
168b3(mdo): mang po rgyas khrims gyod pa kyang // nor bu rin chen dri myed pa ltar bung tshul khrims dang / bu khyod kyis 'bri'i rnga ma ci 'dra de 'drar tshul khrims bsrungs shing s+yas+yang // tshul khrims dga' bas khyod kyis 'dir ni 'gro la rgya chen don yang s+yang // 'dir
168b4(mdo): khyod glang po mchog tu gyur da te rngod pa dgra yis mdal bsnun tshe// tul po dgra la snying rje skyed nas su ni khyod kyis bskyabs/ bzang zhing mdzes pa'i mchel pa yongasu btang ste tshul khrims yongs
168b5(mdo): su btang // khyod kyis de las stsogs pa tshul khrims rnam pa ra 'phrul pa mang po byas// bzod la dga' ba khyod kyis 'gro ba'i/ myi phan sdug bsngal sngon mang dang // tshig rtsub dag dang bsad pa
168b6(mdo): dang ni bcings pa mang po bzod par byas// khyod kyis mna' sngon myi gang dag la bde' ba kun gyis rim gro byas// de dag byin nas khyod kyi gshed mor gyur kyang khyod kyis de dag bzod// mgon po khyod ni ri mchog gnas na
168b7(mdo): gang tshe dred mor gyu rang pa'i tshe// kha ba papa cing chu 'brugs pas ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i myi bzung ste// rtsa ba 'bras bu rnam pa mang dang bdel ba kun kyis rim gror byas// de la se myur du khyod sa gsod pa khrid kyis/ 
168b8(mdo): 'ongs kyis de la bzod// byang chub btsal phyir brtul zhugs rga thub yon tan rnam ma du shes la// khyod kyis brtson 'grus shin tu brtan par gnas shing myi ka yol g.yol pa myed// dbang sgyur bdud kyang khyod kyis
169a1(mdo): brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs ni myed par byas// myi'i seng ge khyod 'dir mngon par byung ba'i dus la dbab bo// khyed 'dir mna' sngor kha bra'i kha dog 'dra ba'i rta mchog kya rang pa'i cha/ 
169a2(mdo): snying rje bskye nam mkha' las ni srin po'i gling du myur du song // de tshe 'phongs shing 'dug pa'i byi de blangs te bde la rab tu bzhag/ khyod kyis 'di las rdzogs pa brtson 'grus rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// byar
169a3(mdo): tu 'gyur zhing g.yo' la yul la dga' ba'i sems btul te// bsam gtan par 'gyur dus des zhi gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gno' bo bcom// khyod 'dir bsam gtan dka' bas rang gi yon tan
169a4(mdo): dag gis 'gro don byas// / da 'dir seMs can mchog khyod pa sam gnas rnam 'phrul bya ba'i dus la bab// mna' sngon khyod ni drang srong bas gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur pa// rgyas po myed
169a5(mdo): ba'i myi dag gis ni khyod khrid rgyal srid dbang yang bskur// // khyod kyis skye bo dag ni dge ba bcul dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod// / de'i tshe na myi las shi 'phos thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su
169a6(mdo): dong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba rnam mang gas ba'i cho ga khyod rab mkhas// ga'ang gi spyod dang 'gro ba'i skang shes pa dang dbang po shes pa dang // tshul dang 'dus dang blo gros rje/ 
169a7(mdo): mang rgyu ba'i pha rol khyod bya ni gyurang // rgyal po'i sras khyod 'dide ni mdor pa'i byung ba'i dus la dbab bo// khyod kyis mna' sngon skye bo lta pa log par zhugs par gyur pa dag/ rga shi sdug bsngal
169a8(mdo): dza pa mang pos nyams zag 'khod pa 'di mthong nas// srid pa dza par gzhig pa'i drang lo nyid kyis khong du chud byas te// mud pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don chen rab tu byas// tshogs pa
169b1(mdo): rnam pa mang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis// sil snyan sgra bsgrags de las rgyal ba'i gzi' yis dbang po bskul par gyur // blo mchog ldan pa khyod 'dir mngon par mngan par byung po'i dus la dbab
169b2(mdo): kyis// sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo 'di dag mthong nas btang snyems ma byed cig/ bud myed gos dang rin po che dang do shal spos 'phreng sna tshogs kyis// brgya nad pa dag dang sos dang 'phangs pa skyes nas rab tu
169b3(mdo): dka' ba rnams// seMs can mchog la sil snyan rab tu sgrogs cang spong bar byed pa na// rgyal ba'i mthu' yis sil snyan dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra byung // gang gi don du khyod kyis 'gro la phan
169b4(mdo): phyir skal pa du mar ni// btang bar dka' ba btang zhing tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin tu s+yang // bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa khyod kyi dus la dbab kyis// 
169b5(mdo): 'dren pa mngon par 'byung ba'i blo la byung sems phyi shol ma byed cig// sngon cad rini chen mdzod dang gser dang dngul dang rgyan rnas rab tu btang // skye ba de dang de dag tu ni mchod sbyin rdza
169b6(mdo): ba mang po byas// khyod kyis chung ma bu pho bu mo lus dang rgyal sring srog btang ste// byang chub don tu btang ba dka' ba dpag tu myed pa khyod kyis btang // khyod ni rgyal po mya dman bsod nas dpal
169b7(mdo): kyis rnam par grags par gyur pa// mu khyud 'dzi nang dang mya khyud nag po tshangs pas byin dparal pa can// mchod sbyin stong ldan dang ni chos sos 'od 'phro can dang dor brtan dang // shin tu ngo bsam gyu rang sems can
169b8(mdo): dman la btang bar dka' bar btang // zla ba'i bu dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang bsod nas 'od zer can du gyur// gtong pa che dang ldan zhing mthu' ldan khyod ni byas pa bzo' par gyurang // rgyal po drang srong
170a1(mdo): zla ba gzugs ldan dpa' bo bden pa 'phel ba dang / rgyal po legs par smra ba tshol dang blo gros bzang dang nges par gyur // zla ba'i 'od dang khyad par 'gro dang rtul dang phyogs kyi bdag por gyur // rab sbyin dpa'
170a2(mdo): bo kani rgyal po rin chen gtsug phud zhi ba stod// myi dbang de dag rnams dang gzhan du gyur da te btang bar dka' ba btang // khyod kyis ji ltar gtong ba'i char phab de bzhin chos kyi char pa phob// khyod kyis sngon chad
170a3(mdo): sems can snying po gang ka'i bye ma snyed cig mthong // sos can tha rad par bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog ni chos pa ma// khyod kyis mchod pa dpag byed bsam myi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod// dpa' bo grong khyer ngam
170a4(mdo): 'di nas 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo// thog mang khyod kyis don yod mthong las lha'i me tog gis ni mchod // rnam par sdang mdza dad pa ni dang pa'i sems kyis skad cig rab tu bltas// rnga dbyangs/ 
170a5(mdo): ldan pa la ni khyod kyis ma ru ra'i 'bru cig phul// tsan dan mtho nga nas khyod kyis rtsa'i me sgron blangs te khyim du bzung // rdul po grong khyer 'jug pa mthong nas phye ma spar gang rab tu gtor// chos
170a6(mdo): kyi dbang phyug chos 'chad pa ni legs bya ba rab tu byin de// kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod// 'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis dga' bas gser 'phreng gtorang / 
170a7(mdo): 'od zer rgyal mtshan ya ni kha tshar phul zhing gsal la pal srang gtor nga // ye shes tog la mya ngan myed pa'i me toka kha lo sgyur la 'jams// rin chen gtsug tor can la mar me pad ma ldan la sman yang phul// 
170a8(mdo): thams cad zil gnon mu tike do shal rgya mtsho la la ni pad ma phul// pad ma'i snying po la ni bla re seng ke la ni char tig phul// sa sa'i dbang po'i rgyal la mar phul me tog rgyal la 'o ma phul// sgra 'byi nad
170b1(mdo): sa kyi bded pag gsas 'a/ kun sa sus brgyad tu byid mazhin pa ma // dab mad gagags dpa na khyod snga 3'o// 
170b2(mdo): gnon la nor bu phul te rgyal sa ras bcos bting ba phus// slad kyi rgyas la rin ched gdugs yul seng ge'i togs khri bad phul// yon tan mchog dang ldan pa rin cer dra ba 'od srungs ni klu dbyangs kun// rgan
170b3(mdo): mchog ma tog phul zhing bang 'ong 'gro 'a tog sa rtag tu me to/ dbul// gyi 'khrugs rgyas la 'ang brtsegs phul zhing 'jigan mchod pa 'brang ba cus// rgya sgom gtsugs rgyal sring dbul
170b4(mdo): byas rgyas par gal spos kung dul// snod mams padang / yul bad pa'i mchogs rgyar rnams phug pa byas/ togs ma togs chogs stong pa mdzangs mung bas/ na
170b5(mdo): brnam pa sna tshogs pa dang gzhan dang gzhan dag byed par// khyod kyis sems cad snying po de dag rnams dang kazhan yang sngon chad mchog/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnapas dang ston pa de dag khyod mchod drang bar gyis/ 
170b6(mdo): sems can 'god byed bya ngang gang ba las par ma tor mngon par byung // mar ma ma dad pa mchod pa las gyis bzod pa mchog pa pa ste// rjes su 'thun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa byed pa nga/ 
170b7(mdo): ring sa rab tu dga' bas ma nga sa drangs byed 'jig rten 'ams kusaH// sangs rgyas dag na mangs yang mchong ba bas kyi byas byab// gnas pa dpag byed de dag 'ad kyar da sangs rgyas de dag bya 'dal
171a1(mdo): khyod kyi lus rnams thams cad dang ni de dag phying yang gang du song // dngos po thams cad za par zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa byed// 'dod pas rgyal sring mongs spyod rtag pa byed kyis grong khyer man
171a2(mdo): nas byung // bskal pa zad par 'gyur tsha gzil brjid drag pa'i 'jig pa'i me 'od ltar// rkang pa dpa'achib kyi bzang 'jigs pa chen po yong 'gyur ba// dngos po thams cad tha mar zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas/ 
171a3(mdo): tag pa byed// shin tu sdug bsngal sems can ltos la yon ta ldan pa mngon par byung // rgyal po bdel ba'i mas na nyas gyur ci // gang che mo tshogs gling pu rgyud gcig dang // mis snyan sna tshogs
171a4(mdo): sgra las song byed pa// de tshe sil snyan sgra la 'di dag byang // srid gsu dka' dang rad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar// 'chi myod rab 'a bar 'di ni 'gon myed pa// srid las byung ba 'gro ba rtag tu
171a5(mdo): rmongs// puM par chud pa'i bung pa 'khor ba bzhin// sr-i dgasu myi brtan ston ka'i srin dang 'dra// 'gro ba'i skye 'chig la sta dang mtshungs// 'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i klog 'dra
171a6(mdo): ste// ri gzang 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro// sring srong ma rig dbang kyis skye bo rnams// myi dang lha gnas ngan song la gsum po// 'gro ba lnga po dag tu phyi mkhas 'gro// dper na rdza mkhan 'phang
171a7(mdo): so 'khor ba bzhid// rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra sbar dang // dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa// dus ngan snyigs la 'gro ba 'di dag thogs// dper na ngor pa'i sil gre'u thogs pa bzhin
171a8(mdo): 'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa mang // 'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon mongs bcas// ral gri so 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs// ngan skyugs sdod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos spangs// 'dod pa'i yon tan
171b1(mdo): 'jig bcas nyon mongs bcas// rtag tu brjed par byed pa mun pa 'dra// rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug pa sngal rtsa// srid pa'i sred pa khri'i shing 'phel bar byed// ji ltar me 'bar 'obs ni 'jigs
171b2(mdo): bcas pa// de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bos rig/ 'dab rdzab che 'dra ral gyi gshegs nas 'dra// ral gyi so la/ sbed rtsis bskus dang 'dra// ji ltar sprul gi mgo' dang ngan skyugs sdod// de
171b3(mdo): daltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig/ bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra// ros kyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra// gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag
171b4(mdo): a 'dra ba la// myig yor 'dra zhing gar ya lha 'dra dang // la mnyam par 'phags pa'i skye bos rig// 'dod pa'i yon tamaskad cig sa madra// sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa tsam// 
171b5(mdo): pur dpu' pa lta bu yang dag myin// yongs su brtag/ yas byung bar mkhas pas rtogs// na tshod thog par gzugs// mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe// phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa
171b6(mdo): listong // rga dang sdug bsngal kazi brjid lus bcom nas// rnam par spong ste ri rigs klu snyam pa'ide// nor 'bru dam pa rdzas mang stobs sngon tshe// phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i myong // dor nyes
171b7(mdo): sdug bsngal bar ni gyur da pa'i tshe// rnam par spong ste myi 'is 'brog stong bzhin// ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing // de ltar sbyin 'di myi la dge bar byed// nor nyams rga bas nye cing spong ba na// 
171b8(mdo): de tsha rga bar myi 'gyur bya dgod bzhin// rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe 'gon po bzhin// phra na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed// rgan sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na// de tshe 'dod par myi 'gyur 'chi
172a1(mdo): bdag bzhin// rga bar rga byas na chod yal gyur dan// sdong po gnam lcags kyis ni bcom pa bzhin// dgas pas 'khogs na 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra// rgalas byung ba thub par myur du
172a2(mdo): smos// bud byed skyes pa tshogs rnams gapas skyems// ma su khri ging sa la'i nags sdug pa'idi// gzas brtson 'grus cal dang shugs 'gro ste// dper na skyes bu 'das bu byid pa bzhin// gapas
172a3(mdo): gzugs sdug gzugs ni myi sdug byed// rgabs gzil brjid 'phrog cing mthu stobs 'phrog/ rgabs bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed// rgabs 'chi byed rga bas mdangs kyang 'phrog// nad brgya mang dang
172a4(mdo): nad thigs sdug bsngal gyis// 'gro ba gces te myi yis ri dgas bzhin// rgand na pas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la// sU ga bsngal las ni byung bar myur shog cig// dper na rgun spang chung
172a5(mdo): dang kha ba che// rtsa shing gel ba nags sman mdangs kyang 'phro ga/ de ltar nad 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing // dbang / po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed// nor bu nor chen pa
172a6(mdo): mar zad par byed// nad ni rtag tu 'gro bar brnyas byed// gnod par byed 'acing sdug la bsngal bar byed// yongs su gdung byed mkha' la nyi ma bzhin// 'chi' dpa' pho dang 'chi 'pho'i dus byed pa// phangs
172a7(mdo): shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu bral// phyir myi 'ong zhing phrad par 'gyur ma yin// shing las lo 'phrul 'dra zhing klung gi rgyud dang mtshungs// shi ba dbang yod pa da bang byed myin// 'chi ba 'phrog byed chu bos shing deng
172a8(mdo): bzhin// myin de gnyis myin grogs myed gcig pu 'gro// rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang myed// 'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'jadad te// 'byung po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srim
172b1(mdo): bzhin// klu la mkha' lding glang chen seng ge 'dra// rtsa rtsi'i 'byung po tshogs la me dang mtshungs// skyon brgya mang po dag la 'di 'dra 'di dag las// 'gro ba 'grol zhes khyod kyi smon lam bta
172b2(mdo): sngon gi smon lam myod pa de 'drar byos// khyod ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la pa pa// / kang tshe bud myed tshogs ni rab rga zhing // sil snyan dag kis thub chen slong byed pa// de tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnas
172b3(mdo): kyi mthus// tshigs bcad snga tshogs sil snyar sgra las byung // 'dus byas thams cad myur du 'jig pa ste// mkha' la klog rgyu nad ring du myi gnas bzhin// khyod kyi dus 'di nye bar gnas gyur dkyis// 
172b4(mdo): brtul shugs bzang po mngon byang dus la bab// 'du byed/ myi rtag brtan pa ma yin te// rdza so ma btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag// gzhan gyi rdzas ni brnyan po byas dang mtshungs// 
172b5(mdo): bye ma 'i grong khyer lta bur ring myi thogs// 'du byed 'di dag 'jig pa'i chos can te// dbyar gyi zhal zhas ji ltar 'gogs pa bzhir// chu ngogs bye ma yod pa bzhin 'dra ste// rkyen pa
172b6(mdo): raka las nga rang bzhin nyams chung ba// 'du byed mar me'i 'od 'phro 'dra ba ste// myur du 'byung zhing 'gags pa'i chos can yin// rlung dang mtshungs par ring du myi gnas la// dbu' pa lta bur nyams chung/ 
172b7(mdo): snying po byed// 'du byed g.yo pa myed cing tong pa ste// brtags na chu shing dag gi phung po 'dra// sgyu ma sta bu'i sems cani rmongs par byed// lag bcangs stongs pas byis pa bri de dang mtshungs// 'dus
172b8(mdo): byas byung dpams rang tu dag dang // rkyen rnams kyis ni rab tu 'byung ba ste// gcig gas gcig rgyu byas te brten nas 'byung // khyim pa'i skye bos 'di 'dra 'di sa togs// dper na dres ma ur rdza bter byag/ 
173a1(mdo): brtsa lang pa'i stobs kyis zag par gyu rang ba dang // bo rgyan khyad mo 'khor lor bcas pa yang // de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba byed// de ltar srid pa'i yan lag kun grub pa// gzhan
173a2(mdo): dang gzhan 'tshogs pa la brten nas ni// de dag so so re rer grub par gyurang // sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// sa bon yod na myu gu ci bzhin te// sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid byin// 
173a3(mdo): de ltar rtag myi chad myin chos nyid do// ma rig pa mi 'du byed rkyen yin te// 'du byed de yang yang dag nyid du byed// ma rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang // rang bzhin stong ste g.yo ba myed pa yin// rgyal
173a4(mdo): rgya'i 'bur ni sdang mod kyi// rgya de 'phos par dmyigs/ pa yang dag yod ma yin// de las de byed gzhan las ma yin te// de ltar 'dus byas rtag myed chad myed pa// mying dang gzugs
173a5(mdo): la brten pa byas nas su// byig gi rnam par shes pa dir byang yang // myig ni gzugs la brten pa ma yin la// gzu gas kyang phyogs 'pho ba yong ma yin// 'di dag bdag myed kyi/ 
173a6(mdo): sdug yos can yang // de dag bdag dang sdug par btags pa ste// dor pa yang dag pa yin btags yin yang // de las kyig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung // rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur
173a7(mdo): te// mkhas pas skye dpa 'jig pa rnam par mtho // gang du ma song gang nas 'ongs pa byed// rnal 'byor pas ni stong pa smra star mthong // dper rtsub shing dang ni rtsab spyan dang // lag pas brtsa yang / 
173a8(mdo): ba byas pa gsu tshigs pa// desas brten nas me sar gyu da te// byung nas ring pong kyi rtogs 'gags par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las btags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs las gang song
173b1(mdo): zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas na// 'di 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mya dmyigaso// phung po dag dang skye mched khams kyi// rkyen ni ma rig pa dang sred dang las// de dag tshogs pa sos/ 
173b2(mdo): can zhes brjod kyang // de ni dam pa'i don tu dmyigs su myed// mchul dang lkog ma rkan la brten nas ni// lce sbyar da pa las yi ge s+tha byung yang // lkog mar brten nas ma yin rkan las myin/ 
173b3(mdo): re re la ni yi ge dmyigs su myed// tshogs pa de la brten nas ngag de ni// yid kyis klo'i dbang gis byung mod kyi// yid dang ngaka ni myi snang gzugs myed de// nang phyi rol na yang dmyigs su myed
173b4(mdo): mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyi// skye dang 'jig pa rnam par brtags byas nas// de tshe ngag kun phrag/ cha lta bu dang // skad gcig pa dang snying po myed par mthong // 
173b5(mdo): dper na shing dang rgyud las brten byas la// lag bas brtsa lad pa byas pa gsuM 'tshogs na// sgra skad snyan pa'i kring bu las sogs pa// de dag las ni smra yang 'byung bar
173b6(mdo): 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas nas// sgra'i 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myi dmyigs so// / 
173b7(mdo): de ltar rgyu dag dan rkyen rnams las/ 'du byed 'byung ba thams cad gyurang pa ste// yang dag mthong ba'i rnal 'byos pa yis ni// 'du byed stong pa g.yol ba byed par mthong // phung po dag dang skye mched khas
173b8(mdo): dzas ni// nang yang stong la phyi rolang stong pa ste// thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas myed la// chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni// mar me mdzad
174a1(mdo): pa mthong ngas khyod kyis rtogs// ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ster// de bzhin lha phyir bcas pa rtogs par gyis// gnod pa yang dag ma yin brtags pa'o// 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis
174a2(mdo): gro ba 'byangs// snying rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsal ba'i rtsa// 'dren pa bdud ci'i rgyun ni rab tu thob// byang chub dab bya yang dag thob nas ni// 'phags pa yo dzod kyis srog chags bsku la zhis/ pa las
174a3(mdo): pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin// sngon gyi spyod pa rjes su dran gyis te// 'phags pa'i nor gyi na dbul sdug bsngal la// sos can kha lo sgyur ba ma g.yel bar/ 
174a4(mdo): 'phags pa'i nor kyis de dag bsdu ba gyis// ngan song sa sa'i lam ni gcad pa dang // mtho' ris bdud rtsi'i rag sgo mo mo cha ka de ni 8/ seMs can bye ba mang la bstan zhes te// khyod kyis rtag tu tshul
174a5(mdo): khrims shin tu bsrungs// tshul khrims ldan pa'i bsam pa grub 'gyur gyis// sngon gyi spyod pa rjes su dran gyis la// ngan song / gsu po'i sa'i sgo tshad de// mthol res bdud rtsi'i sgo la ni
174a6(mdo): dpe' ba gyis// srog chags nas kyi khong khro khro gzhis dang // srid pa'i mcho sems can bskas byas te// zhi ba de rims nad rnams byed so dkod do zhes// khyod kyis rtag tu babod la shin tu bsgoms
174a7(mdo): sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// dgra' dang gnod sos ma tshal bas dkrugs pa li// mtshel ba gyod pa yal bar mdor par// 'gro ba 'di dag bzod pa'i sa la khod// chos kyi klu ni legs pa sbyar byas
174a8(mdo): la/ srid pa'i mtsho' las 'gro ba rnams bsgral te// zhi ba de rim nad rnams myed la dkod do zhes// gang gi don tu khyod kyis brtson 'grus bskyed// sngon gi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// 'gro ba chu bo bzhin
174b1(mdo): sa khyer gyur da pa// sems can 'gon myed pa dag brtson stobs dang // rtul ba'i shugs kyis myur tu 'di dag zond// dper po 'khrul dang phal ba'i dbang po dang // spre'u 'dra ba'i sems las zhi gnas ngas
174b2(mdo): gcod ces// 'dren pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// nyon mongs gzhil shes gtan bsgoms gyur da pa// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// nyon mongs dra bas dkrugs par gyur da pa'i// 'gro la ma g.yel
174b3(mdo): nyon mongs gtses pa las// bsam btan mchog la skye sku 'di dag khyod// rti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs 'i// 'gro la chos rgya mang po mthong byed pa// yang dag mthong ba'i myig ni sbyin no zhes// khyod kyis sngon
174b4(mdo): chang shes rab shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgrubs pa'i// 'gro la shes rab dam pa'o/ da bzang ba'i// chos myig dri myed nyon mongs myed pa byin/ 
174b5(mdo): bud myed nas kyi sal snyan klu dbyangs las// tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di 'dra dag byung ste// de zos nas ni rgyags pa rnams spangs nas// / byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems btang po// / dge slong dag
174b6(mdo): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dang na 'dug pa'i tshe 'ang chos banyan pa dang bral bar ma gyurd to// chos yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ dge slong dag
174b7(mdo): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni// yun ring po nas chos dang chos smra ba rnams la gus pa dang bcas par gyur cing // bas pa thag pa nas chos don du gnyer pa// chos 'dod pa chos kyi kun dga' sa dga'
174b8(mdo): zhing mos par gyur dpa// chos tshol bas ngoms kyi shes pa/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos yang dag par ston pa// thar byed pa'i chos chen po'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa/ bang 'di byed par chos nyon pa// chos sbyid
175a1(mdo): sbyin pa las ser sna myed pa/ slob dpon gyi dpe' mkhyud dang bral ba// chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa// chos la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba// chos la gnas su 'dzind pa/ chos la
175a2(mdo): khu skyabs su 'dzind pa dpung gnyen du 'dzind pa/ chos la tond pa// chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pas nyes par 'byung ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa ste/ thabs la mkhas pa rtogs par
175a3(mdo): khong du chud pa yin no// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chen pos rnam par brtse zhing btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du myong lam ni bstan/ sngon gyi byang chub sems
175a4(mdo): dpa' 'jig rten gyi yu thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i chos nyid dang mthun par byas/ yun ri/ ngu po nas 'dod pa'i skyon shin tu rtogs pa yin yang / sems can
175a5(mdo): yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i dbang gis/ 'dod pa'i long spyod ni ku/ na tu bstanang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu byed pa brtsegs pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi khyad par gyis/ 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba
175a6(mdo): mtshungs pa myed pa ni kun tu bstan da// lha dang myi las sha ning tu'o das pa// snying po dang ldan zhing rgya che la rnam pa tha dad pa/ rnam pa sna tshog sa kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg mchog tu dga'
175a7(mdo): pa / nyams dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba ni bstand/ 'dod pa'i dka' ba'i yul thos cad la 'dzind pa myed par rang gi sems la dbang bskur ba ni bstand/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyi grogs su gyur da pa/ dge'
175a8(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pas yongs su smyind par byas nas/ 'jig rten kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyis ni/ sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi
175b1(mdo): nang na gnas te/ ji ltar 'gron gnyer ba'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smyind par byas pa'i dus la lta zhing / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rgya cher sngon gyi dam bcas pa rjes su dran no// sangs rgyas dang chos kyang
175b2(mdo): mngon du byed do// smon lam gyi stobs kyang mngon par sgrub po// sems can rnaMs la yang snying rje chen po gtong ngo // sems can rab tu tha dad par byas par yang sems so// 'byor da pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa
175b3(mdo): yin par yang so sor rtog go// 'khor ba la gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa mang po du mar yang rtog go// bdud dang nyes pa'i zhags pa yang yang dag par gcod do// 'khor ba'i rgyud las kyang bdag nyid 'ang bar byed do// mya/ 
175b4(mdo): ngan las 'das pa la yang sems yang dag par gtong ngo // dge slong/ dedag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas kyang 'khor pa'i skyon shin tu rig pa yin/ 'dus byas la bas pa zag pa nas don
175b5(mdo): du myi gnyer ba yin/ nye bar len pa'i yongs su 'dzi nad pa thams cad don tu myi gnyer ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos don du gnyer ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon tu phyogs 'khor pa la rgyab kyis lta ba
175b6(mdo): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la mngon tu dga' ba yin bdud kyi spyod yul dang ma 'dres pa yin/ srid pa la 'bar bar skyon du mthong ba yin/ khams gsu las byung ba mis can yin / 'khor ba'i skyon dang / 
175b7(mdo): nyes dmyigs dang byung ba las mkhas pa yin// rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa yin/ mngon par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/ dben pa la gzhol ba yin dben pa la bab pa yin/ dben pa la 'bab pa yin/ rgon pa dang bas
175b8(mdo): mthar mngon par dga' bya yin/ rab tu dben pas rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin/ bla na myed pa'i yon tan la dpa' ba yin/ 'jig rten la don tu 'dod pa yin/ phan par 'dod pa
176a1(mdo): pa yin/ bdel bar 'dod pa yin/ grub pa dang bde' bar 'dod pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin/ phan par 'dod pa can yin/ byams pa la gnas pa cam yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan/ 
176a2(mdo): pa yin/ bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin/ rtag tu yid yongs su myi skyo ba yin/ sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can thams cad bu rig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par
176a3(mdo): sems pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ dngos po thams cad la myi lta bar yongs su btang pa yin/ sbyin pa 'gyed pa la rga ba yin/ sdug par rtong pa yin/ lag pa brkyang ba yin/ gtong ba la dpal ma yin/ mchod sbyin
176a4(mdo): byas pa yin/ bsod nams shi nang tu phun gsum tshogs pa yin/ bsod nams kyi yo byad shand tu bzung ba yin/ dri ma dang ser sngar pa bral ba yin/ sems can du ma bzung ba yin/ bra na byer
176a5(mdo): pa'i sbyin bdag chen po yin/ byin nas kyang rnam par sbyid pa la myi re ba yin/ sbyin pa la dpa' ba yin/ 'dod pa dang 'dod pa chen po dang chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / 
176a6(mdo): gti mug dang / ser sna la rdzogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tsho gas phyir rgol ba thams cad char bcad pa'i phyir mngon par 'byung ba yin/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rgyun las myi g.yol ba yin/ gtong ba rtse
176a7(mdo): po'i sems kyi go cha shi nang du bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin/ phan pa 'dod pa can yin/ ya yang bkol ba can yin/ sems can rab tu tha dad par byas pa la dmyigs pa yin/ snying rje chen
176a8(mdo): po'i stobs dang rnam par gnon pa dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyir myi ldog pa yin/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/ rtong pa'i lag ca can yin/ sems can gyi bas pa dang re ba ji lta/ 
176b1(mdo): ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa yin/ byang chub kyi snod du gyur da pa yin/ dus dang phrad par chos rtogs pa yin/ smon lom byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin/ rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal ba yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag
176b2(mdo): ba'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon cha sra ba dang ldan pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i phyir rgol ba shi nad tu tshar gcod pa yin/ tshul khrims dang / yon tan dang / gyod pa la zhugs
176b3(mdo): pa yin/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' legs par bsrungs pa yin/ kha na ma tho pa phra ra pa tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin/ dri ma myed pa'i dri ma dang bral la/ dri ma
176b4(mdo): spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / brgyad pa dang / spyod pa dang / smad da pa dang / bshung ba dang / bdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang
176b5(mdo): gsad pa dang / bcing pa dang / bzung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis sems ma rnyogs pa yin/ sems ma dkrugs pa yin te/ pa zod pa dang nges pa phun sum 'tshogs pa yin/ gnod par myi
176b6(mdo): sems pa yin/ gnod par myi byed pa yin/ gnod sems myed pa sems dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thos cad la phan pa la bya ba'i brtson 'grus 'bar bar brtsams pa yin/ yi dam la brtan pa yin
176b7(mdo): dge' ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa la phyir myi ldog pa yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ shes bzhin can yin/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin/ sems ma yengs pa yin/ bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu yid la
176b8(mdo): byed pa yin/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ snang ba thob pa yin/ mun pa mun nag dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / myi sdug pa'i rnam par sems yongs su bsgoms
177a1(mdo): pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / chu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rgya chos sems cad gnad/ 
177a2(mdo): tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yid la byed pa yin/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gas shin tu dkar bar byas pa 'i blo dang ldan pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba yin/ bden pa rjes su rtogs par bya bas gzhan gyi dring
177a3(mdo): myi 'jog pa yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsu gyis rnam par brtse ba yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag cha dang / myig yor lta bur brtogs pa yin no// dge slong dag byang chub sems
177a4(mdo): dpa' ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis tsha la mnas che ba yin/ de ltar ye// shes la gnas pa yin/ de ltar yon tan gyi che ba nyid la gnas pa/ yin/ de ltar sems can gyi don la brtson par gnas pa yin te
177a5(mdo): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ byin gyis badz+ra bas pas/ sil snyan dang klu dbyangs las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad de dag gis/ rgya cher bskul ba dang / de'i tshe sngon gyi byang chub sems
177a6(mdo): dpal srid pa tham par gyu rad pa rnams kyis/ btsun mo la 'khor yongs su smyind par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo bzhi'i mngon du byed do// bzhi'i gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ma dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pa
177a7(mdo): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi le la sbyar ba/ sgrub pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsu gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzind pa 'i bsam brgyad kyi ba pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa 'i sems smon lam
177a8(mdo): kyi stobs bskyed pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / sems can thos cad yongs su myi btang ba'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i sems smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i yul zhes bya
177b1(mdo): ba'i chos kyi grang sgo stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / don la rnam par nges pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyi khyad par yang
177b2(mdo): dag par bsgrub pa/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpas chos kyi sgo bzhil po de dag mngon du byas nas/ btsun mo li 'khor thams cad yong su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i
177b3(mdo): tshe rnam pa ji lta bu li rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba/ mngon par 'du byas so// byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sim snyan dang / klu dbyangs de dag las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu brgya stong 'byung / de lta bu'i dzA
177b4(mdo): 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed do// mos pa rgya chen dang ni bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam ldan srog chags snying rje pa/ sa// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems bskyed zhes// de 'dra'i sgra dag
177b5(mdo): sil snyan rnams las byung / dang zhing dang dang sgom dang tshul khrims sgra// bzod pa'i sgra dang de bzhin brtson 'grus sgra/ bsam gtan mngon par smra ba dang ting 'dzi nad sma/ shes rab dang ni thabs kyi sgra ya
177b6(mdo): byung // / byams pa'i sgra dang de bzhin snying rje'i sgra// rga dang btang snyoms mngon par shes po'i sgra// / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi' po rnam nges pa// sems can yongs su sbyin bya'i sgra yang byung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rab dbye'i smra/ 
177b7(mdo): yang dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang // dbang po 'ang stobs lnga rab dbye pa// byang chub yan lag sgra ni sil snyan byung // yan lag brgyad pa li 'phags lam mchog dpel dang // zhi gnas sgra dang de bzhin lha mthong smra// myi
177b8(mdo): rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag byed sba// gyi sdug sgra yang sil snyan rngams las byung // 'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin dben pa'i sgra// bad pa'i sgra shes pa'i sgra dang kyi skye sla// 'gog pa'i sgra dngade bzhin gnas myed sla// 
178a1(mdo): ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang sil snyan byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub seMs dpa'i mthul yis ni// sil snyan dag la 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ste// sla de thos nas bud myed thos cad kyis// sems can mchog rab rjes bsag
178a2(mdo): byang chub smon / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mol 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pas// bud myed brgyad khri bzhi'i stong dang // lha'i bu brgyad khri stong mang po gang dag der 'dus par gyur da pa dag kyang
178a3(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yos su smyind par byas par gyur da to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung po'i dus la bab pa dang / dga' ldan kyi ris kyi lho'i bu khrel yod pa'i lha zhes
178a4(mdo): bya ba// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi/ de ldog pa des mtshan mo mya nyal tsam na// lha'i bu 'bum phrag sum bcu la rtsa gnyis kyis bskord cing mdun du pad rang te// byang chub
178a5(mdo): seMs dpa' la rim gror bya ba'i khang bzangs ka la ba der song ste/ phyi nad/ nas naM mkha'i dkyis na 'dug ste/ byang chub seMs dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// / shi 'pho ba ni shin tu bsaha nang / 
178a6(mdo): skyes bu seng ge tshe yang bstan// btsun mo'i 'khor yang bstand par mdzad// khyod kyis 'jig/ rten las mthun mdzad// 'jig rten chos ni rjes thob pas// lha myi mang po yongs sbyin mdzad// mngon par byung ba'i tho dgongs pa'i// 
178a7(mdo): de'i dus la de bab po// ma grol bas ni dgrol gyi rus// song bas lam yang ston myi nus// grol bas dgrol bar byed par nus// myig ldan long pa lam stonang nus// sems can gang dag 'dod pas 'kho yang // khyim nor bu
178a8(mdo): byabyadang chung ma chags// de dag khyod kyi rjes slob cing // mngon par 'byung bar bzhed par mdzod// dbang phyug 'dod pas brtse ba dang // gling bzhi la rin chen bdun spangs te// khyod ni mngon par byang rig nas// lha phyir bcas pa'i 'ji
178b1(mdo): rten mos// / khyod ni 'dod la gyi dges te// bsam gtan bde 'a bas gnas mdzad kyang // lA gyi brgya phrag mang po dag/ gnyid kyis log las sad par mdzad// dngal bab 'di gan su 'dal// rig pa pa'apa 'a chu ma kyog
178b2(mdo): 'gro bzhin// dpal ba pa pa yal gyur nas// mngon par 'byung ba mdzes ma lags// de srad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe// dang bapa dam par mngon byang ste// thugs dpa nyams 'og chung mdzod la// lha gyi don mdzad pa'i
178b3(mdo): rigs// 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi ngoms te// dpemad lan tsa'i rgya dang mtshungs// 'phags pa'i rdul byed 'jig rte nad 'das// shes rab gang ldan de dag ngoms// khyod 'dir rgyal po labs gtsang dang // yul 'khor
178b4(mdo): nas kyi yid 'ong sdug/ 'dab ma brgya'i zhal 'dra ba// mngon padar 'byung ba dgongs su gsol // nyon mongs gdung bas rab gdungs shing // 'byung myed bcings pas dam bcings rnams// dpa' cho
178b5(mdo): myur du mtshungs myed pa// zar lo zhi la rgongs su gsol// khyod na/ sman pa thabs la mkhas// sos can yun ring na nas la// chos kyi sman ni sbyar mdzad de// mya ngan 'das bde 'amyur du khong / 
178b6(mdo): myig myed mun pa gti muka klags// lta ba'i dra bas dkris pa li// lha dzas dang ni myi'i myig/ shes/ rab smon mas myur du sbyongs// byang chub thob pa blta bya zhing // bla na myed pa'i chos mnyan ces// lha dang lha
178b7(mdo): myin kru dag dang // gnod sbyin dri ba yang mo sdang // klu'i rgyal po rang gi gnas// khyod kyi dpal kyis sdang bar mthong // mchod pa dag ri mtha' yas bgyid// de la brtul shugs bas pa skongs// byang chub shing drung li
178b8(mdo): rdzogs la// lhung bzed bzhi'i ni dbul lo zhes// 'jig rten skyong bzhi'i sder bcas pa// de dag khyod la sdod cing mchis// tshangs pa rab tu zhi spyod la// byams ldan snying rje thob pa yang // bla myed 'khor lo rab
179a1(mdo): bskor da pa// myi dbang gsol snyam sdod cing mchis// byang chub bsnyer bkur byed pa'i lha// byang chub snying por gnas rnams kyang // byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba// lta'o zhes te sdod cing mchis// 
179a2(mdo): byang chub seMs dpa' btsun mo'i ning // bya ba stond pa gzhan yang mchis// de ltar thog mar khyod gyur da mdzod// de dag 'og tu lus sa re// dbyangs snyan cing ni dbyangs 'jam pa// mar me mdzad kyi lung ba ha nad rgongs
179a3(mdo): yang dag de bzhin ma nor pa// rgyal ba'i dbyangs sgra bsgrag tu gsol// bskul pa'i le'u ste/ bcul gsum pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar lha 'i bu de dag gis byang chub seMs dpa' bskul
179a4(mdo): ma thag tu// rgyal po zas gtsang ma lo mye ltas 'di bstand to// rgyal po zas gtsang ma go nyid kyis log pa'i rmyi lam du byis pa/ nga chub sems dpa' mtshan mo myi nyal tsam na/ lha'i tshogs kyis
179a5(mdo): bskor da te// mngon par byung zhing mngon par byung nas kyang / rab tu byung ste/ gos ngur skyigs gon po rgyas so// de nas de sad pa dang rings par nyung rum lo dris pa/ gzhon nu btsun mol 'khor gyi nang / 
179a6(mdo): na 'dug gam/ des smras pa/ lha bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sos so// gzhon nu ni gdon myi za bar mngon par 'byung bar gyur da te// snga ltas su snang ba ni 'di dag yin snyam nas/ khong
179a7(mdo): ba'i snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par gyu rad to// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu ni skyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang 'gro ba myi 'gyur te// bud myed kyi tshogs kyi nang na mngon par dga' bas 'di
179a8(mdo): nyid du chags par 'gyur te/ mngon par 'byung bar ni myi 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu longs spyod kyi phyir/ dpyid dang dbyar dang stond kyi dus ji lta ba bzhin du khang bzangs gsu byed du bcug
179b1(mdo): go// de la dbyid sa gang yin pa de ni gne tu bsi lad pa'o// dbyangs gang yin pa de ni drang bro ngan pa'o// zhun sa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin gis dro ba'o// khang pa'angs re re'i bu smras rnams kyang gyi lnga brgya lnga
179b2(mdo): brgyas 'dugs shing 'bebs so// de dag de ltar 'dzugs shing 'bebs pa na gzhon nu sus kyang ma chor bar mngon par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes skra dpag tshad phyed du zag pa byung ngo // ltas pa dang mtshan
179b3(mdo): mkhan kun gyis kyang // gzhon nu chab kyi sgo kla shis pa nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes yung bstan to// de nas rgyal pos kra shis kyi sgo 'phar chen po byed du bcug ste/ sgo 'phar re re yang lnga brgya lnga brgya
179b4(mdo): 'bed cing gcod do// de dag gi sgra yang dpag tshad phyed du grag/ ko// de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa myed pa yang sbyar ro// klu dang rol mo'i skra dbyangs lend pa dang / kar byed pa'in chub
179b5(mdo): dag kyang rtag tu gzhag par gyur da to// dge slong dag de nas bya/ nga chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ deng skyed mos/ tshal gyi sar 'gros shi parta myur du sbyor cig/ de nas kha lo sbyar
179b6(mdo): pa rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du song ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// lha gzhon nu bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byang ngo // zhes gsung ngo po/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gis gzhon nu/ 
179b7(mdo): bskyed mos tshal gyis mnam yang ma phyung bas/ sa bzang po palte bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar phyung nas/ 'on kyang gzhon nu bud byed kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ rga ba myong bar 'gyur bas mad+mo pa
179b8(mdo): myi 'byung ngo snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpa' la byas pa dpar ma gro byed pas/ da ste zhag bdun na gzhon mus bzang po lta ba'i phyir/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung gis/ der khyed kyis
180a1(mdo): gzhon nu myig tu myi 'ong bar mthong bar myi 'gyur bar/ yid du kyi 'ong ba thams cad ni sol cig/ yid du 'ong ba dang yul nyams dga' ba zas cad ni spyor cig ces grong khyer du dril bsgrags so// de nas zha
180a2(mdo): bdun gyi nyin par grong khyer thams cad brgya nad to// bskyed mos tshal yang mdzes par byas te/ ras bcos bu kha dog tha dad pa'i bla re ni bres/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis ni legs par brgya nad to// 
180a3(mdo): bya chub seMs dpal lam ga paras 'gro ba'i lam de yang chag chag btab ste/ phyags nas spos chu'i chag chag btab ste/ me tog sil ma ni chal bar bkram/ spos bor nas ni bdugs/ bum pa gang bas ni mdzes
180a4(mdo): par byas// chu shing ljon pas ni bsgreng / dang tha dad pa'i tshogs kyis bla re bres rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka dra ba dang / brgya nad 'phreng dang // chun po ni sbyangs/ dpung bzhi'i bkod pa'i bya ba byas so// 
180a5(mdo): g.yog 'khor dang gzhon nu'i btsun mo li 'khor brgya nad pa'i phyir/ brtson par gyur da to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen/ pos// grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas bskyed mos tshal
180a6(mdo): gyi sar byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kying mthus gne sa gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// myi dgan po gdugs pa/ 'azhogs pa/ lus la rtsa rgyus 'thond pa/ so rga lad pa/ delus
180a7(mdo): gnyer mas gang pa/ sgra byi ba/ skur pa/ rdung rten ltar dgu' ba zhom pa/ 'khar shing la brtend pa/ mthu' zad pa/ dar yal pa/ myi pa nas sgra ngang dang por 'byung ba/ lus rgu bas 'khar pa la brten
180a8(mdo): nas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dar ba zhig lam bstand to// / de nas byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du 'alo sbyar pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba gyi 'di nyams chung zhing // sha khrag sapa
180b1(mdo): pa rgyas pags nyi ces dkris// mgo rkang so gal mus ni rab skyems la// khar pa brten cing kyi bde la 'khyor 'gro su// kha lo sbyar bas smras pa// ga cig kyi 'dags pas yis kyis rdo dang // dbang po nyam
180b2(mdo): shing sdug bsngal bamod stobs nyams// gnyen gyi skye bo brnyas shing mgon myed gyur// don bgyid myi nus nags khrod shing ltar po pa// byang chub sems dpas spras pa// 'di'i chos 'di rigs kyi yin ram 'od ta ma
180b3(mdo): ni// 'gro ba 'di kun la yang 'di srid da spros shig/ tshig 'di yang dag ji skad myur du smos shig dang // zos nas de bzhin don la 'dir ni tshul bzhin bsam// kha lo sbyar bas sbas pa// lha 'odi rigs
180b4(mdo): chos ma lags yul 'khor chos ma lags// skye bo kun da kyi dpal bab pa rga bas 'joms// khyod kyi yab dang yum dang nye nga du gnyen tshogs kyang // rgas las ma tha rad 'gro ba'i thabs/ 
180b5(mdo): ni gzhan ma mchis// byang chub sems dpas spros pa// kha lo sgyur ba byis sa'i skye bos myi mkhas pa'i// blo dan+t+ra gzhon pasargyags shing myos pas rgam mthong // nga'i slar 'gro nga'i shing rta
180b6(mdo): myur du sbyar// nga yang rgal gnas pa brtse rgas ci zhig bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur / tsho thong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na
180b7(mdo): bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam ka na myi nad kyis nyen pa dang / dmu rdzing can/ lus nyams chung ba/ rang gi gcin rkyag tu bying ba/ 'gon byed pa/ 
180b8(mdo): skyabs byed pa/ shin tu sha zad pa/ dbugs 'byung zhing brtsu ba rkos pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang / yang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du/ kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// / kha lo sgyur ba myi rtsub
181a1(mdo): mngon dang rmongs dang gling dang dpung gachen ma mchis lags/ byang chub ses rapas smras pa/ 'ang med pa yang rmi len gyi dang mtshungs/ rab kyi 'jigs pa 'di ltar shin du mi 'bang sa
181a2(mdo): lus kyi mdog ngan la// dbang po thams cad nyams shing dbugs 'byung rab tu dkal// yan lag kun skams stobs dkrugs shing nyams thag kyu rang // rang gi kacin rtug smad pa'i gnas na 'dug 'di su// kha lo
181a3(mdo): Dasbyar bas smras pa/ lha cig myi 'di shi nad tu nad kyis btab pa ste// nad kyi 'jigs pa nye bar mchis mgum la thug nas myed// gzi' brjid mchis stobs kyang rnam par nyams// skyes bu mkhas pas gnas 'di mthong
181a4(mdo): nas ji ltar pur// rtse la rga dang sdug bsngal 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpya' gshing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang
181a5(mdo): chu pa seMs dpa' dus gzhan zhig na bkod pa chen pos grong khyer kyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas bskyed mos tshal gyi sbyar wAg+ma g+haM pa dang / des lam ka nas myi shi bar gyur da pa/ khyogs la bzhag pa/ ras kyi pra
181a6(mdo): ri phub pa/ nye du'i tshogs kyis bskor da te kun kyang bya zhing skad phyung/ ste/ dra sa smre sngags 'don cing sba bshig la/ mgo langs 'gro/ ma zhing thang rdung la cho nge 'dod pa phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa mthong
181a7(mdo): ngo // mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sos dpas shes bzhin du/ kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba myi 'di khyogs la bzhag na sa mi// myi dag skra bshig mgo' las ni 'thor byed cing // sna tshog
181a8(mdo): dag gi tshig ni rjod la brang rdung bas// kun nas skor ba byas te khyer pa su zhig yin// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig myi 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du kum pa ste// slan chad pa ma mchis brang bu rnams mthong myi 'gyur// longs
181a9(mdo): spyod khyim dang mdza' gnyen tshogs rnams spangs nas mi// 'jig rten pha rol mchil te slan chad gnyen myi mthong // byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rga bas gnod par gyurd pa'i gzhon nu pa cir myi rung // sna tshogs nad kyis/ 
181b1(mdo): gnod kyang nang byed par gyi chung // ridrin kyi gnas gdon la mkhas sacir gyi drung // gal chags pa skyes bu mkhams cidang phyi rung // gang teg skyed dang byed 'ami ba byed kyar dkya // 'od kyang thung po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal ma
181b2(mdo): no// rgan 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba smos ci dgos/ legs par zag bzlog rab tu ma rang par bya ba bsam// dge slong dag sa nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta mchog de slar bzlog ste byir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dag
181b3(mdo): slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na/ grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus/ lha'i bu de dag gis lam ka der dge slong zhig mngon
181b4(mdo): par sprul pa dang / byang chub seMs dpas dge slong zhi ba dul ba yang dag par bsdams pa tshangs par spyod pa/ myig phab pa/ gnyal shing gang tsam du lta ba gyod lam mdzes pa/ 'gro ba dang ldog
181b5(mdo): pa mdzes pa phun gsum 'tshogs pa mdun du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yon lta ba mdzes pa chos gos sngam sbyar dang / lhung bze/ da dang / chos gos thogs pa/ mdzes pa zhig sa ma ka 'dug pa
181b6(mdo): de yong // yong das kyang byang chul sems dpa gas pa nyi sug po sbyar ba sa 'di ska kyis smras so// 'aso myung ba skyes thams na chen dpo// myigasapa 'chos gtul zhi ga sams byed cing
181b7(mdo): spyug kos gon shin tu rab tu zhi bar gyod// lhung bzed thogs nas myi dgod mkhyengs su zhig yin// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig myi 'di dge slong zhes ni bgyi ba lags// 'dod pa'irga pa spangs zhing shi nad tu dul
181b8(mdo): bar spyod// bdag nyid zhi ba tshol zhing rab tu byung bar gyurang // 'dod chags zhe sdang bral bar bsod snyoms spyod cing rgyu// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di ni dge bar legs smras pa yang 'dod pa ste// rab
182a1(mdo): tu byung ba mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags// de ni bzhag la phan zhing sems cad gzhan la phan// 'tsho ba bdel zhing nyam sa mthun 'chi myed 'bras bur gyur // dge slong de nas byang chub sos
182a2(mdo): dpa' shing rta mchog de slar bsgyur te/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la bskul pa 'di lta bu 'di 'dag/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas mthong zhing zos nas/ byang chub sems
182a3(mdo): dpal yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ ra pa rgya chen po byed du bcug ste/ 'obs kyang rkor bcug/ sgo brtan pa yang 'dzugs su bcug/ srungs ma yang bkod dpa' bo rnams kyang sbran bzhon pa yang sta kon byas/ 
182a4(mdo): go cha yang gon du bcug go// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ grong khyer chen po'i sgo bzhi'i lam gyi mngon gsum rnams su// dpung chen po bkod pa bzhag pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung
182a5(mdo): nga re zhes de dag de bsrung du bcug go// / btsun mo li 'khor la/ yang res 'gal tsam yang / klu dbyangs kyi rgyun chad da re/ dkal ba/ dang brtse pa thams cad kyang sbyor cig/ ci nas kyang gzhon nu
182a6(mdo): chags nas rab tu byung bar gyi 'gyur ba dang / mgu mar gyur par bud myed kyi rgyu yang stodad cig ces bsgo'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// / zab mo mos pa'i skyes bu la ga na ral gro mtshon thogs sde
182a7(mdo): par bkod// go bgos myi rtag kla tsanas kyis rgya rnams sa// 'obs dang shing thags dka dang rma babs phyi re mthon po 'ang byed du bcug/ sgo mo rgya sa grags grag pa'i sgra byung ba yang brtan pa dam por bcu ga/ 
182a8(mdo): shag kya'i tshogs rnams thams cad yid myi dga' zhing nyin mtshan srung bar byed// dpung chen de dag rnams kyang sgra skad chen po sha nid du grag par byed// nges par 'di nas 'byung du 'ong zhes grong khyer 'jug shing yid
182b1(mdo): sngangs skrag/ shag kya'i rigs skyes song na rigs 'di chad par myi 'gyur grang snyam byed// skye bo bud myed dag la bsko ba rtag tu klu dbyangs rgyun ma chad// brtse bas dga' ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur gyis shig yid kyang
182b2(mdo): mgu' bar gyis// bud myed sgyu za bas spyod pa gang yin rnam pa mang po stond// nges pa 'gror myi 'gyur bar bsrung bar byos shing bkyegs kyang rab tu byos// kha lo sgyur bas mchog de mtshon par 'byung ba'i snga ltas
182b3(mdo): 'di dag ste// ngang pa khrung khrung dag dang rma bya ri skyegs dag dang ne tso rnams// khang bzung skar khung rta pabs mchog dang yang thog khri la 'khod nas ni// dman zhing dman la myi rka kyi bde la mgo' spad sems shing
182b4(mdo): sba myi 'byind// rdzing dang rdzing chen dag gi pad ma dag kyang rnyid par gyur da// shing ljon skams shing yal ka me tog lhags pa me togadaslar myi chags// pi pang klang pu rgyad gsum rgyud kyis brgya
182b5(mdo): pa de tshe gling bur chad// rnga dang rdza rnga dag kyang lag pas brdungs nas 'chag cing sgra myi 'byinang // grong khyer de dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyurd cing shi nad tu ka nyid kyis no dang // gang gi yid kyang klu
182b6(mdo): dbyangs lend dang gar byed pa la rgab myed// rgyal po'ang mchog tu rab tu yid dman gyurd te sems khongs su ni chud cing 'dug/ e ma ma rung shag rigs rdzu 'phrul rgya chen myi tshig kang snyam byed// sa mtsho'am
182b7(mdo): dang rgyal bu lam cig na ni nyal zhing 'khod pa'i tshe// nam phyed tsam mas mtsho' ma'i rmyi lam du ni 'di dag spyis// sa 'di thams cad rtse mor ldan pa'i ri dang bcas te g.yos par gyur // shing ljon rnams kyang rlung
182b8(mdo): gis bskyod nas rtsa nas 'thon de sa la 'gyel// nyi ma zla ba skar ma'i rgyan dang bcas te mkhral las sa Ung // lag pa g.yon pas skra yang ra \u0f7f 'bal zhing cod pan lhang mthong // lag pa chad la bzhag
183a1(mdo): rkang pa 'ang chad cing bdag ni sgren mor mthong // bdag gi mu tig dor shal nor bu gser gyi 'od dpag chad pa mthong // nyal khri de'i rkang pa bzhi la chag sa'i steng na nyal ba mthong // rgyal po'i gdugs kyi yu
183a2(mdo): smras pa dpal ldan mdzes pa chag par mthong / rgyan rnams kun kyang rnam par thor da cing chu yis khyer bar gyur da pa dang // khyim zab rgyan dang gos dang cod pan bcas te mal steng 'thod pa mthong // grong khyer dag nas me sgron
183a3(mdo): phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non pa dang // rin po che las byas pa'i dra ba mdzes pa'ang chad par gyurd pa rgyas// mu tig do shal 'phyang ba ltung nas rgyal mtshol chen po dkrugs pa dang // de 'i tshe no ri'i rgyal po ra rab
183a4(mdo): gnas nas g.yos pa rmis// shag kya'i rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra 'di ga rmyis gyur da nas// de sad dmyig nas mchilam gzag cing rang gi khyos 'di skad smras// lha cig rang gi rmyi lam 'di 'dra byis pa cir 'gyur
183a5(mdo): ba ni bka' rtsold cig// padag ni dran pa 'khrul cig myig kyang / 'khrul la yid ni mya ngan non// de yis de thos ka la bying ka'idza/ sgra tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan pas// sa mtsho lam la spras pa/ 
183a6(mdo): khyod na rab tu dgar gyur da sdig myed// sems can gang dag bsod nams sngon s+yad de dag rmyi lam 'di 'ad myi// sdug bsngal du mas nyen pa rmyi lam 'di 'dra skyib gang la yod// khyod kyis sa ni rab tu g.yos pa dang // 
183a7(mdo): ri rtser bcas te sa la ltung skyes pa// lha dang klu dang srin po 'byung po tshogs// kun gyis khyod mchod rtso bor byed par 'gyur// khyod kyis shing rnams rtsa nas bton rgyas gang lag pa g.yon pas ska 'bal byis
183a8(mdo): bris na// sa mcho' myur tu nyon mongs dra ba bcad// 'dus byas dag las lta ba'i dra ba 'byind khyod kyis nyi bris ltung myos shing // skar ma rnams kyang ltung ba byis pa ni// sa mtshol gyur du nyon mongs dgra bcom ste/ 
183b1(mdo): khyod ni 'jig rten mchod pa bsngags par gyurd// khyod kyis mu tika do shal mthor gyis shing // lus kun chad dang sgren mo rgyas pa ni// sa mtsho 'gyur du bud myed lus spangs te// ring po myi thogs skyes pa'i lus
183b2(mdo): su gyur // khyod kyi khri rkang chag par myos pa dang // gdugs yu rin chen spras pa chag rgyas pa// sa mtsho'i myur du chu bo bzhi la dag la zhing // nga ni 'jig rten gdugs cig 'gyur pa mthong // khyod kyis// 
183b3(mdo): na rnams chus khyer myos pa dang // nga'i kos dang cod pan khri stengs myis// sa mtshol myur du mtshan gyis brgya nad nas ni// 'jig rten kun kyis pas stod par mthong // khyod kyis ma re brgya phrag byed pa dag/ grong
183b4(mdo): khyer byung nas mun nag gyur da rmis pa// sa mtsho myur du ma rig rmongs pa'i mun// 'jig rten kun la shes rab snang byed 'gyur// khyod kyis mu tig do shal chad pa dang // kaser gi tshong tshong
183b5(mdo): spras pa chad myos pa// sa mtsho la myur du nyon mongs dra bcad// de// 'du bya dag las 'du shes skur pa 'byind// sa mtsho lagang phyir nga la gus par ni// rtag tu rim gro mchog gis
183b6(mdo): mchod byed na// khyod la ngan 'gro myed cing mya ngan myed// myur tu dga' zhing mchog tu dka' ba thob// ngas ni sngon chad sbyin pa gya nom byin// tshul khrims srung zhing rtag tu bzod pa bsgom// de bas
183b7(mdo): dad pa ngal gang rnyed pa// de dag thams cad dga' zhing rab dga' rnyed// 'khor bar bskal bye ba mtha' yas su// ngas ni byang chub lam mchog rnam par byang // de bas pa la dad par gang byed
183b8(mdo): pa// de dag thams cad ngan song gsum po cad// zhapa thob kyis kyi dga' ma byed cig/ tshim pa thob par gyis la mgu' skyed cig/ rgab mchog tu dgal ba myur lob ste// khyod kyi rtsi
184a1(mdo): ltas pabang gis sa mtsho' nyol// sngon chad dgel pa'i las ni yang dag pa rtsegs kyu rad pa// myi mchog rnams ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab tshe// mtshan ma 'di dag bsod nams gzi' brjid
184a2(mdo): bsags pa dang // dpal gyi gzi' brjid snying po can des rmis par gyur da// de ni rkang pa dag dang lag pa chen po yis// rgya mtsho la chen po bzhi po dag gi chu dkrugs dang // sa 'di thos cad sna tshogs la char
184a3(mdo): gyurd pa dang // ri 'o lhun po mchog kyang sngas su gyur pa mi// rmi lam na ni 'od rab bkye bas 'jig rten ma// mur pa mun nag chen po rnam par bsal ba dang // sa las gdugs cig phyung bas 'jig rten
184a4(mdo): gsu khya ba dang / 'od kyis reg pas log ltung sdug bsngal rab ni mi// kar nag srog chags bzhi la zhig rkang pa ldag pa dang // kha tog bzhi pa'i bya 'ongs khwa cig gyurang dang // mchog du
184a5(mdo): ngan pa smad pa ngan skyugs ril 'ang/ 'dzegs nas 'dra yang de na rko sa pa myed pa rmas// rmi lam na ni rgya bo'i rgya'i sa rab gang nas/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba la// de la gyur
184a6(mdo): byas bsgral te gzhan dag bsgral nas ni// de yis 'jigs myed mya ngan te/ chog zang bkod mi// mi lam na ni nad pa mang po nad btab pa// nad myed gzil brjid bral zhing stobs kyang nyams rnams la/ 
184a7(mdo): de ni sprind par gyurarang nas ci sman mang byed pas// nad btab sos can khrag khrig mang po zang byed cing // ri rab ngos la se pa ke'i khri la 'dug nas mi// slob ma thal mo sbyar cing lha dzas phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni
184a8(mdo): g.yul las rgyal zhing sta rnaMs ra mkhal las// kun tu smra sgrogs pa ni rmi lam mi// kra shis rtul shugs bzang po yongasu rdzogs par yang // byang chub seMs dpal rmi lam de dag mi// de zos nas ni 'di ni
184b1(mdo): gas par/ rgyal snar 'gyur sas zhes kyi gakyilas kyi la ste largyal bzhi ba'o// ge slong na
184b2(mdo): rgyab sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la yang ma byas shing // pas gnang pa myed par mngon par 'byung bar 'di dag ni bdag la myi rigs te// byas pa bzol pa ma yid par
184b3(mdo): 'gyur ro snyam nas// de mtshan mo mya nyel tsam na// rtarang gi gnas kyi khang pa zangs nas byung ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khang bzangasu phyi nang te 'dug go// byang chub sems dpal 'dug ma thag ma tu// 'ang
184b4(mdo): bzangs thams cad 'od kyis gsal bar gyurd to// de nas rgyal po sad pa dang 'od de mthong ste// mthong nas kyang myur pa myur bar nyung rum sa smras pa/ kye nyung rum ni nyi pa shar tam/ gang gis na 'odal
184b5(mdo): 'od kyis na par mdzes// nyung ngus kyis smras pa/ ska da dung dgu/ nga byed kyang ma 'das so// lha gzhan yang nyi ma'i 'od ni shing dang cig pa zal mye phyi nad// lus la gdung ba bgyid cing tsha
184b6(mdo): rab tu bgyid// nang par dus na ngang pa dag dang s+ya bya dang // ne tsho khu byug rung pa da rung sgra 'byind// 'od 'di lha'i yid du mchil zhing bdel ba ste// rab tu sems bgying dgel bgyi gdung bar bgying ma
184b7(mdo): khags// shing dang rtsig pa thal byang sgrib pa yod ma mchis// yon tan ldan pa gcig gcig der ni 'dir byo nad ces// rgyal po de ni myi dga' phyogs bcur bltas pa dang // sems can dag pad ma'i myig can
184b8(mdo): de mthong nas// de ni mal nas ldang par 'dod na ma nus te// rdo dag blo can dam pa pha la gus pa bskyed// de ni rgyal po'i mdun na 'dug nas 'di skad smras// lha tsog bdag ni mngon par byung ba'i dus pa po rags// 
185a1(mdo): glegs kyang ma mdzad myi dges pa yang ma mdzad cig/ rgyal po gnyenabacas yul 'khor bcas te bzod par mdzod// rgyal po de ni mchi lams myig gang 'di skad smras// khyod ni phyir myi ldog pa rkos
185a2(mdo): ci zhig yod// bdag de pra'i song spos shig mas cad sbyin// bdag dang pho prab 'khor dang yul 'khor 'di phan cad thogs// de tshe byang chub sos dpal snyan pa'i tshig smras pa// lha cig dam pa bzhi la 'tshal de ni bdag la rtso/ 
185a3(mdo): gas te yul pa spyod na mang 'di khyod la mchis/ 'on tang rtag tu khyis na gzigs shis 'byung gyi 'gyur// sa cig bdag ni dga' bas tshugs par myi 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mdog pa'angs dpal pa' ma/ 
185a4(mdo): gnas pa dang // nad ma mchis pa thob cing nad kyis myi btab dang / tshe dpag ma mchis pa dang rgud par myi 'gyur 'tshal// rgyal pos kyi ka zos shin tu sdug bsngal nyams zag ste// gzhon nu gnas myi spro
185a5(mdo): pas bdag la mnu' byed do// skal par gnas pa'i drang srong na sa kyang dam du yang // rgan 'chil bol 'jigs dang rgud las ma tha to// rka na 'tsho po'i 'jigs dang rgud par gyi 'gyur ba// lA cig/ 
185a6(mdo): gal te mchog pa ni la 'di dag kyi tsa lang na// gzhan yang mchogacig gsol gyis rgyal pos gsan du gsolang // 'di nas shi 'phos nyid mtshams spyod par mdzod// kye'i dam pa'i tshig ni de skad zos pa dang // med
185a7(mdo): bsrams te phul chags pa yongs su gcod// pan byed 'gro ba ya byed rje su yi rang ngo // khyod kyi bas pa rnams ni yong su rdzogs gyur da cig/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub seMs dpa' slar song ste/ rang gi/ 
185a8(mdo): khyim du phyi nad nas mal na 'dug pa dang // de song pa 'am 'ongs par sus kyang ma sor ro// dge slong de'i nanangs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsa mas shag kya'i tshogs mos cad bsogs te// de'i lo rgyus rdos spos nas/ 
185b1(mdo): gzhon nu mngon par phyung na/ da ni ji ltar bya zhes smras so// shag kya rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bsrung par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shag kya'i cho ga su 'di ni med la/ de ni gcig pur gyur da pas/ mthus mngon par/ 
185b2(mdo): 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa de la ma mchis so// de nas shag kya de dag dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas shag kya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa 'os su gyurd pa/ 'phong bslabs pa/ tshan po che chen po 'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga
185b3(mdo): brgya/ byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor bkod de/ byang chub seMs dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir// shag kya gzhon nu re re la 'ang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya dang / shing rta re re la yang 'khor/ 
185b4(mdo): dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// byang chubo sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin du grong khyer gyi lho dang nub dang byang gi sgor yang shag kya gzhon nu 'thab chos la sbyangs pa 'os su gyur da pa/ 
185b5(mdo): 'bod bslabs pa/ tshan po che chen po stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya la lnga brgya dang / shag kya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing rta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya
185b6(mdo): bkod do// byang chub sos dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ shag kya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyang lam gyi bzhi'i mdol dang / su mdol dang / lam po me mang po zas cad na 'khod do// rgyal po bas gtsang ma yang shag kya gzhor
185b7(mdo): nu lnga brgyas bsko ra cing mdun gyis bltas te/ rta dang glang po che dag la gzhon nus rang gi khyim sgo na mel tshe byed do// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ko 'u ta myis kyang rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smras pa/ mar me dri
185b8(mdo): ma myed pa pus la nor bu rgyal mtshan rtse mor thogs// mu tig rgyan 'phreng rdos kyang sbyongs la khyim 'di kun tu 'od kyis sdang bar byas// klu dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la do mod g.yel pa myed par mel tse dam du gyis// gzhon nu
186a1(mdo): ci nas ma tshor bar ni 'gro bar myi 'gyur tshul du srung bar gyis// go bgos lag na lag cha ral gri ma dung thung da mtshon ma rtse gnyis thog/ sdug pa'i bu ni bsrung par b+ha ba'i phyir// kun kyang rab tu bsgrim
186a2(mdo): pa chen po gyis// sgo kun chod la gtan pa dam du chug/ sgo 'phar sra brkyed par rtan chu ga la// dus la ma bab par ni sgom dbyel// seMs can dam pa 'di ni shor ta re// nor bu do shal mu tig do shal thogs// 
186a3(mdo): me tog zla gam seng ge shing lo ra si// ska rags sor rngu pa rna rgyan chings shing thogs// rkang rda pa dag kyang shin du legs par thogs// lho mye'i phan pa glang po'i dregs bzhin 'gro// gal te klo pur mngon par byung nga re// tsin+da
186a4(mdo): myi bde 'a rnyed par ma gyurd par// de lta de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig/ bud myed gang dag mdung zung thogs pa dag/ dri ma myed pa mal na 'dug pa bskor nga // ci nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyurd par// phe// 
186a5(mdo): ma leb bzhin myig gis bsrung bar gyis// rgyal bu 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba 'i phyir// khyim 'dir dri ma myed pa mal na 'dug pa bskor nga kring bu dag kyang rab tu bud cing long // do nub rdul dang bral ba bsrung bar/ 
186a6(mdo): gyis// phan tshun gcig la gcig ni sman gyis te// do nu pa ma nyal shin tu bsrung ba gyis// rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spangs nas su// phyi ma nas mngon du rtswar gyurd te re// 'di ni mngon par byur bar gyur da na ko// rgyal
186a7(mdo): po'i pho brang 'di kun nyams myi dka'// rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun ring gnas pa yang // rgyal po laH rigs kyi rgyud ni chad par gyur // dge slong dag de nas gnod spyad kyi sde dpon chen po nya shu rtsa brgyad dang // 'phrog ma'i bu
186a8(mdo): lnga brgya rdos gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag do mod byang chub seMs dpa' mngon par 'byung gyis// khyed cag de la mchod pa byed pa'i las la spro ba gis shig// rgyal po chen po bzhi la yang
186b1(mdo): lcang lo can gyi pho brang du zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin kyi 'khor chen po la smras pa// grogs po dag/ dos di byang chub sems dpal mngon par 'byung gis// khyed kyis bcings pa'i rka lag nas theg pa la 'byung bar/ 
186b2(mdo): gyis shig// gnod sbyin gis 'khor gyis smras pa// sku ni sred myed bu'i stobs ldan rdo rje lta bus myi phyed sral sti// sos can kun gyi dam pa de ni brtson 'grus stobs ldan g.yol ba myi mnga' ste// r-i'i dam pa
186b3(mdo): lhun po chen po rmang nas phyung ste nem bzhal gzung nas kyi// rgyal po'i yon tan lhun po ri lci bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus kyang gang du bkur myi nus// rnam thos kyi bus smras pa// myi ga pang rgyal 'gying ba de
186b4(mdo): la ston pa lci// gang dag dga' mgus gnas pa de dag yang bar tshor// bsam pa thag pas brtson 'grus byos la gus pa yis// bya'i sha kham bzhin du yang dag shes par gyis// kho bo mdun nus 'gro'is / 
186b5(mdo): khyed cag rnaMs kyis bcings pa theg/ byang chub seMs dpa' mngon pa// ra 'byung tshe bsod nas mang po sogs// dge slong dag de nas/ lho'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// su bcu la rtsa gsu gyi lha rnams la
186b6(mdo): smras pa// kye grogs po dag do mdo byang chub sos dpa' mngon par 'bye nga gise/ de la khyed thos cad mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras
186b7(mdo): so// bdag gis ni ser skya'i grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang bud myed dang / khye'u dang bu mo thas cad ga nyid kyis log par bgyi'o// lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pa zhes bya bas 'di skad smras so// bdag gis ni rta dang klang
186b8(mdo): po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ba la pa dang / ma he dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dzas kyi sgra myi grag par bgyi'o// lha'i bu bkod pa'i glo gros shes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// bdag
186b9(mdo): gis na mkha'i dkyil la shing rta chen po bdun rin po che'i stegs pus 'khor par bskor pa// nor bu rin po che me shel gyi 'od 'bar ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgre pa/ me tog sna tshogs chal bar bkra ba
187a1(mdo): pog bor nas gdug spos sna tshogs kyis btugs pa dag/ byang chub seMs dpa' lam gang nas byung ba'i lam der bkod par bgyi'o// klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so// 
187a2(mdo): bdag gis ni bdag nyid kyi sna la khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tshad su bcu la rtsa gnyis pa bgyis te/ der lha'i bu mo dag bkod la sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs len du stsald cing glu dang rol lo la dbyangs sgra chen pos

187a4(mdo): 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni btsun mo li 'khor rnaMs myi sdug par btam par bkyi'o// lha'i bu yan dag sU kaM gyis smras pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub ses dpal gzims mal nas bzhengs pa gsol

187a6(mdo): cag gse ni byang chub seMs dpal la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ dus kyi rje su 'brang ba'i tshan dan gyi spri mngon par sprul te/ tsan dang sbrul gyi snying po'i phyi ma char dbab bo// dge slong dag de ltar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin du
187a7(mdo): de nas kyis ngas pa 'di lta bu bsas zhing mngon du byed do// byang chub sos dpal chos sems pa la zhugs pa/ klu dbyangs len pa'i khang pa'angs nas/ bal ba del ba la 'dug pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dpar 'dug pa ni/ 
187a8(mdo): sdong gi sangs rgyas kyi gyod pa rnaMs la sems shing sos can la phan par bya ba rde su sos yang / sngon gi smon las kyi tshig bzhi la mngon du byed do// bzhi'i gang zhed / sdod parang byung gi bdag po 'dod cing zas cad mkhyen pa nyid
187b1(mdo): don du gnyer ba na go cha 'di lta bu bgos par gyur da te/ seMs can sdug bsngal pa dag mthong nas// khye ma lo bdag gis 'jig rten na gnas pa dag bcings te/ 'khor pa'i btson ra chen por bcug pa la// 'khor ba'i
187b2(mdo): btson ra dral te bcings pa bkrol po'i sgra sgrog go// sred pa'i zhags dang / sgrog dam pos bcings pa'i sems can rnaMs kyang rab tu dkrol lo zhes bya ba sngon gi smon laM gyi tshig dang po 'di mngon tu gyurd to// kye ma'o bdag

187b8(mdo): 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur da pa// gru bu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur da pa/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur da pa// 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang / 'jig rten pha rol nas 'dzag rten 'dir kun rgyud cing 'khor la/
