188b7(mdo): 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'bying ba ste/ glang po che chur byib pa dang mtshungaso// 'din byis pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/ btson ra li nang gi btson bcas pa dang mtshungs so// 'di ni byis pa de dag ni mngon par dka' ba ste/ 
188b8(mdo): phag myi rtsad pa la dga' ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/ khyi kyeng rus la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byas pa de dag ni rab tu ltung ba ste/ phye ma leb mar me'i me lcer lhung pa dang mtshud so// 
189a1(mdo): 'di na byis pa thams cad thogs pa ste/ spre'u rtog la thogs pa dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag ni yongs su gdung ba ste nya rgyas zin pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs btubs pa ste/ shA 'tshong
189a2(mdo): ki gnas kyi yug dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btsugs pa ste/ sdig pa byed pa gsal shing rtse mo la btsugs pa dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag 'byeng zhing logs pa ste/ glang po che gang po 'dam du song ba dang
189a3(mdo): mazungs so// 'di sa byis pa de dag 'bongs pa ste/ rgyamatshol chen por gru'i sngam bu zhig pa dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni rab tu srung ba ste/ dbul song g.yang sa chen por srung pa dang ma byangs so// 'din khyis pa de dag ni yongs
189a4(mdo): su zad par 'gyur te/ pa'i ting gi mtshams grub ba'i rtsad tshungs so// 'di dbyis pa de dag ni du ba sa yul pa ste/ rgas pa dbad pa'i ma chen po dang rtsab 'dir byis pa de dag mi 'khor ba ste/ rdzas
189a5(mdo): kyi 'kham sa 'azhug sa dang rgyam so// 'di mkhyim pa de dag ni 'phrog mos pa ste/ dmus so ris phyi dad pa dang mtshungs so// din byis pa de dag ni btags shing 'khor ba ste/ khyi stong gis pa ta
189a6(mdo): pa dang mtshungs tho// 'di ma byis pa de dag ma rnyed pa ste/ dpyid kyi ma dang nags tshal dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni yong su nyams pa ste/ zlab ma gi ngo'i tha pa dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa nas lasas
189a7(mdo): thus ma mkhal ldi ba dang mtshus so// 'di dag ni byis pa dzas la 'am pa ste/ thu bo mos rgya med dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis padzas pa 'joms pa ste/ gron tsam tsham po mang po dang ma tshus so// 'dzin ni
189a8(mdo): bya brnam pa 'angags pate/ ma cad thod mabyams// 'di dag de byis pardom sa gsad paste/ mo la smral rtsig bdugs pa dang 'byam so// byil pa'obadag dir byung ba'i sa rgyas/ 
189b1(mdo): tham sa pasmras pas tshad pa bzhin na// dedagan gyis pa rnams rang gsungs rgya po'i gyis byas pa dang sa so// 'di dag sa pa
189b2(mdo): rang gi gcid chug la rtse pa dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la kun du bskur ba ste/ glang po tshal lcags kyu dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la smra ba ste/ gsod can gyis byis pa'i rang bzhi
189b3(mdo): can zid pa bzhin no// 'di na byis pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed pa ste// brgyanang po la dga' ba'i nor dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnaMs 'chos pa ste/ srin mo rnams kyis tshor ba 'chos pa dang mtshungs
189b4(mdo): so// byang chub sems dpas rnam pa su bcu rtsa gnyis po 'dir dag gis btsun mo 'i 'khor la yongs su btag pa byas nas/ lus phyi mang ba'i 'du shes rngam par sgom/ myi 'dun pa'i 'du shes nam/ 
189b5(mdo): nye bar sgrub/ smad pa mi 'du shes bskyed/ rang gi lus dang de dang / 'dra bar rnam par bsgoms/ lus kyi nyes dmyigs yang dag par ma/ zong/ lus la lus su mngon par zhen pa las spyod/ sdug pa'i
189b6(mdo): 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ myi sdug pa'i 'du shes 'jug par byed/ 'og gi rkang pa'i 'thil nas steng gi klad pa man chad kyi gtsang ba las byung ba dang / myi gtsang ba las gyurd pa dang / rtag tu myi cang pa zag par mthong
189b7(mdo): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// las kyi zhing las skyes shing srid pa'i chu las byung ba 'jig tshogs mying du btags// mchi'am rdul dang dri mas brlan la gcing gis sgyur cing khrag gi zigs
189b8(mdo): pas gang / zhag dang rngag dang lgad pa dang ni klad rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang // rtag tu ngan skyugs zag cing kun kyang dri ma sna tshogs tha dad pa// pags dang so dang skra dang spu'i sa bskor cing pags pas g.yogs
190a1(mdo): sa spu dang ldan// rgyu ma mchin pa mcher pa chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa nyams chung ba// rkang dang chu rgyus dag gis sbrel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing sha yis mdzes par byas// sna tshogs nad kyis gang zhing mya ngan
190a2(mdo): kha khyab la bkres dang skom pas kun tu nyend// skye ba po dag lus ni pu ga mang zhing 'chi dang rga ba'i gnas gyur pa// mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig rang gi lus la ngag dang mtshungs par sems kyi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub seMs
190a3(mdo): dpa' lus la lus su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyurd to// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i bu chos spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po don grub 'di btsun mo'i 'khor la rnam par
190a4(mdo): lta zhing 'dzum yang ston// sems ni myi rga myig ni phyir zhing lta na byi shol byed dam mi// yang na 'di ni rgya mtsho li thabs dang mtshungs te 'di'i tshad ni gzung bar myi nus so// yang na chags pa myed pa'i yul rnams la
190a5(mdo): yid chags par myi 'gyur grang // lha rnams kyis ni bskal pa'i// yi dam brjed par ma gyur da/ lha'i bu chos spyod kyis smras pa// de skad smra ci dgos/ 'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na yang mngon
190a6(mdo): bar 'byung ba dang / gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa myed par phye rang ba/ khyed la mngon gsum du gyur pa yin na/ da srid pa mas gnas pa chags par myi 'gyur ba lta spos kyang ci dgos/ dgel
190a7(mdo): slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' nges par byas pa/ yid byang bar gyu rad pa/ blo rdul ba/ tshul du shis shing rings za bas myed par dkyil mo krung bshig ste/ klu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzangs nas shar phyogs su lta
190a8(mdo): zhing 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yas pas rin po che 'dra ba smad de/ khang bshangs kyi steng du song nas sor mo bcu la thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams cad ba sems nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te
190b1(mdo): nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang / des mthong ba nam mkha'i dkyil na lha'i dbang po brgyan myig stong dang ldan pa/ lha brgya stong gis bskord cing / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / kos/ 
190b2(mdo): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog dang rna rgyan dang/ rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/ lus btud nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 'jig rten
190b3(mdo): skyong pa bzhi la yang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri ba dang / klu'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / ko chas pa bgos/ ya yang bgos te/ ral gyi dang / mnga' bzhul dang / mdung cung dang / mtshon
190b4(mdo): rtse gnyis pa dang / rtse gsum pa lag na thogs shing / tshu lu shiHpar nor bu'i cod pan dang / gtsug phud 'phyang bar byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // lha'i bu hi/ 
190b5(mdo): ma dang zla ba gnyis kying blo g.yas g.yon na 'dug par mthong ngo // / skam ma yi bdag po rgyal yang nas phyed na shar pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'dun pa la smras pa nga'i/ 
190b6(mdo): kra zhim ma ma ngon drung pa domang gdos gyi la par don grub gis// 'dun pa gyi shol ma byed la gong du// ta rgyal rgyan gyis brgyanang pa pas phyid // de nas 'dud pas cig de thos nas/ yid kyi
190b7(mdo): dka' zhing 'di skad ces smras so// srid ma ribazhing pad ma'i 'ad pa sa rgyas 'dra'i spyan mngal gyi'i seng ge stond ka'i zla ba nya 'dra lta bu dang / me tog ku mu ta dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba 'i pad ma li
190b8(mdo): rdzing bu sar par 'jam pa'i pad ma rgyas 'dra li zhal/ sbyangs pa'i gser dang nyi ma shar thog za ba dri byed gzil dang mar blugs me'i 'od 'phrol nor bu klog 'od 'bar pa li gzil brjid can
191a1(mdo): glang po rgyags pa bgying ba glang po'i stobs can pa yang khyu mchog ri dgas rgyal dang ngang pa'i stabs can stabs mdzes shi nad tu zhabs legs kang du bzhud// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'dun
191a2(mdo): pa gang gi don tu nga yis sngon chad lag pa rkang pa myig dang de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhing // chung ma dang ni phangs pa'i rgyal srid nor ka ser gos dang rin chen gang po'i shing rta glang po klung mgyogs shugs ldan rta po chal
191a3(mdo): mchog ldan pa btang // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas tshul khrims ngas bsrungs bzod yongs bsgoms pa btson 'grus stobs dang bsam gtan shes rab dag/ de lta mod kyi byang chub zhi ba shis thob nas ni rga shi'i
191a4(mdo): rgya mtshor chud pa'i sems pa'i sa yongasu dgrol ba'i dus la bab// 2dun pas smras pa/ jo bo khyod bstam ma thag tu blta ba'i phyir bram ze ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na da/ de dag zhes khyod rgyal po zas gtsang
191a5(mdo): ma'i spyan sngar/ lta khyod kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstand ces bdag gis zos so// smras pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di ni bsod nams rgyal mtshan ldan// 
191a6(mdo): khyod kyi bu btsas bsod nams gzi brjid can// de ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur// nor bdun dang ni rab tu ldan par 'gyur// gal te 'jig rtend sdug bsngal bltas nas ni// btsun mo'i 'khor spangs mdza
191a7(mdo): bar byung 'gyur nas// byang chub rga shi myed pa'i gnas thob ste/ chos kyi chu'i sa skye rgu 'di tshim byed// jo bo lung bstan pa 'di ni mchis te// 'di ma mchis pa ma lags mod kyi/ 'on kyis kyang phan par 'tshal ba
191a8(mdo): bdag gi tshig gsan par gsol/ smras pa ci zhig smras pa lta cig gang gi don tu 'di na/ kha cig rtul shugs dang rka thub rnam par du ma phom ste/ ri dgas kyi phags pa dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / pha dang shing shun kyon po dang / 
191b1(mdo): sen mo dang sgra dang / ag tshoms ring por 'jog pa dang / lus la gdung ba dang yongs su gdung ba rnam pa du ma spro bar bgyid de/ bdag cag ji ltar lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur zhes brtul shug+sa
191b2(mdo): dang rka thub drag po thom mo// jo bo phun sum tshogs pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes pa lags te/ rgyal srid 'byor da cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs te/ nyams rga zhing myi dang skye bo mang pos kang ba 'di dang / bskyed pos tshal
191b3(mdo): dam pa mchog me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyand pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byind pa 'di dag dang / rdzing me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad
191b4(mdo): ma dkar pos mdzes par gyur da pa/ ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / khyu byug dang / dur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / dang skya sgra skad 'byend pa shing a 'bra ta dang / mya ngan tshang dang / tsam
191b5(mdo): pa ka dang / ku ra ba ka dang / ke sa ra las stsogs pa shing me/ tog chags pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram 'khor pa/ rin po che/ 'i shing sna tshogs gis legs par brgya nad pa/ myeg mangs ris su
191b6(mdo): bkod pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs pus bkod pa/ rin po che'i dra bas bres pa/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su pyad pa/ rgun dang dbyar dang stond dang / dpyid gnas par bde ba rnams dang / khang bzang
191b7(mdo): chen po chos dang / chos bzangs dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan bral las stsogs pa/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bu/ ston ka'i srin 'dra ba/ kangs tis se lta bu'i stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang
191b8(mdo): rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgya nad pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba skra 'byung ba 'di dag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor ro la
192a1(mdo): mo'i cha byad rgyud cig pa dang / pi dbang dang / kha ra dza dang / gling bu dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg rdo ba dang / kim pa la dang / na gu la dang / sgra stan dang / rdza rnga dang
192a2(mdo): pa Ta ha dang / klu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / klu dbyangs sbyar ba legs par bslabs pa/ dgod pa dang / 'jo ba dang / rtse ba dang / rga ba dang / tshul du shis pa dang / spyod lam mdzes
192a3(mdo): pa 'di dang ni ldan pa/ lha khyod kyang dar ni ma yol te/ gzhon pa thor bu dar la bab pa/ lus 'jam pa lang tshol bab pa/ dra ba ska gnag pa/ 'dod pa ma rold pa lags kyis/ sum bcu tsa gsuM
192a4(mdo): pa'i bdag po myig stong dang ldan pa/ lha'i bdag po lta bur re shig/ dgos par rol da la/ srad kyis bgres nas mngon par 'byung bar mdzod cig/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 
192a5(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gsum 'jig rten lha dbang ltar// rgyas pa'i cho ga/ mkhyend pa rgyas par ro la// srad kyis bkres par gyur da na/ sa rtul shugs dang // rka thub dag ni yang dag brtsams par mdzod
192a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa myi rkos te 'dod pa 'di dag ni// myi rtag pa myi brtan pa ther zug ma yin pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can myur du 'gro ba// g.yo ba rig zar po'i chu'i shugs dang 'dra ba/ zi la
192a7(mdo): pa'i thigs pa ltar ring du myi gnas pa/ lag pa bcas pa stong pas byis pa brid pa ltar snying po myed pa/ chu shing gi snying po ltar mthu' myed pa/ snod so ma btang ba ltar mthar da 'jig pa/ ston ka'i srin ltar skad
192a8(mdo): cig byung nas myed par gyur da pa/ nam mkha'i klog ltar ring du kyi gnas pa/ dug dang bcas pa'i snod ltar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal can 'khri shing ma lu ta ltar phyi bde ba byind pa/ byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis
192b1(mdo): 'dod par bya ba cu'i bu lta bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can sdig rgya ltang 'du shes byin ci log las byung ba/ spyam snar sems phyin ci log gis rnam par sgrubs pa/ phyil ma star lta ba byid ma log gis/ 
192b2(mdo): nga da'adi sna phyigs par byed nga rnam pa dgyi sa
192b3(mdo): su spangs shes rab can rnams kyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / da pa dang bcas pa dang / nyes pa dang bcas pa dang skyon dang tshim par shes napa rnam pa
192b4(mdo): ga pan ca kyis smad pa/ 'phags pa rnams kyis bzungs pa ma'am pa rnams kyisam bsngags pa kyi ma 'as pa rnams kyis yongs su 'thu sas pan

192b6(mdo): kyis sbrul gyi mgo bzhin spangs/ ngad skyugs lda ban na myi gtsang rnam par spangs// 'dun pa dge ba bamasachad 'jig byed pa/ 'dod pa zhes rnas ni dan
192b7(mdo): de'i tshe 'dun pa zug rngus zug pa bzhin du skad phyung ste/ ngu zhing de nas myig nas mchim zag la sdug bsngal bzhin tshig 'di skad ces smras so// lha cig gang gi don du 'di
192b8(mdo): na kha cig btul zhug rnam pa mang po ma ste/ rig dgas pags pa 'chang / sma dang sen mo limag chom ring du 'jog/ 
193a1(mdo): cing de bzhin shing shun gyon la yan lag skams shing hUMl shugs gnas// sred dang lta ba lhub dag dang ma drus 'bras ze kha cig spyi tshugs 'dug dang ba lang rtul shugs gnas pa dang // ji ltar bdag cag 'gro/ 
193a2(mdo): ba'i cho bo khyod 'phags 'khor los sgyur ba mchog dang de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang // brgya byi nad rdo rje 'chang dpa' thab 'bral lha dbang 'phrul dka' 'gyur snyam tshangs pa'i 'jig rte nad bsam gtan bde ba 'dod/ 
193a3(mdo): kyigyi'i dam pa khyod kyi rgyal srid 'di ni shind tu 'byor da cing rab tu rgyas la shi nad tu lo legs la// de bzhin kun dga'i ra ba dag dang skyed mos tshal dang 'ang bzangs mthon po rnam par rgyal ba'i khang ba mtshungs/ 
193a4(mdo): bud myed 'di dag rnams kyang pi pad dang ni gling bu dka dang klu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra le nad cing mchis// dka' bar bgyid pa dang / da ra dang klu dbyangs sbyard pa shi nad tu bsrabs pa 'di dag spyod cing
193a5(mdo): nges pa ma bzhud cig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa nyon cig// 'dod pa'i rgyus ni sngon gyi tshe rabs dag na/ bcings dang ra btsas dang brdegs dang bsdigs pa sdug bsngal brgyad dag ngas
193a6(mdo): ni bzod byas 'dus byas rnams la nga yis yid byung byas ma gyur // sngon chad bag myed dbang du song zhing gti mug dkrugs la lta ba'i dra bas bkris shing mun gyur da chos 'di myi shes pa las byung ste/ bdag du 'du she/ 
193a7(mdo): 'dzind dang tshor ba po las 'das// dngos po 'di dag thams cad g.yo zhing 'gyur la myi rtag sprin dang mtshungs shing klog dang 'dra ste/ zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra zhing gsol gsog snying po myed la bdag yod ma yin
193a8(mdo): stong par 'gyur ba ste// nga'i yid ni yul la chags pa byed kyis 'dus pa rta rkyal dam pa bsngags ldan pa byin ras sngon bsams pa'i bkra shis rdzogs kyis thams cad zil gnon chos kun dbang phyug chos rgyal cu
193b1(mdo): par 'gyur// 'dun pas smras pa/ pad ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i myig ldan zhing // do shal nor bu rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgya da// mkhal la sprin tshogs dag las byung 'i klog 'dra ba// mal na
193b2(mdo): rnam par mdzes pa 'di la myi gzigs sam// pi lding dang ni 'ang dag dang sgra snyan dang // rdzang dag dang gling bu klu dbyangs lend pa dang // pi bang ma bya ka la sma 'byind pa dag ni// kyi 'am ci mo khyim 'dra'adi
193b3(mdo): dag dor lags sam// su ma na dang ud pa la dang bar ka sha// tsam pa ka dang dri mchog 'phreng ba'i me tog brgyus// dus kyi a ga ru dang bdug pas rab bdugs dang // byug pa dam pa de dag la yang myaM gzig
193b4(mdo): sam/ shi nad tu dri rda dri ldan ro bro gya nom dang // skyu ru mas da dag dang bshos gtsang shi nad tu legs sbyar dang // skyems kyi ro dang khar bcas pas rab sbyar ba// 'di la'ang mye gzigs par na
193b5(mdo): lha khyod gan du bzhud// drang ba'i dus na byug pa dro ba dam pa dang / tsha ba'i dus na can dan sprul gyi snying po dang // ka shi pa'i nam bza' bzang po mang po dang // de dag la yang myi gzigs lha khyod gan
193b6(mdo): du bzhud// lha yul dag na lha rnams dag ni ci 'dra bar// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag rab spyod pa// gzhing bde dang ldan la gyes par ro yad mdzad de// de nas shag kya'i dam pa nags chal bzhud par mdzod
193b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa// 'dun pa ngas ni bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu myed pa/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang myi dang lha'i 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs khyad kyang ngoms par gyur da pa myed// 
193b8(mdo): rgyal po'i sras mchog gyur da te dbang phyug byas shing gang tshe gling bzhi dag tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur da nas rin chen sna bdun ldan zhing bud myed nang na 'dug pa dang // sum bcu rtsa gsum dbang dang 'thab
194a1(mdo): bral rab kyi lha dbang byas shing de dag nas ni shi 'phos 'dir 'ongs pa sprul pa'i lha'i nang na yid 'ong dpal ldan dam pa yis sngon chad spyad// lha'i gnas su dbang sgyur bdud kyi dbang po byas shing 'dod/ 
194a2(mdo): pa 'byor da pa mchog la spyad kyang ngoms ma gyur da na da ci dman pa 'di la brtend pas nga ngoms gyur da ram de ni gnas myin no// gzhan yang 'dun pa de ni sdug bsngal mya ngan rgon pa'i 'khor bar gnas pa nyon mongs
194a3(mdo): gdug pas bkrugs shing nyam ras rtag tu khyer te mgon myed skyabs myed cing // rti mug ma rig mun pa dag na rgas dang na dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dag gis nyen la skye ba'i sdug bsngal dgra yis kun tu gnon cing
194a4(mdo): rnam par gnon pa'i 'khor ba 'di bltas nas// ngas 'ong/ ra chos kyi gru bzang gtong dang tshul khrims rtul shugs bzod pa bco nu 'grus stobs can dag gis shing tshogs btsogs te sbyar nas lhag
194a5(mdo): pa'i bsam pa snying po ldan pa rdo rje lta bus brtan par bzung btab sbyar// gru der nga nyid zhugs nas bdag nyid rgyal te ba/ dag gris 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dag 'khor ba'i chu bo 'dal bar
194a6(mdo): che ba khro ba'i dpa' rlabs ldan pa 'dod chags 'dzind 'khro klo ba 'khyil dgra yis rnam par dkrugs pa rgal bar rka las bsgral lo snyam ste bsems de 'dra'o// de phyir mtsho dgra bcas lta ba'i 'dzin khri dang // nyon
194a7(mdo): mongs srin po yod pa 'di las bdag zha la te// bdag nyid zhal bar gyur nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa// rga byed zhi byed zhi ba'i thang la rgod par bya// de'i tshe 'dun pa de bas kyang rab tu ngu 'di skad ces
194a8(mdo): smras so// lha de ltar nges par mdzad dam// byang chub sems dpa' smras pa// 'dun pa nga yis nges par byas pa nyon// sems can dgrol phyir phan par bya phyir brtson// myi g.yo las kyang myi g.yol
194b1(mdo): gnon pa byed// ri rgyal lhun po lta bur brtand myi g.yol// 'dun pas spras pas/ jo bo'i nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig lags// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdo rje'i gnas lcags dgra sta mdung thub mnga'
194b2(mdo): char dang // lcags skor klog gi tshogs ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang // ri ther kun tu 'bar ba mgo steng rab 'bab kyang // ngo ni khyim la 'dod pa'i phyir yang myi skyed do// de'i tshe lha'i bu nam mkhal la 'khod pa
194b3(mdo): dag gis/ ca co dang ga gzha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ste/ me tog gi char yang phab nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yul rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing // sems can dag pa snying rje snying bzer ldan
194b4(mdo): blo gros mchog ldan rgyal 'gyur rgyal gyur da cig/ mgon po grol myi 'jigs sbyin mdzad pa// mkha'i rdul gnag dub 'jug dngas dag/ myi chags bzhin du skyes mchog thugs kyi chags
194b5(mdo): dri myed yul gyi bde bas myi gos te// chu las pad ma ji ltar te 'phags pa bzhin/ dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i glo gro/ sa dang // lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
194b6(mdo): nges pa rig nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par byas so// sgra thas cad kyang myi grag par byas so// dge slong dag de nas byang
194b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad gnyid kyis log par rig nas/ nam gyi gung la bab par rig nas/ skar ma'i bdag po rgyal po dang ldan par rig/ de kho na mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab rig
194b8(mdo): nas/ 'dun pa la smras pa/ 'dun pa dang skyo bar ma byed cig/ rta sngags ldan legs par brgya nad te pa thogs par pal byind// byang chub sems dpas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyin
195a1(mdo): la rgyal po chen po bzhis byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/ rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rang rang gi bkod pas rings pa rings par yang se
195a2(mdo): skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por 'ongs so// de nas dri za'i bdag po rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung ni/ dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / klu dbyas sna tshogs lend cing
195a3(mdo): shar phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i shar da phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dun
195a4(mdo): rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul bum mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos chu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
195a5(mdo): stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas 'ongs par gyu/ rang te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i lho phyogs nyid du gnas nas
195a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po myig myi bzang ni/ kru mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos kyi phye ma dang / me tog na/ 
195a7(mdo): tshar gi sprin kun nas spong ba rlung dal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs rtong pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du dag dang lhan cig du nub phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la
195a8(mdo): bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po lus ngan ni gnod sbyin rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer thogs pa/ 
195b1(mdo): lag na mar me'i thogs pa/ sgron ma lag na thogs pa/ mngal zhu dang / ral gyi dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / 'phang mdung
195b2(mdo): las stsogs pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/ go cha dang ya lad sra ba bgos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du m+b+ha dag dang lhan cig du byang phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur da te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi
195b3(mdo): grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// lha'i dbang po brgya byin da yang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i
195b4(mdo): tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma/ dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tog na rgyan dang / rgyan thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'ongs par
195b5(mdo): gyur da te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i steng gi bar snang la 'a/ ra dang bcas te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing
195b6(mdo): 'dug go// dge slong dag 'dun pas de ltang byang chub sems dpa'i tshig tho sa nas myig mchims gang zhing / byang chub sems dpa' la 'di nad ces smras so// jo bo khyod ni dus mkhyen pa mong mkhyen
195b7(mdo): ngan pa mkhyend pa lags na/ da ltar ni bzhud pa'i dus dang tshod ma lags na/ ci'i slad du bka' de skad la lang// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa da ni dus la bab po/ smras pa/ jo bo keng gi
195b8(mdo): nus sa dang/ byang chub sems da sa ska la/ thams can nams kyi sos pa na/ byang chub gag med pa'i gnapa sa yinas// 'gro ba gros zhes de'i ma sun rinapa// blad lam btab pa den du
196a1(mdo): bab// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid de// de lta 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa bla ba dang bar snang de bzhin skyong // lta dbang rgya byind rang gyi phyogs dang bcas// 'thab bral lha dang rga ldan 'phrul a dang // 
196a2(mdo): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams brtson par gyur // klu rgyal chu lha dang ni gzi can dang // ma dros pa dang de bzhin rgya mtsho dang // myi mchog mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab pas// de dag rnams kyang mchod phyir/ 
196a3(mdo): brtson par gyur// gang dag gzugs na pyod pa'i lha rnams dang // rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul rab zhi kyad// de dag rnams kyang 'jig rtend gsum mchod pa// mya chog de la mchod phyir mngon par
196a4(mdo): brtson// sngon chad spyod che grogs por gyur da pa yin// byang chub sems dpal phyogs bcu lhags pa yang // rgyal ba mngon bar 'byung bar lta byed cing // rjesu mthun pas mchod par bya
196a5(mdo): snyam byed// gsang ba'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po de// rdo/ rje 'bar thogs nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas// lus la go / brko/ sa stobs brtson phal dang ldan// gsang ba lag na rdo rje 'bar
196a6(mdo): ba thogs// lha lta bu nyi ma zla ba de gnyis kyang // g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur // sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar byas te// mngon par byung la rje su yi rang rtogs par byed// skar ma rgyal de 'a'o
196a7(mdo): dang bcas pa yang // rang gi lus ni rgya chen srul byas te// myaM'i dam pa de'i mdun 'dug nas// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab 'byind te// skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i dus la bab// don mod khyod dge bkra
196a8(mdo): shis thams cad grub// bdag dang khyo dang thabs cig mchis par bgyi// 'dod chags sel bar chad 'byung myi 'gyur// lta bu yang dag sbrul pos bskul byas pa// stobs ldan pa rtson 'grus 'phags pa myu
196b1(mdo): tu bzhengs// sdug bsngal nyen pa'i sems can thams cad sgro lad// da ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab// lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang // yid 'ong me tog 'cha pa 'bebs shing stan
196b2(mdo): de ni skyil mo dkrung bcas mchog la 'dug/ lha'i sa bskor cing mdzes la gzi brjid 'bar// grong khyem na ni skyes bu bud byed khye'u dang ni bu mo gang yod pa// de dag thams cad yid ngas rgyur nganam
196b3(mdo): nyal te khyod lam rnams las nyams// rta dang glang po ba lang ne tso khrung khrung ma bya ri skyegs rnams// de dag kun kyangang yid ngal gyurd nas nyal te de dag gzugs myi mthong // shag kya'i bu gang rdo rje sra ba'i
196b4(mdo): mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang // glang chen rta dang shid rta babs// mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal// rgyal po rgyalabu rgyal po'i skye bo kun kyang gnyid kyis log par bya dang // bud
196b5(mdo): myed tshogs rnams gnyid log gos bral gcer bur gyur da kye pa yod mtshor// de ni tshangs dbyangs yid du 'ong tshig ka la byed/ ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis// nam byed 'das te/ na mo ge gung la bab/ 
196b6(mdo): nas 'dun pa de la smras// 'dun pa rta po bsngags ldan bzang legs brgyan legs pa la byin// gal te nga la byams par sems na bgyogs ma byed par myur du byin// 'dun pas tshig thos mchi mas myi
196b7(mdo): gang rang gyi jo bo de la spras// sems can kha lo sgyur mchog gar bzhud bcibs pas khyod la ci zhig bya// dus mkhyend cing ni tshod mkhyend chos pyod gang du'ang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags// khyod kyi sgo bkum
196b8(mdo): brtan pa dam stsal du yang chab sgo 'byed myi 'gyu// brgya byind kyis ni yid kyis ses pa'i dbang gis sgo yang phye bar byung // 'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma khor// kyi hud
197a1(mdo): bdag grogs su yod ji ltar bya zhing phyogs ni kar brgyug snyam// gzi brjid ldan pas drag shul can gyi tshig spras brgya byin 'bal zhig thos// yan lag bzhi ldan dpung dang bcas pa 'a
197a2(mdo): yang 'di na ci zhig byed// rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo de dag rnams kyis 'di mchod// bud myed rnams kyang gnyid log lha rnams kyis ni grags ldan gnyid log byas// kyi hud 'di'i sa sngon
197a3(mdo): chad bsams pa'i smon lam thams cad grub gyur da cig/ lha stong bye ba de dag dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dun ba de la smras// 'dun pa rta mchog sngags ldan legs par phul cig 'dren pa skyo ma byed// lha dang lha
197a4(mdo): sbyin dag gis dung rdar ros mo khrag zhig byas// 'on kyang / lngas bskal ba'i grong khyer mchog 'di med par yongs byung // 'dun pa ba snang dri ma myed pas lha'i 'ad rab mdzes la sto
197a5(mdo): khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir gang ltag/ sa ltos// bde stsogs khyim thabs brgya byed dpung sgra po sngon mdzes par 'dug pa dang // lha dang lha sbyin myi 'am ci tshogs gang dag
197a6(mdo): mchod phyir lhags la ltos// 'dun pa des kyang lha tshig de thos bsngags ldan rta po de la spras// sems can/ kha lo sgyung mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rta skad sgrogs shing zhog/ de yis dbyad kyi khadog can de myig
197a7(mdo): bgaser kyis brgyan byas nas// yid kyig bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i brtsibs par dbul pa byas// mchod mchog yanga' zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi chings 'di gas bzang dge 'a lags/ khyod kyis sran cad
197a8(mdo): gang gongs sngon lam de grub gyur da cing gshegs su gsolang// gang dag rkyes bgyid zhi bar gyur cing dgongs pa'i rtul shugs grub gyurd cig/ 'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho ris pa dang zhi ba sbyin gyur cig/ 
197b1(mdo): de ni kang che mal nas langs tshes 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos// rta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba de la zhon// skyong ba'i lag pa rnam dag pad ma dri myed 'dra bas rta mchog bteg
197b2(mdo): brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de yi mdun na lam ni 'di zhes ston// de'i sa gsal ba dri ma myed pa'i 'od btang sa rnams snang bas gsal// de tshe ngan song kun zhi sems can bde ldan nyon mongs gnod pa
197b3(mdo): myed// me tog char ba ba bsil snyan bye ba sgra byung lha dang lha myin stod// thams cad rga dang ldan nas grong khyer mchog la skor ba byas te dong // skyes bu chen po song bas grong khye pa dam po'i lha yang yid ni dman
197b4(mdo): par gyur nas 'ongs// mdun du 'dug nas snying rjer du ba'i yid ldan de yis pad ma 'dra ba bzhin la spras// khyod bral sgren mor ra myi mdzes sa 'di grong khyer thams cad mun pas kun tu bkrugs
197b5(mdo): par gyur // do khyod kyis khab 'di spangs nas bdag laH/ bde bgyid pa 'di na 'ga' ma mchis// slan chad bya tshogs rnamakyi sgra dag dang // grags pa mtha' yas khyod ni sad babyi ba
197b6(mdo): btsun po'i 'khor gyi gling bu sbran pa dang // bkra zhis su dang klu sgo thos kyi 'gyur// nyon mongs bcom pa khyod ni gshegs gyur dan// gdugs mched khyod la mchod pa bgyid pa'i// lha dang thu mcheg
197b7(mdo): da pazang kyi 'gyur// lha'i ri yang tham rdzob myi 'gyur// 'breng ba btags nas su yon kya rang pa ltar// khyod kyim med pa blang de bzhin yangs// khyod 'thud med padag zi brjid dpas pa
197b8(mdo): kams lta ba bzhin du bdag lan// grong khyer kun gyi byin dang stobs phrogs te// 'di ni zhon pa 'dra zhing mdzes ma lags// gang gis sa 'di 'khor lo stobs can du// lung bstan da drang zong cin
198a1(mdo): deng brdzun gyur bsod nams sdong po chen po khyod byung na// sa 'dir shag kya'i stobs ni stobs ma mchis// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'di gdung yang chad// shag kya'i tshogs 'di bsam pa ras
198a2(mdo): tu nyams// dri byed dri bral khyod ni kar bzhud par// bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi bar bgyi// 'on kyang thugs brtse thugs rje bskyed napa ni// khyod kyis pho brang 'di la gzigs su gsol// blo krong
198a3(mdo): ldan pa khyim la bsdus nas ni// snyan pa'i nga ros 'di skad tshig smras ste// skye 'chi mthar 'byind ma thob bar du ni// pa'i sa ser skya'i grong khyer 'jug kyi bya// rga shi myed pa'i gnas mchog 'ami byed pa
198a4(mdo): byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par// da ni ser skya'igadas su mngon phyogs te/ 'greng 'dug nyas dang 'chag pa myi bya'o// kang tshe 'gro ba'i tho bo pa// byang chub sems dpal de byung zhing
198a5(mdo): de ni mkha' las 'gro ba'i tshe// lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bstod 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas chen yin// 'di ni bsod nams zhing che na yin// 'di ni bsod nams 'dod pa'i zhing // 'chi byed 'dra/ 
198a6(mdo): bu sbyin mdzad pa// sems can rnams la thugs rje bas// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis// 'dis ni byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// 'di yi tshul khrims yongasu dag/ 
198a7(mdo): brtul zhugs bzang zhing pyod ma nyams// 'dod pa dag dang longs spyod rnams// don du myi gnyer tshul khrims srub// sems yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir// 'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsung // yan lag
198a8(mdo): nying lag bcad gyur kyang // khro ba myi mnga' sdang myi mngal// 'di ni rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan// bskal pa bye bar skyo myi yanga'// 'di yis byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba
198b1(mdo): mdzang // 'di cig thams gtan thams gtan pa// rdzu pazhi zhing rag na// nyon mongs thams cad 'bregs nas de// sems can bye ba dgros par 'gyur// 'don shes rab na sa kyi ma pa // rton / 
198b2(mdo): rnam par tog ldan las// krol zhing thugs ni nam grol te// rang byung ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'di ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan// thugs rje'i ni pha rol byind// rka dang btang bsnyoms pas pa gtan
198b3(mdo): pa// tshangs pa'i lam ni cho ga mkhyend// 'di ni shin da tu lha'i lha// lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa'i 'os// thugs dge dag cing drim bral// yon tan khrag khrig pha rol dbyond// 'jigs pas nyen pa
198b4(mdo): rnams kyi skyabs// myig myed rnams kyi sgron ma ste// nod pa rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags// ring nas na ba'i sman pa lags// rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal// dbang po lta bu'i
198b5(mdo): spyan stong mnga'// tshangs pa lta bu ma rang byung 'gyur// lu sa dang sems ni rab sbyangs pa// brtan zhing shes rab rab tu ma// ngal// dpa' zhing thugs ni 'dod chags bral// nyon mongs
198b6(mdo): 'joms pas dpa' bo ste// ma rgyal dgra las rgyal ba lags// seng ge lta bur bsnyems pa spangs// glang po lta bur rab tu la thugs// khyu mchog lta bur tshogs kyi tshe// bzod de 'khrugs pa rab tu spang
198b7(mdo): zla ba lta bur rab tu gsal// nyi ma lta bur snang ba mdzad// sgron ma lta bur gsal mdzad pa// skar ma lta bur mun pa bral// pad ma lta bur chags myi mnga'// me tog lta bur khrims dri gdal// stond
198b8(mdo): pa lhun po lta myi g.yol// dog sa lta bur gsos su gyurd// rin chen 'byung gnas ltar myi 'khrugs// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'di ni 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha'i bdud kyang
199a1(mdo): bcom// 'di ni ded dpon chen po ste// lam ngan dag na gnas rnams la// yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog/ ring por myi thogs stond par 'gyur// rga shi nyon mongs 'joms pa
199a2(mdo): po// mun pa rab rib rnam par grol// sa dang lha yul grags pa'i// rang byung rgyal bar byon pa lags// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba// dpag tu myed la stond pas bstod// khyod
199a3(mdo): la bstod pa'i bsod nams des/ snang ba'i steng ge 'dra bar shog/ dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung nas/ shag kya'i yul dang / kye'u ta'i yul dang / gya de yudul las
199a4(mdo): 'das te/ e ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal dang / rje su dang dag pa zhes bya ba nas/ dpag tshad drug du byang chub sems dpa' phyind pa dang / nam nangs par gyu rad to// de nas byang chub
199a5(mdo): sems dpa' rta bsngags ldan las babs te sa la 'a ka nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ro na dang / nam mkha' lding dang / kyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po/ 
199a6(mdo): 'i tshogs chen po slar bkye'o// slar bkye nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyan 'di dag dang / rta sngags ldan kyang / 'dun pa'i lag tu rtad de slar btang ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun
199a7(mdo): pa la bos te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'dun pa khyod song la rgyan 'di dag dang / rta bsngags ldan khyer te song shig/ sa phyogs gang na 'dug pa slar log pa der mchod rten partsigs te/ deng sang du ya
199a8(mdo): mchod rtend de la 'dun pa slar log pa'i mchod rten zhes grags pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar na gtsug yud kyang yod la rab tu byung ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyan/ 
199b1(mdo): demangs kyis gtsug sud bcad de bar snang la bor ba dang / de sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir blangs te// de sang du'ang sum bcu pa gsum pa'i lharnamapa gtsug sung kyi rub stod / 
199b2(mdo): byed do// der mchod rten yang byas te/ deng sang du yang mchod rtend de gtsug sud blangs pa'i mchod rten du zhes mying du chags so// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sema'i te/ rab tu byung ma gas/ 
199b3(mdo): shi pa gyon par ji ltar rud kyis/ gal te nags tshal gyi gnas nas tshul dang mthun pa'i gos shing rnyed na ni legs so// snyam du bsams pa dang / de nas gnas chang pa'i ris kyi lha rnams 'odi snyam du sems te
199b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' la gos ngur sdigs dgos par gyudad to snyam po// de nas lha'i bu gcig cig lha'i gzugs myi mngon pa ru byas te/ rngon pa'i gzugs lta bus gos ngur smyigs bkos na
199b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du phyi nad de nas byang chub seMs dpa' de la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te grogs po khyod kyis go// sa dur smyigs rnams kho bo la byin na/ kho bo'i gos ka shi pa 'di
199b6(mdo): rnams kyang khyod la byin no// des smras pa/ gos 'di dag kyang khyod la mdzes la/ 'ani rnams kyang kho bo la mdzes po// byang chub sos dpas smras pa/ kho bos khyod la bsrang ngo // de nas lha'i bu
199b7(mdo): rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos du sbyin rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byind te/ gos ka sha pa rnams kyang blangs so// de nas lha'i bu des gus pa bskyed de/ lag pa gnyis kas gos de dag blang
199b8(mdo): nas/ spyi bo la bzhag ste/ de dag la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir de nyid du/ lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo // de yang 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas de mchod rten tshigs te/ deng
200a1(mdo): sang du yang mchod rte nad de/ dur smyig blangs pa zhes bya ba mying du chags so// gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas gtsug pud bcad nas/ gos ngur smyig rnams bgos pa de'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya
200a2(mdo): stong dga' zhing mgul la/ tshim zhing yid rangs te/ mchog tu dgal la rab tu dga' nas/ rga ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ kye grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo // kye grogs po dag gzhon nu
200a3(mdo): don grub rab tu byung ngo // de ni za na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te/ sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs myed pa dag skye
200a4(mdo): ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba nas/ rga ba dang / 'chib da dang / na ba dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las sems can rnams yongasu
200a5(mdo): sgrol ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas/ bde ba'i 'jigs pa myed pa mya ngan myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ zhi brdzu la dang bral ba 'chi ba myed pa'i chos kyi dbyings la dkod par 'gyur/ 
200a6(mdo): ro zhes bya ba nas/ a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca mo dang gzha'i sgra skad phyung bar gyur to// sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas 'og gyen gyi gnas kyi bar du grag par gyur to// de nas btsun mo'i
200a7(mdo): 'khor rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nas/ dpyid dang rgun dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang bzangs rnams dang / khri rnams dang / khyim rnams su tshol zhing / gang gi tshe ma rnyed pa de'i tshe gcig tu 'dus nas// bya ku ra
200a8(mdo): ra mo bzhin du dud mo 'don par gyurd to// de na bud byed kha cig ni shin tu mya ngan kyis nyams zag nas/ kha cig ni kyi hud bu zhes mdze rad cing du'o// kha cig ni kye hud ming po zhes mdzer cing du'o// kha cig/ 
200b1(mdo): zhing 'o// na chog bsgyur zhing du'o// cig ni lag pa ma la dob ci 'o// 'acig ni drang drung zhing du'o// 'acig ni lag pa dpung pa dob cing 'o// 'jig ni na rung zhing ma man sa
200b2(mdo): zhing du'o// kha cig ni skra 'chig cing du'o// kha cig ni sgra 'bal zhing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa bstod de 'greng nas mongs 'don to// kha cig ji dag pa mo drug mdas phog pa bzhin du zo 'ung du rgyug cing ngu'o// kha cig ni/ 
200b3(mdo): dpan pa kyis gsogs nas du'o// 'jig ni mu zhing drud ra gyis bskyod pa bzhin du sul 'khor zhing dru'o// 'jig nis 'byes te mni tsam du 'gyur ro// na nyasun pa btod pa na
200b4(mdo): du sa la 'gre ldog cing ngu'o// kha cig ni shing rtsa nas 'byung ba ba zhin du blo'ur dus la 'gyel nas du'o// sgra de yang rgyal pos thos nas shag kya rnams la smras pa// ci'i phyir btsun mo 'khor na sgra
200b5(mdo): chen po grag/ shag kya rnams kyis shes nas spras pa// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na myi gda' zhes ganga'o// rgyal pos smras pa// myur du grong khyer gyi sgo rnams chod la nang du gzhon nu tshol cig/ 
200b6(mdo): dag gis phyi nang du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta myi smre sngags 'don te sa la 'gre ldog cing // rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag bu dang myur du 'phrad du gsol// 
200b7(mdo): de nas rgyal pos phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa bkye ste/ khyed de nga la gzhon nu ma rnyed kyi bar du slar ma log shig/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ni dkra shes kyi chab sgo nas mngon par 'byu
201a1(mdo): zhes lung bstand nas de dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang / lam gyi bar zhig na me tog gi char bab par mthong ngo // de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu lam 'di nas byung ngo snyam nas/ de dag
201a2(mdo): cung zad cig pha zad du song ba dang / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gos ka shi pa rnams 'go la thogs te 'gro ba de mthong nas// de dag 'di snyam du sems te 'di dag ni gzhon nu'i gos ka shi pa rnams yin na// gos 'odi
201a3(mdo): ngag gi phyir 'dis gzhon nu bsad de 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur da tam snyam mo// de nas yang de dag gyis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pa rta sngags ldan dang / rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo // de nas de dag phan tshun du
201a4(mdo): smras pa/ kye 'dun pa rta sngags ldan khrid de 'ong gis/ de la dam dris kyi bar du hur 'dums ma byed cig ces smras nas/ de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/ kye 'dun pa gos ka shi pa 'di dag gi phyir myi
201a5(mdo): 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par ma gyu rang grang 'dun pas smras pa/ de lta ni ma yin te/ 'dis kyang gzhon nu la kos ngur smrig rnams phul lo// gzhon nus kyang na bza' ka shi pa 'di rnams 'di la byin
201a6(mdo): del nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir gos de rnams lag pa gnyis kas spyi bo la sogs te/ de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rtend du song ngo // de dag gis kyang 'dun pa la dris pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems kho bo cag shag
201a7(mdo): kyi gzhon nu thog du 'dod na nus sam/ des smras pa myi nus so// gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang 'atul bapa brtan pa ste/ ba bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
201a8(mdo): nga ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por gyi 'dug go zheb de de skad gsung bas myi ldog ste// gzhon nus ci skad gsungs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang btul zhug / 
201b1(mdo): btan pas thang gyi ldog go// de na sa mdun pas tu sngags ldan dang / rgyan rnams khyer te btsun po'i 'khor gyi dang byin do// de nas ring ni gsod pa dang / rgyan de dugazhag kyag zhod su bzang po dang / mying ce
201b2(mdo): ma 'gags pa dang / sred byed kyi bu chen po ltar 'khregs pa dang / sred byed kyi bu byed ltar 'khregs pa'i rgyan de dag gis ma theg go// gang gi tshe de dag gang gis kyang theg par ma nus pa de'i tshe/ skye dgu'i bdag po
201b3(mdo): chen mo/ go'u ta myi 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag gi snying la mya ngan du gyur kyis/ bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzing du dor ro snyam mo// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo// 
201b4(mdo): kulu ta myis rgyan de dag rdzing du bor te/ deng sang du'ang rgyan gyi/ rdzing zhes mying du chags so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang che byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa' bo byung // de tshe ser skya'i
201b5(mdo): grong khyer ba dag mtha' dag sad/ kun kyi snying lam gzhon nu ma la na nyal snyam sems// mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshig kyang smra'o// sa mtsho ma dang de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnas
201b6(mdo): sad// lal du bltas na byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas// kye hud bdag bsdus byang chub sems dpa' ga bzhud ces// rgyal po'i khyim du ngud mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyu rang // byam pa sa sA de thos nas pa la
201b7(mdo): gyurd te// e ma'o nga'i bu cig pa zhes dud mo byung // de nas de la bum pa'i chus blugs khrus byas nas// shag kya mang po dag gis de'i dbugs kyang phyung // sa mtsho ma yang mal nas sa la ltung bar gyur da// 
201b8(mdo): sma rnams 'bal zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur da// sdug pa kun dang bral ba ring por myi thogs shes// 'dren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kye ma legs par gsungs// gzugs ni gzugs bzang
202a1(mdo): shi nad tu dri myed yan lag spras// gsal zhing rnam dag 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug// dpal yon ldan pa bsngags pa lha myis mchod pa'i 'os// bdag ni lam du bor te khyod ni gang du bzhud// 
202a2(mdo): yon tan mnga' ba'i byang chub ma mthong bar// masgom yang myi 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags myi bgyi// sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang thogs par bgyi// khrus bgyi spangs te brtul shugs dka' thub spyad par
202a3(mdo): bgyi// bskyed mos tshal kun lo ma me tog 'bras ma mchis// rnam dag me mo do yang mun tshul phyag dang 'dra// mye mchog dam pa khyod kyis spangs par gang gyurd pa'i// grong khyer khyim rnams mdzes pa ma lags
202a4(mdo): 'brog dang mtshungs// kyi hud klu dbyangs rab tu snyan po'i sgradad can// kye hud lcug lhug po'i rgyun thogs btsun mo'i 'khor/ kyi hud gser gyi dra bas khyab pa'i bar snang yang // yon tan
202a5(mdo): ldan dang bral bas phyin chad mya blta'o// de yang she nad tu sdugabasngal thob gyur da cing / shag kyai 'i bu mo ma du shig ces dbugs kyi ra 'byind// nga ni 'jig rte nad dag na dga' shi thar byed ces/ 
202a6(mdo): myi mchog dam pa de yis sngon yang smras pa yin// drang srong chen po dge la stong dag pyad pa de// nam phyed nas ni dpag tshad drug tu song gyurd nas// 'dun pa de la rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams rtad// 'dun pa
202a7(mdo): 'di dag khyer la ser skya'i grong song shig/ yab dang yum dag la yang nga'i tshig gis ni// gzhon nu song gis slar zhing thugs ngan ma mdzad cig// byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar 'dir mchi bar bgyi// chos rnam
202a8(mdo): gsan nas thugs kyang zhi bar 'gyur zhes smos// 'dun pas de bzhin 'dren pa la ni slar smras pa// 'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces// myi mchog gnyen gyi tshogs rnams bdag la
202b1(mdo): deg krung dkyis// bdag la nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis// byang chub sems dpas spras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i gnyen gyi tshogs rnams dka' bar gyur ngan pa ni// khyod la stond po'i// 
202b2(mdo): 'du shes rtag tu sgom gyur da to// phal byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par gyur // 'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su// phyi mchog dam pa de'i bskyed mos tshal du byid// bskyed mo/ 
202b3(mdo): tshal gyi srungs ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas// kun tu dka' ba'i sgra ni shag kya rnams la spras// gzhon nu 'di nyid rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang // bskyed mos tshal du phyind kyis thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ 
202b4(mdo): rgyal pos de skad thos nas shag kyis bskor nas ni// rab tu da / da' ba'i shugs skyes bskyed mos tshal du phyind// sa mchos byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan rig nas// tshig de la ni yid mches
202b5(mdo): te dgar ma gyur// gzhon nu byang chub ma thob par du phyir 'odi ra yang // byon cing ldog par rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin// rgyal pos rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa de mthong nas// dud mos btab
202b6(mdo): ste sa'i steng du 'gyel par gyur da/ kye hud nga'i bu ni klu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra mkhas// rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du song // 'dun pa khyod kyis nga la 'dir ni legs par spros// byang chub seMs
202b7(mdo): dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig/ sgo ni su yis bye zhing gang gis khrid par gyur // lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ci ltar byas/ 'dun pas spras pa rgyal po'i dbang po bdag las gson// dgung
202b8(mdo): phyed grong khyer byis pa rgan po gnyid log nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du// 'dun pa rta rgyal ba la myur tu byin zhes gsung // bdag gis skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud byed/ 
203a1(mdo): tshogs kyang srang // de dag log cing rab tu log pas tshig ma thos// bdag ni ngu zhing bdag gis chibs kyi rgyal po phul// phan pa mdzad pa gang du dges par gshegs zhes bgyis// brgya byed
203a2(mdo): gyis ni 'khrul 'khor ldan pa'i chab sgo phye// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni chibs kyi rka lag bteg/ dpa' bo bcibs nas stong gsum lam rnams rab tu g.yos// nam mkha' shin tu yangs pa 'di las
203a3(mdo): gshegs kyur rad te// 'di ni rab tu btang bas mun pa mun nag bsal// me tog bab cing sil snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung // lha dang de bzhin lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bstod// nam mkha' las ni lha tshogs
203a4(mdo): mang pos bskor te gshegs// 'dun pas rta mchog dang ni rgya na rnams khyer nas su// de ni ngu zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyind pa dang // sa mchos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyu rad nas
203a5(mdo): rab tu brgyal bar gyur da te sa'i steng du 'gyel// bud myed cho/ mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni// chu dag blangs shing shag kya'i/ bu mo 'khru bar byed// mya ngan rnyed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed
203a6(mdo): gyur du 'ong // rangs pa gnyis dang bral bar gyur du'ang snyam byed// shag kya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyu da pa mthu bskyed nas// rta'i rgyal po ta mchog de'i mgul nas 'jus// sngon chad dga' bas 'acas
203a7(mdo): dag kyang dran byas nas// mya ran gyur da cing sna tshogs tshig kyang rab tu smra// kyi rung bdag gi dga' skyed kyi chung bdag gi myi mchog dri myed zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba// kyi hud bdag gi gzugs mchog gzugs 'cha
203a8(mdo): kyi hud bdag gi mtshan mchog dri myed gzi brjid ldan// kyi hud bdag gi yan lag ma spad legs par 'khrungs pa rim gyis 'phags pa nyams myed pa// kyi hud bdag gi yon tan mchog ldan lha myos mchod pa
203b1(mdo): thugs rje chen po mchog ldan pa// kyai hud bdag gi stobs ldan sred bu'i mthu dang ldan pa dgra'i tshogs bcom pa// kyi hud bdag gi shind tu 'jam dbyangs ka la bying ka'i sgra skad tshangs dbyangs snyan ldan pa// kye du
203b2(mdo): bdag gi grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba bo// kyai hud bdag gi bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan tshogs brgyan drang srong tshogs rnams dga' mdzad pa// kye hu/ 
203b3(mdo): bdag gi gnas mchog bung ba'i sgra 'byin lum pa'i chal ni der bltam legs lham pa// kyi hud bdag gi sgra bsgrags lha myi rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa ye shes sdong po che// kyi hud bdag gi ro bro dam pa bam
203b4(mdo): ba'i sgros can pad ma'i spyan mnga' gser mdog 'dra// kyai hud bdagra gau shi nad tu rnam dag tshems ldan pa zho ba mo lta bu'i tshems ldan pa// kyai/ hud bdag gi shangs legs sbyin mtshams par ni dri myed mdzod spu
203b5(mdo): gnas pa po// kye hud bdag gi dpung mgo rab zum gzhul la dra'i byed pa e ne'i byin pa rkyed pa zlum// kyi hud bdag gi kla dro'i sna 'dra brla ldan phyag zhabs rnam dag mdzes pa'i sen mo can
203b6(mdo): de'i rgyan rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po rab tu dga' byed pa// kye hud bdag gi klu dang dbyangs sgra dam pa me tog byug pa bzang po'i dus bzang ba// kyi hud bdag gi me tog spos
203b7(mdo): rnams klu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed pa// kyi chud sngags ldan legs skyes pa'i khyim thab grogs po yin na khyod kyis gang du khring // kyi hud 'dun pa snyidang rtse byed pa mye'i dam pa bzhud de sngon cig
203b8(mdo): slong ma bod// do mod grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myi'i kha lo sgyur 'thugs rje ldan gshegs te/ phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs shes skabs der che gcig tsam zhig ci'i phyir sa spras// phan pa mdzad pa ji lta
204a1(mdo): gshegs shing rgyal po'i pho brang 'di nas su yis phyung ba byas// kang gi phyogs gshegs nags tshal gel ba'i lha mo de'i grog su gyurd pa dpal yod ldan// 'dun pa khro mos shi nad tu sdug bsngal gte
204a2(mdo): bstan nas ni byig phyung 'dra bas myig byin cig/ 'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyi ba dang ma dag mchod pa'i 'os zhes rtag tu bsngags mdzan// de dag rnams kyang spangs te byung na bud myed 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci dgon
204a3(mdo): kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bral ba gar la lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma yin// byis pa'i 'du shes kyis bzung lta ba phyi nad ci log pas skye dang 'chi 'pho gnas par gyur da// de yis sngon yang rga shi ldan pa'i 'dus byas
204a4(mdo): dag la grogs po 'ga' yang myed ces bstand// khyod kyid/ gongs pa yongs su rdzogs nas shing mchog drung du byang chub dam pa/ mchog thob gyur// rdul myed byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni grong
204a5(mdo): khyer dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gshegs su gsol// 'dun pa yang mchog tu yid myi dka' zhing sa mtsho ma'i tshig ni thos byur da nas des ni nga po 'thon cing tshig tu smras pa sa mtsho ma khyod bdag tshig
204a6(mdo): legs par gson// nam gyi gung thun bud myed tshogs rnams thas cad rab tu gnyid kyis log ste bde gyurd pa// de'i tshe na bsod nams brgyas 'phags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan pa la byin zhes gsung / 
204a7(mdo): de skad tshig zos nas ni de ma thag tu bdag gis khyod kyis gzims mal gzims la bltas// de tshe khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni gshegs kyis sa mtsho bzhengs zhes sgra skad chen po phyung // lha yis tshig bkag gyur
204a8(mdo): mas bud byed rnams las 'ga' chas zhig kyang sad sa gyurang // bdag ni rab tu ngu zhing rta'i rgyal po brgyand pa bgyis nas myi mchog de la phul// bsngags ldan drag shul can gyi gzil ldan sgra byung de'i sgra/ 
204b1(mdo): ni rgyang grags tsam du grags// 'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis log par bgyis pas grong khyer ba las 'gal yang sad ma gyur da// gser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyis g.yogs pa'i sa la sngags ldan na lag/ 
204b2(mdo): rab tu brdabs// de snyan dang 'jigs dang mdzes pa'i sgra phyung 'on kyang myi las 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur da// de'i bar skabs skar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur da zla ba skar ma dag kyang mkha' lnga gnas// mkha' las
204b3(mdo): lha rnams bye ba thal mo sbyar te btud nas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal// gnod sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten skyong ba brdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis// pad ma'i ze ba lta bu rnam dag dri myed
204b4(mdo): lag pas bsngags ldan gyi ni rka lag bteg/ bsod nams ka zi brjid brgyas 'phags de yang ku mu ta dang bar sha lta bu de la bcibs// sa ni rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing sangs rgyas zhing rnams
204b5(mdo): dri myed 'od kyis khyab// bde ba tshogs khyim 'thab brgya byin lha// 'i gtso bo nyid kyis de tshe chab sgo dbye ba bgyis// de bye ba khrag/ khrig lha yis mdun du bdar te lha dang klu yis mchod nas gshes
204b6(mdo): bsngags ldan gyis ni 'du shes tsam gyis de na 'jig rten mgon po mkha' las bkur bar shes// lha dang lha ma yin tshogs dbang por bcas pa de dag bcibs te bde bar gshegs pa gshegs// lha'i bum
204b7(mdo): klu dbyangs mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing // de dag sngags ldan la yang stobs 'thud byed la stan pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang byind// bsngags ldan 'jig rten 'dren/ 
204b8(mdo): pa myur ba myung bar byer la skyob kyi dag las byed cig// 'jig rten 'gon po mnyes par byas nas khyod la 'jigs dpang na mo ngan 'gro byed par 'gyur// lha nams re re zhib yang bdag la 'jig rten
205a1(mdo): mgon po bzhibs par mngon par dka' bar 'gyur// yul sa 'di na bya ba lha'i rkang pa dag gis non par ma gyurd cung zad byed// bsngags ldan nas mkha'i skabs na sna tshogs spras shing
205a2(mdo): mdzes pa'i lam gnas rin cen stegs bu ni// rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgya nad cing / lha'i gdug pa snying po mchog gdugs 'di la ltos// bsngags ldan dge ba'i lhas 'dis sum bcu rtsa gsu
205a3(mdo): lha gnas shi nad tu legs par sprul pa der// lha'i bu mos bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' bas dga' bar gyis// legs pa sa mtsho ma khyod phyir zhing ma bshums dges par mdzod cing
205a4(mdo): mchog tu dges par mdzod// myi mchog byang chub brnyes na// lha yis mdun du bdar ba ring po myi thogs gzigs par gyur da// sa mtsho mya rnams gang dag legs pa'i las bgyis de dag rtag/ 
205a5(mdo): tu bshums par bgyi ma lags// de ni bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags lags kyis dges par mdzod la bshums mo ma mthad cig/ rgyal po mngon par 'byung ba de ni lha dang mya yis mchod
205a6(mdo): pa'i bkod pa gang lags pa// bgod pa de ni sa mtsho bdag gis rku bdun rab tu brjod kyang rdzogs par brjod myi nus// khyod kyis 'gro la phan mdzad pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas brnyes mchog bsam gyis myi rgya
205a7(mdo): brnyes// bdag gis bsams na khyod kyang mye'i dam pa de ni ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur snyam bgyid// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'dun pas rgyal po zas gtsang ba dang shag kyali 'u mo la
205a8(mdo): mtsho ma dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / shag kya'i tshogs thams cad kyi mya ngan bsang ba'i gta ma smras so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu la kos ka shi pa
205b1(mdo): rnams byin nas// de las kos ngur sbyin rnams blangs te/ 'jig rtend dang mthun par bya ba dang // sems can la snying brtse ba dang / sems can yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid rab tu byu'o/ 
205b2(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze'i rigs ldan kyi gnas ka la ba de bsong ba dang / des byang chub sems dpal gnas par bya ba dang / zas la 'gron tu bos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze bad
205b3(mdo): ma'i gnas su song ba dang / des kyang byang chub sems dpal gnas par bya ba dang zas la 'gron du bos so// de nas bram ze'i drang song ngan pa klu'i gnas su song ba dang / des kyang de bzhin du byang chub sems dang
205b4(mdo): 'gron du bos so// de bzhin du gdul ba'i be con gyi bu 'od la na gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gron du bos so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis grong khyer chen po yangs pa
205b5(mdo): can du phyind to// de'i tshe sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring bur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / slob ma sum brgya dang thabs gcig tu/ grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas bcas shing gnas te/ de slob
205b6(mdo): ma dag la mi yang byed pa'i skye mched kyi tshul shugs dang mthun pa'i chos bstand pa des byang chub sems dpa' rgya ba ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas ngo mtsha rang du gyur te/ slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye 'di'i
205b7(mdo): gzugs la ltom shig// de dag gis smras pa/ de bzhin du de la blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni ya mtshan che'o// dge slong dag de nas nga skya rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste/ spya rtsa la shes kyi bu ring
205b8(mdo): 'bum la 'di skad ces smras so// kye ring 'bur khyod kyis chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing mngon du gyur da tam des smras pa/ kye ko'u ta ma de de bzhin no// ras smras pa/ kye kho bos kyang chos de mngon du bya
206a1(mdo): shing khro du chad do// des smras pa/ kye ke'u ta ma de bas na chos gang kho bos shes rab de khyod kyis zhes la/ gang khyod kyis shes pa de yang kho bos shes te/ de bas na bdag cag gnyis sgo/ 
206a2(mdo): ma'i tshogs 'di la bstand to// dge slong dag de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'bur gyis/ ngal mchod pa dam pas mchod de/ nga slob ma rnams dang don mthun par byed du bcug go// dge slong dag pa
206a3(mdo): 'di snyam du bsams te/ ring 'phur gyi chos 'di ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ de byed pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par nges par 'byung ba ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de las lhag pa zhig btsal zhing spyod/ 
206a4(mdo): do// snyam mo// dge slong de nas nga ji srid dga' ba'i rab tu/ grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas nas yul ma ka tar yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga ta'i rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la bder
206a5(mdo): song ste/ ri'i rgyal po skya bo ga la pa der song nas/ ri'i rgyal po skya bo de'i ngos lang gcig pu gnyis su myed cing grogs myed pa ra lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bsrungs shing gnas so
206a6(mdo): de nas nga nang par sham thabs dang chos gos bkos lhung bzed thogs te/ chu dron can gyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang mdun du blta ba dang / g.yas g.yon du blta ba dang
206a7(mdo): snum pa dang / brkyang ba mdzes pa dang / snam sbyar dang / zad pa dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos 'dzind pa mdzes pa dang / dbang po ma yengs pa dang sprul pa bzhin du yid phyi rol tu ma byung ba dang / 'bru mar gyis gang
206a8(mdo): ba'i sdod thogs pa bzhin gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing bsod nams kyi phyir zhugs so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi phyi rnams kyis mthong nas ngo maH rad du gyur da te/ ji 'di tshangs pa yin nam lha'i dbang po brgya byi na
206b1(mdo): zhi zhing khyod lam rab tul bar// ri'i rgyal po skya bo'i ngos la gnas// byang chub sems dpa'as nam nangs shes nas ni/ mchog tu blta na mdzes par sham thabs bgos// lhung bzed thogs te dpal
206b2(mdo): pa'i yid kyis su/ rang rgyal po'i rab tu bzod skams zhugs// gser gyis le skam bzhin rab dus pa// sum bcu ma gnyis mchod kyig bano pa// skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud byed kyis mthongs/ 
206b3(mdo): su yang blta bas ngoms par gyi 'gyur ro// srang dag rin chen dgos dang 'brus kyang brgyan// gang gi mthus ni grong khyer kun pa dzes pa'i// sngon chad ma mthong sems can 'di su zhes/ 
206b4(mdo): skye bo seld cing de'i phyi bzhin 'brang // bud myed stong dag khang pa'i steng 'dug cing // de bzhin sgo dang de bzhin skar khung dang // srang dag bkang ste khyim ni stong byas nas/ de dag las gzhan
206b5(mdo): byed par myi mchog lta// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs la lta ba'i tshe// nyo dang tshong pa dag kyang myi byed cing // chang dang can yang chang ni myi 'thung la// khyim dang srang na 'dug par gyi dga'o// rings par myi zhig
206b6(mdo): rgyal po'i khab song ste// de dag rgyal po gzugs can snying po la// gro pa 'dir tshangs pa bdag nyid bsod snyoms spyod// lha khyod brnyes pa dam pa brnyes zhes zer// kha cig brgya byin lha'i rgyal zhes zer/ 
206b7(mdo): gzhan dag 'thab bral lha'i bu zhes zer// de bzhin yongs su dgal ldan 'phrul pa dang / gzhan dgarab 'phrul lho'i bu zhes zer// kha cig nyi ma zla ba de bzhin du// sma ga can stobs ldan thang bzangs ris
207a1(mdo): zhes zer// kha cig dag ni tshig kyang 'di skad du// ri rgyal skya la 'dug pa 'di yin zer// rgyal pos tshig ni de dag thos gyur da nas// yid ni mchog tu dkal zhing skar zhu 'dug/ shin tu
207a2(mdo): sbyangs pa'i gser ltar dpal 'bar ba// byang chub sems dpal sems can mchog mthong ngo // rgyal po gzugs can snying pos myi de la// bsod snyoms byin la kar song ltos zhes bsgo// ri'i mchog la
207a3(mdo): de ni song mthong nas// lha cig ri'i ngos la de mchis spras// gzugs can snying pos nam nangs shes nas ni// myi dbang skye bo mang pos yongs bskor te// ri'i rgyal po skye bo'i drung du song // ri de dpal ni rab tu
207a4(mdo): 'bar bar mthong // bzhon pa las ni babs te rkang gis song // ji ltar lhun po bzhin du myi g.yo' zhing // rtsa bting steng na dkyil mo klub 'dug pa'i// byang chub sems dpal mcho/ 
207a5(mdo): tu gus pa mtho // rgyal pos rkang par mgo bos phyag byas / rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi gtam byas nas// khyod la rgyal khridakun gyi phyed sbyin gyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di khyod ma 'phya
207a6(mdo): spras// byang chub sems dpas 'jam pa'i tshig spras pa// sa'i bdag po yun ring che srung shig/ kho bos rgyal srid stug po bor nas su// re ba myed par zhi phyir rab tu byung // gzhon nu thor bu dngal bab
207a7(mdo): dang ldan// lus kyi kha dog mdzes shing shugs dang ldan// nor yang dag dang bud myed tshogs bzhes te// bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod// ma ga ta'i rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la bla drAs/ 
207a8(mdo): khyod mthong bas mchog tu dka'// bdag gi rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig/ bdag ni khyod la mnga' 'bul 'dod pa spyod// nags tshal stong pa dag tu ma zhugs shig/ slad chad sa gnas rtswa ster
207b1(mdo): ma bzhugs shig/ khyod kyi spyan mchog tu rab tu gzhon// bdag gi rgyal srid 'di bzhugs 'dod pa gyod// byang chub sems dpas 'angs zhing ma mu byed// dka' 'gyur ban ning snyis ba col chen
207b2(mdo): rgyal po khyod ni rtag tu bkra shis gyur de// kho bo 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi 'dod do// 'dod pa dug 'dra nyes pa mtha' yas ldan// sems can dmyal dang yid dgas dud 'gror ltung // mkhas pas smad cing 'dod
207b3(mdo): pa 'phags ma yin// kho bos rang snabs rul pa bzhin du bor// 'dod pa shing gi 'bras bu bzhin du ltung // ji ltar sprin dang char ste/ mu bzhin du 'gro// myi brtan 'gyur la ji ltar rlung bzhin 'gro/ 
207b4(mdo): dge ba thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing slu// de bzhin 'dod pa myi rnyed phyir yang gdungs// rnyed du zin kyang chog par 'dzind// myi 'gyur// gang tshe dbang myed ma rung rab 'gyur ba// de tshe
207b5(mdo): 'dod pa sdug bsngal drag chen bskyed// rgyal po lha'i 'dod pa gang yin dang // mye'i 'dod pa bzang po gang yin pa'i// 'di da pa thams cad kyi gcig gis thob kyang // de la chog pa myed de
207b6(mdo): yang tshol lo// rgyal po gang dag zhe zhing dul gyu da pa// 'phags pa zag byed chos kyi 'du shes gang // shes rab mkhas pas chog pa de legs chog/ 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa cung zad byed// rgyal po 'dod pa
207b7(mdo): dag la bsten byas zhib// ldan chad 'dus byas pa'i mtha' ma byed// ji ltar gyi dag lan cha'i chu 'thungs bzhin// 'dod pa bsten na byir zhing sred pa 'phel// rgyal po lus la yang ltos te byi brtan// snying po
207b8(mdo): byed de sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin// bu ka dgu'i sgo nas rtag tu 'dzag/ rgyal po kho bo 'dod pa'i 'dod chags byed// kho bos 'dod pa yang dang de bzhin du// bstan sdug pa'i bud myed stong bor te
208a1(mdo): mchog pa'i byang chub dam pa pob 'dod nas// kho bo srid par gyi dkal nges par 'byung // dge slong phyogs ni gang dpag pa nas byon// gang du khyod skyes yab sum shang na bzhugs// rgyam rigs/ 
208a2(mdo): lags sam bram ze 'am rgyal po lags// dge slong khur gyi 'du shes byed na gsungs// rgyal lo shag kya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong // mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa thob kyurd tam// kho bo'i pa'i mying ni zas gtsang / 
208a3(mdo): yin// yon tan 'dod pas kho bo de rab byung // khyod mthong legs par mthong ste legs pa lags// gang las khyod skyes bdag kyang de slob ma// 'dod chags bral bar 'dod par spya drangs pa// thugs nas/ 
208a4(mdo): bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol// gang che khyod kyis byang chub brnyes gyurd tshe// chos rjes bdag la chos kyi mgo bsha' mdzod/ rang byung bdag gi yul na bzhugs pa ni// bdag gis mchog
208a5(mdo): tu rnyed pa rab rnyed do// de nas kyang ni rkang par phyag byas te/ rgyal pos shi nad tu gus par bskor byas nas// myi dbang rang gi skye bos yongs bskor te// slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu zhug
208a6(mdo): 'dugyur / 'jig rte 'gon lo la sha ta'i gro bzhugs te// ji srid 'dod par zhi ba'i yid kyis 'dug/ lha dang kyi rnams kyi ni don byas nas// myi dbang dara'ang ra'i mu 'gram yong / 
208a7(mdo): gzugs can snying po 'ongs pa'i selu ste bcu drug pa'o// / dge slong dag yang de'i sa rangs byed kyi bu zhag kyod/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po gnas bcas nas blon pa'i
208a8(mdo): chags na pa thob sa bdun pargya nga nan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la 'du shes byed 'dugs byed byin gyi btul thug pa dang 'thun ma chol bzhed to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas rangs byed kyi sa la
208b1(mdo): spyod tshogs dang ldan pa tshogs can/ tshogs kyi slob dpon grags pa// mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa kun gyis shes pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te// rangs byed// 
208b2(mdo): kyi bu lhag spyod 'di tshogs dang ldan pa// tshogs can tshogs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa/ mkhas pa kun gyis shes pa yin na// gal te bdag de'i drung du song na
208b3(mdo): brtul shugs dang dka' thub pa brtsam pa na ni// 'di dag las khyad du 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyang gyi skye le/ mngon gsum kyi zhes pas kyang shes par gyi 'gyur ba dang 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar la
208b4(mdo): pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang phud phyung b.ras gyur kyis gang gis na de la bsam gtan gyi khyod yul dag dang snyoms par 'dug pa'i dkyi
208b5(mdo): ba dag mngon gsum du 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i ting nge'i rje nad dag kyang 'byung ba ma yin par bstand par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zabs shig bstand par bya 'am/ bdag rangs byed kyi bu
208b6(mdo): ga khyod kyi drung chu ba 'i/ dag gi ti nge 'dzid kyi yon tan gyi khyad par lagyud pa'i tshu slob sa 'am thangs sa/ 'dus byas kyi shing nge 'dzid da snying po byed par bstadad par bya'o snyas so// dge slong da
208b7(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpas don de'i dbang du byas te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag gyod ka la ba der song nas phyind pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag gyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod kyi stond pa ni su/ 
208b8(mdo): ni// yum chos pathadad pa kun zhes/ de na ces smras pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag khyod kyis byang chub sems dpal la 'di gdakyis smras so// rlonas mam po la ston pa gapa yang byed de/ 
209a1(mdo): kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang dag par khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpas basmras pa/ khyod kyis ci khong du chud/ smras pa/ 'du shes myed 'du shes byed byin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam
209a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag gis khyod las ting nge 'dzind kyi lam gyi gdam ngag dang rjes su bstand pa thob par 'tshal lo// smras pa de ltar bya'o zhes bya ba nas gdams ngag byin pa'i bar du'o// de nas
209a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu song ste/ kyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug go// 'dug ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang / ye shes kyi khyad par dang / sngon spyad pa legs par gyud pa
209a4(mdo): 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad la 'dres pa'i khyad par dang / de sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir bsam gtanal tshogs po'i 'jig rtend pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brgya stong
209a5(mdo): thams cad rnam pa dang bcas// bye breg dang bcas par mngon gzu du gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpal dran pa dang shes bzhin du stan las langs te rangs byed kyi bu lcag pyod ga la ba der song na
209a6(mdo): phyi nad pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po 'du shes myed 'du shes byed phyin skye mched kyi lam las kong na gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam/ des smras pa myed do// de nas byang chub
209a7(mdo): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ lhag gyod 'ba' zhig la dad pa yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi/ bdag la yang dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang dran/ 
209a8(mdo): ba dang ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab yod do snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas ras byed kyi bu lhag khyod la 'di skad ceb smras so// grogs po khyod kang du nges par 'byung ba'i chos kho bos kyang khong du chud do// 
209b1(mdo): ma mi gyu pa pa yin/ 'do gas dang bral pa bya na/ ga rgya / 'gyur pa di// na pa sa
209b2(mdo): chub par gyur da pa ma yin// dge sbyong nyid du gyurd pa ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das par gyur da pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lhag khyod thob pa dang bcas pa 'dun par byas dang
209b3(mdo): de tsam kyis chog go zhes bya ba nas chog par byas te song ba'i bamadu'o// de'i tshe lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu stsas spyod dedam tshangs par khyad pa rtsod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 
209b4(mdo): bdag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring por bcod cing brtson par byas kyi nga mtha' dang mu khong du chud par ma nus kyi dge slong go'u ta mas tshwa/ gas chung ngus khong du chud cing mngon du byas la/ de de yang myi
209b5(mdo): 'dod cing de las gong du tshol ba las the tsom myed par de ni 'jig rtend kyi stond par 'gyur ro// kang des mngon du byed par 'gyur ba de bdag cag la yang bgyid par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ de ltar s+yad nas lnga sde
209b6(mdo): bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung nas dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // dge slong de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dka' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab du gnas nas/ lnga sde bzang
209b7(mdo): po dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga tar yul rgyu zhing song ngo // yang de'i tshe rgyal po khab dang / ri ga ya'i bar na tshogs gzhan dag cig dus ston byed de/ tshogs de dag gis byang chub sems dpal la lnga sde bzang po
210a1(mdo): dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang / zas la 'gron du bos so// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' yul ma ga tar yul rgyu zhing / yul ma ta'i ri ga ya ka la ba der song ste/ der phyind
210a2(mdo): par gyu rad to// rig ya'i rtse mo der yang byang chub sems dpas spang ba'i phyir gnas te der yang gnas pa'i tshe/ sngon pa thos pa dang sngon phye shes pa'i dpe' gsum mngon du gyur to// gsum kar zhe na dge
210a3(mdo): dang bram ze gabal la 'dod pa dag las dben par myi gnas/ 'dod pa dag las sems dben par myi gnas shing / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 
210a4(mdo): 'dod pa la skom pa dang / 'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni/ nye bar zhi ba ma yin pa de da ga bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas
210a5(mdo): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po myi bzad pa tsha ba myong ste/ 'on kyang de dag mya'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur da pa/ 'phags// pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mya nus so// 'odi
210a6(mdo): sta ste dper na skyes bu me 'dod la/ shing rlon pa'i gtsu ba stan dang shing rlon pa'i rtsub shing thogs la chur bcug ste/ gcugs na/ des me phyi nod par myi nus so// de bzhin du dge sbyong dang bram ze dag 'dod pa rnas
210a7(mdo): las yul dben par myi gnas 'dod pa rnams las sems dben par myi gnas te/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dka' ba dang 'dod pa la sred pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la sgom pa dang / 'dod pa la yod/ 
210a8(mdo): su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa la brgyal ba dang / 'dod pa la zhend pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi pa ma yin gyi/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod par byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po
210b1(mdo): myi bzad pa tsha ba khyor mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag mye'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur da pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed myi nus so// snyam ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la dpe mngon// 
210b2(mdo): du gyur pa dang po'o// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas kyang de dag gi 'dod pa la dka' ba zhes bya ba nas/ myi tshol ba zhes bya
210b3(mdo): ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ des shing rlon pa'i btsu pa stand thogs la thang la bzhag ste/ shing rlon pa'i gcu bas shing gis gtsubs na/ des me phyi nad par myi nus so// de bzhin du gang dge sbyong
210b4(mdo): dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/ thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyard te// myi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phag/ pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar myi nus so// snyam
210b5(mdo): ste 'di ni sngon ma zos shing myi shes pa'i dpel mngon tu gyur pa pa gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dang 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas shing de dag
210b6(mdo): ki 'dod pa dka' ba zhes bya ba nas thams cad de bzhin du sbyar te/ de dag gi de ni nye bar zhi ba yin te/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag pa
210b7(mdo): bzad pa myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag myi chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mngon tu mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so// 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig me 'dod cing 'od 'dod
210b8(mdo): pa dang 'od tshol bar 'gyur la// des shing skam po'i gtsu bas bstand dang bcu pas shing zang la gzhag ste btsubs na/ des me 'byung ba dang 'od 'bar bar byed nus so// de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang / 
211a1(mdo): bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/ tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/ 'on kyang de kyi chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus snyam ste/ 
211a2(mdo): 'di ni sngon ma thos shing sngon myi shes pa'i dpe' gsum pa'o// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang da ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas pa/ 'dod pa rnaMs/ 
211a3(mdo): las sems dben par gnas la/ bdag gi 'dod pa las dka' ba zhes bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi de yang nye bar zhi ba yin la/ bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byas shing lus gdung bar byed pas
211a4(mdo): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya rad te/ 'on kyang bdag mye'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam mo// dge
211a5(mdo): slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpal ji srid dgal ba'i bar du ga ya// 'i rir ga ya'i rtse mo la gnas te rkang gis yul rgyu zhing / sded da pon gyi grong khyer lter rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyi nad pa dang / de na
211a6(mdo): rlung ne ran dza na chu gsal ba/ 'bab stegs bdel ba/ shing dang ni dgel ba mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa/ nye 'khor na spyod yul gyi grong yod pa mthong ste/ de na byang chub sems dpal yid shi nang
211a7(mdo): tu dga' bar gyurd nas 'di snyam du sems te// e ma 'o sa phyogs 'di ni mnyam zhi ba nyams dka' ba nang du yang dag 'jog dang 'thun pa ste/ rigs kyi bu spong ba don tu gnyer ba la ni 'dis chog go// bdag kyang
211a8(mdo): spong ba don tu gnyer ba yin gyis/ bdag 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir snyigs ma lnga'i dus la bab
211b1(mdo): cing / sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang / mu stegs can gyi sdes ka ba dang lta ba sna tshogs la zhugs pa dang / lus la ril por 'dzind pa la zhend pa'i tshe 'ongs te/ blun po dag gdung bas yongs su kadu/ 
211b2(mdo): pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dag pa tshol zhing stond pa 'di lta ste/ sngags gyod pa dang / lag pa la ldag pa dang / bye smra ba dang / rtsa 'du ma za ba dang / sha dang nya mye za ba dang / dbyar myi dbyung ba dang / chang dang bum pa dang / 
211b3(mdo): chu yongasu spangs pa dang / khyim gcig dang / gsum dang lnga dang / bdun nas zas lend pa dang rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang nya lcis sau ma da / ku sha dang / lo ma dang / ba glang gi lci ba dang / ba'i gcing dang / 
211b4(mdo): 'o thug dang zho dang / mar dang / bu ram dang / ma btags pa za zhed 'thung ba dang / bya dang ba dang / phug ron gyis zos te bor ba baH/ sa te za ba dang / grong dang dko nad pas 'tsho ba dang / ba gung gi
211b5(mdo): brtul zhugs dang / ri dgas dang / khyi dang phag dang spre ru dang / klab po che'i rtul shugs dang 'greng ba dang / kye smra ba dang / dpal ba'i tshul du 'dug kyang kham cig za ba dang / kham bdun gyi bar du za ba dang / 
211b6(mdo): zas lan cig za ba dang / nyin zhag gcig dang / bzhi dang lnga dang drug gi skabs skabs su za ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig za bar byed pa dang / zla ba la lta ba dang bya rgod dang 'ug pa'i gzhog pa shogs pa dang / 
211b7(mdo): shing leb dang / rtsa mun za dang / rna ma'i shund pa dang / rtsa dang ba dang kres ma dang / rnga bal gyi la ba dang / che bal gyi la ba dang / spa'i la ba dang / ko lpags gyon pa dang / gos gsher ba dang / stegs bu'i steng
211b8(mdo): dang / chu'i nang na nyal ba dang thal ba dang rdo dang / gyo mo dang / shib le ba dang tsher ma dang rtsa dang / gdung shing gi steng du nyal ba dang / mgo zur du bstand pa dang / tsog tsog por 'dug pa dang / zang la nyal ba dang
212a1(mdo): gos gcig dang gos gnyis dang / gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug dang 'dun dang / gos mang po srel ba dang / gcer bur 'dug pa dang / 'khrub dang mye 'khru ba'i cho ga can dang / sgra dang sen mo dpa gangs/ 
212a2(mdo): choms ring popa 'jog pa dang / ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba dang / rgya shug dang til dang / 'bras bu cig za ba dang / thal ba dang / sAg tsa dang / me tog pyad 'apyad pa dang / brtul 'thul ba dang rdul nag po dang / 
212a3(mdo): phyag dang dang / rdzab kyis lus la skud pa dang / ba spu dang myi'i thod pa dang / sgra dang sen mo dang tshal bu'i smad g.yogs dang / rdzas dang ke rus thogs dang / chu dron po dang / 'bras kyi zhu ba dang / la bar
212a4(mdo): bcags pa dang / khrud ma 'thung ba dang / 'dab ma dang / tshon ci/ dang / tshon dur smyig dang khar ba gsum dang / 'go 'dreg pa dang / ril pa dang / myaM'i thod pa dang / khri'i zur shing 'chang bas blun po
212a5(mdo): rnams dag par khong du chud do// du brngub pa dang / me rngu ba dang / nyi ma la lta ba dang / gdung ba lnga byed pa dang / rkang pa gcig dang / log pa gcig stod pa dang / rkang pa gcig btsugs pa dang / gnas
212a6(mdo): gcig na 'dug pas dka' thub pas rtogs pa/ phub ma la stsogs pa dang / 'dab mas sreg pa dang / bum pa bsregs pa dang / rdo bsregs pa dang / me 'bar bar 'jug pa dang / zas myi za ba dang mya ngan dang / 
212a7(mdo): 'babs stegs su song ste shi bas sdug pa'i 'gro ba chol lo// rab sngags zhes bya ba dang / gzhi myi 'grib pa zhes bya ba dang / gzhi srung zhes bya ba dang / gzhi tshugs zhes bya ba dang / smon lam dang skrod pa dang / 
212a8(mdo): sbyin sreg dang / dbab pa dang / sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang / klag pa 'dzind cing byed pas dka' bar khong du chud do// bdag dag par sems shing de dag la brtend te/ 'di lta ste tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang /
