212b1(mdo): ku lang dang / khyab 'jug dang / lha mo dang gzho nu dang / ma mo dang / ka ti'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / chu lha dang / nor can gyi bu dang tha skar gyi bu dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
212b2(mdo): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mya 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / 'khor dang / tshogs dang mtshun dang sha za dang lha'i drang srong dang / rgyal po'i drang srong
212b3(mdo): dang / tshangs pa'i drang srong dag phyag 'tshal zhi ba de dag la snying por shes so// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' la yang rten da/ ri dang ri sul dang rlung dang chu mig dang / mtsho dang mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / rgya mchod
212b4(mdo): lteng ka dang / khron pa dang / rdzing bu dang / shing dang shing gel ba dang / khri shing dang / rtsa dang sdong ldum dang / ltas dang / dur khrod dang / bzhi mdol dang / sum mdo' dang / srang dag la yang rte nad to// kha
212b5(mdo): pa dang ka pa dang rdo dang zo ba dang / ral gyi dang / gzhu dang / dgra sta dang / mdal dang mdung zung dang / rtse gsum pa dag la ya / phyag 'tshal lo// zho dang mar dang yungs kar dang / nas dang
212b6(mdo): shing bal gyi 'phreng ba dang / cung ngur ba dang nor bu dang / gser dang dngul la gtsogs pa la drakra shis par 'dzind te/ gzhan mu stegacan 'di dag 'khor bas 'jigs smag nas/ rnam pa de lta bu
212b7(mdo): dag byed cing ston to// 'di na kha cig bdag gi mtho ris dang / tha rad pa yab 'di dag las grub bo snyam du sems te/ de lta ba log pa'i lam du song bas/ skyabs ma yin pa la skyabs su 'du shes shing
212b8(mdo): bkra shis ma yin pa la dgra zhem par 'du shes la/ dag pa ma yin pa la dag par sems kyis bdag gis sonas kyang las kyi rgol pa thams cad mam bcad par gyur pa dang / sems can las dang bya ba rgya ma
213a1(mdo): ba bsta nad par bya ba dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bsam gtan spyod yul ba rnams la bsam gtan gyi khyad par bstand pas 'dun par byed pa de lta bu'i brtul shugs dang / dkal
213a2(mdo): thub kyi khyad par brtsam mo snyam mo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas de snyam du bsams nas/ lo drug tu brtul shugs dang / dka' thub shin da tu drag po shi nad tu sbyang bar dka' ba pyad par rtsas
213a3(mdo): so// ci'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni spyad par dka' ba ste/ de bas na dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sred pa tha ma pa gang bsam gtan/ mkha' khyab la snyoms par
213a4(mdo): zhugs pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na mye 'am/ myi ma yin pa sus kyang dka' bar spyad pa de lta bu pyod pa nus pa// myed do// ci'i phyir mkha' khyab ces zhe na/ de dang po nyid du
213a5(mdo): bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe// da gas phyi nang du rgyu ba nye bar 'gog kun tu 'gog ste/ bsam gta na de ni rtog pa myed/ rnam par rtog pa myed/ g.yo ba myed/ 
213a6(mdo): sems dpa' byed 'gyur ba myed cing / thams cad du rjes su song ba thams cad lo mya brten pa ste/ bsam gtan de la sngon slob pa'am myi slob pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam pyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub
213a7(mdo): sems dpa' sus kyang snyoms par ma zhugs so// mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/ khyab par myi byed pa byed pa byed pa/ rnam par mye 'thor ba ste/ des thams cad khyab par byed pas na bsam gta/ 
213a8(mdo): de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de bas na mkha' khyab ces bya'o// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten rnams la/ ngo mtshar yang dag par bstand par bya ba dang / mu stegs can nas/ 
213b1(mdo): kyai rgyags pa gzhil ba dpaphas kyi rgol ba rnams char bcad pa dang / lha rnams 'dun par bya ba dang / sems can chad pa dang rtag par smra ba las dang / bya ba chud zos pa rnams las dang bya ba gzung pa nga
213b2(mdo): bsod nams kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang / ye shes kyi 'bras bu yang dag par bstand pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang / lus kyi stobs dang / mthu yang dag par bstand pa dang / sems
213b3(mdo): kyi dpa' ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ byi dor ma byas pa'i sa tha mal ba la snyil mo klapa btsas te 'dug go// 'dug nas rang gi lus sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzi rad to// dge slong dag de nas pa dragun gyi
213b4(mdo): brgyad pa'i nub po// de ltar lus char bcad cing gzird pa lung kyang dngos bya ste/ bag dus pan kya byung bye ba rnams su te shes pa shAn rlo zhi sa subyung // 'deg byed pa bye tho dang 'an las byes bzhin su gang zhig 'asri pa na 'a mi bde zhi / dge zong
213b5(mdo): gzi na mchan zhung nas kyang dngul phyung zhing zags bral la na sa kyang dngul phyung zhing zags nas sal lhung ste/ zil par chags nas dro zhing rlangs byung ngo // dge slong bdag de nas ngas 'di snyam
213b6(mdo): du sems te/ bdag gis bsam gtan mkha khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam pa dang / dge slong dag de nas ngas bsam gtan mkhal khyab la bsam gtan du byas pa dang / kha dang snganas dbugs kyi nang du rgyu
213b7(mdo): 'gag par 'gyur te/ na ba'i bu gnyis nas sgra dran po sgra chen 'a byung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na sdud pa bus pa'i tshe skra drag po dang / sgra chen po 'byung ba de bzhin du// dge slong dag 'a dang snganas dbugs phyin bdu
213b8(mdo): bgan pagyun pa dang / na ba'i zug gnyis nas ma ngag pa dang bla chen 'byung ngo // dge slong dag de nas 'di ltam du bsasas te/ yang bdag kyis bsas gtan pa' 'a khyab la phas sa gtad tu bya nyas pas/ 
214a1(mdo): de nas nga'i kha dang sna dang rna ba 'gags par gyurd to// de dag 'gags pa dang / rlung gong du 'go 'thod pa la gnod par gyu rad to// dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig gis mdung thung rtul
214a2(mdo): pos 'go'i thod pa la btab pa de bzhin du/ dge slong dag kha dang sna dang rna ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags pa dang / gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur da to// der lha'i bu gcig gis/ byang chub sems
214a3(mdo): dpa' na ba de mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so// e ma'o kye hud gzho nu don grub 'di'i 'chi ba'i dus byas so// gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas pa ma yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa bas
214a4(mdo): gtan la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul ni da lta bu'o zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// myi'i dbang po shag/ kya'i sras po 'di// brnag pa ma rdzogs don kyang ma mdzad ceng
214a5(mdo): 'jig rtend gsum po sems can 'gon myed par// mdzad na/ 'gon 'dir grongs par gyi 'gyur grapa// kyi hud sems can snying po thugs dam brtan// 'gon pos sngan chad bdag cag dkal lda
214a6(mdo): du// dam chos mchod sbyin la ni 'gron du bos// sems can dag la khyod dam bcas pa deg re// de nas lha de sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du song ste/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul la gzhon nu ni 'chi ba'i byas so zhes
214a7(mdo): don de brjod do// de nas sgyu 'phrul lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ nam byed cas na krung na ran dza na'i 'gram ga na ba dang / byang chub sems dpal ka la ba der song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' lus
214a8(mdo): skams shing 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'dra ba mthong ngo // mthong nas mchims banangs shi bdus nas/ de'i mitshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sum pa ni zhes bya ba'i chal phung bu bcas pa'i tshe// seng ge
214b1(mdo): bzhin du 'dzin pa byed par gos bdun khyod nyid song // phyogs bzhir bltas shing 'di ni nga'i skye ba la ma zhes// khyod kyis tshig snyan smras pa de yang khyod la yong la rdzogs// 'jig rted sangs rgyas 'gyur nas/ 
214b2(mdo): drang srong nag pos bstand pa'i// de'i lung bstand pa yang nyams la mye rtag des ma mthong // bus ni yid dkal 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dpal yang ma myong la// byang chub kyang ni rje su ma thob tshul du shi bar
214b3(mdo): 'gyur// bu phyir su la grub cing sdug bsngal su'i gan du 'dud// bdag gi bu cig chung zad gson pa'i srog ni su yis byin/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ shin tu snying rje'i bar ni du byed cing // 
214b4(mdo): skra yang bshig la mdzes pa rnam por la// shi nang tu bu'i sme/ sngags 'don byed la/ sa ste pa 'dug cig 'gre 'di su zhig/ dalha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis smras pa// bdag gis zla ba bcu par
214b5(mdo): rdo rje 'dra ba mngal du bcangs// bu de'i ma ni bdag yin te/ rab tu sdug bsngal rnam par spras// de nas byang chub sems dang / ma'i dbugs 'byin cing smras pa// bu la byams pa khyod kyis
214b6(mdo): ngal ba 'bras bu yod par bya yis ma 'jigs shig/ sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yongs su btang ba ni don yod pa ste/ drang srong nag pos bstand pa yang mngon gsal bar bya'o// par me mdzad kyis lung bstan
214b7(mdo): pa yang mngon gsal bar bya'o// sa ni nam brkyang 'thor bar 'gyur yang srid// rin chen rtse mo lhun po chur 'phyo srid// nyi zla sna ma tshogs sa la ltung 'gyur srid// so so'i skye bo yin yang gyi 'chi// bya
214b8(mdo): 'di la mya ngan khyod ma byed// ring por myi thogs byang chub sangs rgyas mthong // lha mo/ 'phrul gyis thos ma thag tu rab tu dga' ste/ ba spu g.yos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la me tog man 'dur bas gtor te/ 
215a1(mdo): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i sil snyan bkrol zhing / rang gi gnas ka la ba der song ngo // dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te dge slong dang bram ze gang dag kha cika zas chu dus dag par/ 
215a2(mdo): sems pa yod kyis/ ngas kyang zas yul nan tad bya'o snyam so// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/ zas su h+ya shug 'bru cig kho na ste gnyis su myed pa zos so// dge slong dag khyed kyi blo 'di snyam du/ 
215a3(mdo): de'i tshe rgya shug che ba snyam du sems par gyu rad na ni/ de ltar myi blta ste/ de'i tshe'i rgya shug kyang 'di nyid tsam mo// dge slong dag ngas zas rgya shug 'bru gcig tu kho na ste gnyis su myed pa zos pas/ lus
215a4(mdo): shaM nad tu nyams chung zhing rid par gyur to// dge slong dgal/ de lta ste dper na ldum bu a si ta kyi'i tshigs pa dang / ka li ka/ tshigs pa ci 'dra bar nga'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang
215a5(mdo): de 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na srog chags kar ka taka'i rtsib logs ci 'dra bar nga'i rtsib logs kyang de 'dra bar byu da to 'di lta ste dper na bzhon pa'i bres gang ngam/ glang po'i bres
215a6(mdo): kapa rnying pa ngos gnyis zhig pa ni gdung rten kyi bar snang zhing shing mngon no// de bzhin du nga'i rtsib logs gnyis ka nas lus kyi nang snang zhing mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na lan phur byas pa/ mthon dman dang / 
215a7(mdo): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam par gyur da to// de bzhin du nga'i skal tshigs kyang mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam par gyur da to// 'di lta ste dper na sku ba kha bo che gzhon nur bcad pa ni rnyis pa dang / kun tu
215a8(mdo): rnyis pa dang / cubasrub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nga'i mgo yang rnyis pa dang kun tu rnyings pa dang / rtsu brtsub por gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na pos ka'i zla ba za ma la khron pa'i skas dpal bar song ste
215b1(mdo): theg pa chen pos snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin du pa'i myig gi 'bras bu la thong du po ste meg sa chen pos spang bar gyur to// 'di lta sted dpe dang rkab pa 'am/ dmo'i nang pa'i 'a sa ba na
215b2(mdo): dang / lto dang brang la stsogs pa yang de 'dra bar gyurd to// dge slong dag de nas nga gang gi tshe lag pas lto la byug go snyam na/ skal tshigs nyid la reg go// ldang po snyam nas sangs na yang / de bzhin du
215b3(mdo): sgur por gyur da te 'gyel lo// sha zang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus g.yogs pa lag pas phyis pa dang ba s+phu rul pa thas cad lus las lcags so// gang sngon kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur da pa de yA
215b4(mdo): 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang bas myed par gyur to// nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen 'khor ba rna/ mas kyang nga la 'di ltar/ e ma'o dge sbyong ko'u ta ma ni gnag
215b5(mdo): go/ e ma'o dge sbyong ko'u ta ma ni sngo bsangs so// e ma'od ge sbyong go'u ta ma ni nya ma gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di mdog ma dzes pa gsal bar gyu rad pa de yang myed par gyur da to snyam du shes
215b6(mdo): so// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chu ngu la nan tan bya'o// snyam so// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes nas zas su 'bras bu gcig pu kho na ste gnyis su myed pa zos
215b7(mdo): so/ dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba snyam du sems par gyur da na/ de ltar bye blta ste de'i tshe'i 'bras kyang 'di nyid tsam so// dge slong dag nga zas su 'bras bu gcig zos pas lus myur du
215b8(mdo): snga ma bzhin du gyur te/ me ma'o dge sbyong ko'u ta ma nya ya de ku ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sdod 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang skyed par gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyas
216a1(mdo): du bsams te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chu ngu nyid la nan tan du bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/ ngas zas su til 'bru cig tsam kho na ste/ gnyis su myed pa zos pa nas
216a2(mdo): de'i kha dog 'jam po myed par gyurd to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge sbyong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag kha cig zas myi za bas dag par sems te/ bdag gis kyang thams cad kyi
216a3(mdo): thams cad du zas myi za ba nan tan du bya'o snyam nas dge sbyong de dag nga zas kyi za bar 'dug go// dge slong dag ngas ma zos pas lus shi nad tu skams shing nyams chung ba dang rid par gyur da to// 'di lta ste dper na ldum bu
216a4(mdo): a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang / ka li ka'i tshigs pabs kyang nyis/ gyu rad dang / sum gyur dang / bzhi gyurang dang lnga gyu da dang bcu rgyu/ rad kyis nga'i yan lag dang nying lag skem par gyur da to// 'od
216a5(mdo): lnga ste rtsib logs ni srog chags kar ka ti ka'i rtsib logs dang / bzhon pa'i bres khang lta bur gyu rang to// skal tshigs ni lan bu baR+Sha bas pa lta bur gyur da to// mgo'i thod pa ni sku ba kha bo che lta bu
216a6(mdo): gyur to// phyag gi 'bras bu ni khron pa'i skar ma lta bur gyur da to// dge slong dag pa legs par ldang ngo snyam nas lus kyis bskyod na srur por gyur te 'gyel to// sha zang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus g.yog/ 
216a7(mdo): pa lag pas byis pa dang / ba s+phu rul pa thams cad lus las lpags so// gang sngon kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur da ba de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang ba'i phyir myed par gyurd to// nga'i spyod/ 
216a8(mdo): rgyal kyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyin 'khor ba rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ me po dge sbyong kos ta ma ni gnag no// e la po dge sbyong ko'u ta ya ni sngo ba sangs so// e ma ho dge sbyong go luta ma ni nya ma dang
216b1(mdo): ma'i mdog panga'o// sngon 'di'i kha dag 'dzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang byed par gyur to lham du zhes so// de'i kyi rgyal poms gtsangs yang nyid de zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i drung rdul nya gtong ngo // den/ 
216b2(mdo): slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du bya ba rmad du byung ba bstand pa dang / bya ba nyams pa'i sems can rnams las dang bya ba la gzud pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams brjod pa dang
216b3(mdo): ye shes chen po'i yon tan bstand pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbel ba'i phyir/ til 'bru cig tsam rgya shug 'bru cig dang 'bras bu cig gis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa stan da de
216b4(mdo): yid dman pa myed do// byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar// du skyil mo krung bcas nas ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin du gnas te/ myod lam nyams pa myed do// nyi mas pas kyang grib pa la ma
216b5(mdo): song ngo // grib ma las kyang nyi ma la ma song so// rlung dang nye ma dang char pa'i skyabs ma 'tshal to// sha sbrang dang sbrang bu dang / sdig sprul ma sprad do// gshang ba dang gci ba dang mchil ma dang
216b6(mdo): skabs ma bong ngo // bskum pa dang / spang ba la byas so// smos phab pa 'am khas phub kas rkyal ma yin par gnas so// sprin chen po dang yul ngan dang chang ba dang / ser ba dang / ston dang dpyid dang dkun gang
216b7(mdo): yin pa de dag kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus la sa phog go// ban byang chub sems dpa' lag pas kyang ma bsgrubs so// dbang po yang ma bkag go// dbang po'i yul yang ma brdungs so/ 
216b8(mdo): gang dag deng 'ongs pa grong gi gzhon nu 'am/ grong gi gzhon nu ma 'am/ bgrang brdzi 'am phyugs rdzi'am/ chu kun nas/ shin kun nas/ sri kun de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la dung thod kyi 'gre yin pa
217a1(mdo): snyam du sems shing / de la rtsed de de las skud do// de na byang chub sems dpa' lo drug po de dag kyis/ lus ngan pa dang / gong pa dang / rid par gyur te/ de rna ba gnyis su rtsa'am shing bal bcug nas sno'o// 
217a2(mdo): bu ka gnyis su 'byind to// sna'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas/ rna ba'i bu gnyis su 'byind to// rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas kha ba 'byi nad to// khar bcug nas na ba dang sna'i bu gar 'byind to// snga
217a3(mdo): bcug nas rna ba dang sna dang khar 'byind to// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci dpa lto 'phye chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mngon gsum du gyurd pa/ de dag
217a4(mdo): nyin mtshan du gnas shing / byang chub sems dpal la mchod pa byed do// smon lam yang 'debs so// de na byang chub sems dpa' lo drugatu dka' ba spyod pa stond cing / lha dang mya khrag khrig phrag bcu
217a5(mdo): gnyis tshang ba dag theg pa gsum la yongs su smyind par byas so// de la 'di skad ces byas so// byang chub sems dpal khyim byung ba yon tan dag dang ldan pa de// sems can don dang phan pa'i phyir
217a6(mdo): thabs dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan pa skyes// / snyigs pa lnga'i dus kyi tshe// chos dam mos pa'i 'jig rtend po// las dang bya bor 'jig rtend du// 'dzam bu gri pa 'dir skyes par gyur du// mu stegs tshogs kyis rab
217a7(mdo): tu gang // lhad mo dang ni ltas su lta// lus la gnod pa bya ba byed/ byis pa de dag dag par sems// g.yang sa me dang mya ngan 'jug/ sgren mo sa dang thal bas skud// lus ni yongs su gdung ba'i phyir// gdung
217a8(mdo): ba lnga la brtson dang ldan// lag pa brkyang ste rgyu ba dang // myi mkhas kha cig lag pa ldan// bum pa kha ra gzhong las myi len// sgo dang ka bas chod kyi len// gang na khyi yod pa nas byin// 'dug tse'am tshur shog ces
217b1(mdo): las phyin// khyim nas kha zas gcig lend pas/ bdag ni dag par 'gyur snyam sems/ mar dang 'bru mar bu ram zho// nya dang sha dpa'o ma spong // ldam ldum sred pad ma'i rtsa/ gzegs dang ba kra pa lci ba Tha
217b2(mdo): rtsa ba 'bras bu lo ma za// ku sha tshal bu la pa pags// srel byed kha cig sgren mor rgyu// glen pa 'di bden gzhan brdzun snyam// lag pa bsgreng bar byed pa dang // spr-i ba sgreng ral pa bsgreng ba dang / lam lus rab tu
217b3(mdo): rnam par nyams// lam myin gnas shing bde 'gro 'dod// rtsa dang gtun shing thal bar nyal// cher mar nyal zhing cho ga pur 'dug/ kha cig rkang pa gcig pus 'greng // gdong bstod nyi dang zla la lta// chu dpyis
217b4(mdo): mtsho dang lteng ka dang // rgya mtsho chu bo nyi zla dang // shing dang ri'i rtse mo dang // rdza dang sa la phyag kyang 'tshal// glen pa de dag gnod mang gis// lus ni yongasu skams par byed// log par lta dang ldan pa dag/ 
217b5(mdo): myu rab tu ngan song rnams su ltung // nga ni dka' thub brtul shugs da// pa// dka' spyad gang zhig lha dang myis// spyad par nus pa ma// yin pa'i// dka' s+yad drag po rtsom snyam sems// bsam gat+ta/ 
217b6(mdo): gang zhig rang rgyal gyis// blta bar nus pa ma yin pa// rdo rje lta bur brtan gnas pa// mkhas khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// mu stegs rtul shugs ngan pa yis// dga' ba'i lha myi 'di na yod// 
217b7(mdo): de dag yongs su sbyin bya phyir// dka' pyad brtul shugs drag po brtsams// sa steng ci'ang ma bting bar// skyil mo krung ni bcas te 'dug/ rgya shug til dang 'bras bu gcig/ za ba'i cho ga rnam par ston
217b8(mdo): dbugs dbyung rngub pa rnam par spangs// stobs dang ldan pa g.yo ba myed// lo drug par dul sem gtan mchog/ nam mkha' khyam la bsam gtan byed// tog dang rnam par rtog byed pa// g.yol ba myed
218a1(mdo): cing sems rgyu myed// nam mkha'i khams su khyab pa'i// ma' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de ni nyin las grib mar ram// grib las nyin mor song ma byas// lhun po lta bur myi g.yo ba'i// 
218a2(mdo): mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// rlung dang char dang sha spang dang // sdig sprul spang bu skyob phyi byed// rnam par ma lazugs khyod pa yis// mkha' khyab bsam gtan byed// bdag nyid gcig pu'i don gyi
218a3(mdo): phyird// mkha khyab bsam gtan byed pa myin// gzhan du snying rje'i sems kyis ni// 'jig rtend don mang ched du bsgom// grong gi byis pa/ glang rdzi// shin thun dag dang phra thun dag/ de la dur khrod 'dre snyam sems/ 
218a4(mdo): de la sa yis skud byed cing // myi gtsang ba yang 'thor bar byed// de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang // gso ba myed cing 'khrugs myed paramakhal khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// mtho ba myed cing dpe/ 
218a5(mdo): ba myed// lus ma bsrungs par cis ma reg/ bshang ba myi byed ga/ ci myi byed// sgra yis myi 'jigs gzhan myi lta// sha dang khrag/ rnams skams kyu rad te// pags pa rtsa rgyus rus pa lus// skal
218a6(mdo): tshigs dag ni sto bar snang // lan bu khros pa ji bzhin no// gang dag lhag par byas lnga dang // lha myin gnod sbyin dri ba klu// yon tan ldan pa mngon gsum pas// nyin dang mtshan du mchod pa byed// ji ltar mkha'
218a7(mdo): 'dra'i sems ldan 'di// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de 'drar bdag cag myur 'gyur zhes/ smon lam dag kyang 'debs par byed// snying rje'i sems kyis 'jig rten gyi// don pang phyir byed
218a8(mdo): ma gtogs par// bdag phyir ma yin pade 'ablos sbyin// bsam gtan gi ro kyang phyir myin pas// kyi rgol ba rab tu bcom// mu stegs blo nyams zil gyis panan// 'go reg byang chub ga la yod// byang chub
218b1(mdo): skal mang rnyed rga zhes// 'od srung la ni tshig smras pa'i// las dang bya ba rab tu bstand// skye bo dag ni dka' bya'i phyir// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// lha myi khrag khrig bcu gnyis tshang / 
218b2(mdo): theg pa gsum la rab tu brtul// de'i ched du blo gros bzang // mkha khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// / dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// 
218b3(mdo): dge slong dag bdun sdig can yang byang chub sems dpal lo drug gi bar du dka' ba khyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// phyi bzhin 'brangs te grags bltas skabs btsal kyang // nam yang glags cung zad kyang ma rnyed do// de glags
218b4(mdo): ma rnyed nas yi chad de yid la bcags bzhin du song ngo // // / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dgon pa nyams ni dka' ba dang / nags tshal gyel pa sgra byed dang // ldeng rgyas kyi ni shar phyogs na// 
218b5(mdo): chu klung ne ran 'dzan der// spong ba'i phyir ni brtson pa byas// rtag/ tu mthu' rtsal brtan pa po// grub dang bde' bya thob bya'i phyir// brtson pas rab tu rtul de la// bdud ni 'jam zhing snyan po'i tshig
218b6(mdo): smra bar byed cing 'ong bar 'gyur// kye srog gces kyis 'tsho bar gyis// gson na chos ni spyod par 'gyur// gson tshe bya ba gang yod pa// de dag byas na mya ngan myed// khyod dge mdog nyams dman par 'gyur
218b7(mdo): khyod ni shi la thug cing 'dug/ 'chi ba'i cha ni stong rnyed tsam// mchig tsham zhig gson par zad// sbyin pa dag ni rtag tu byin// me'i sbyin sreg byin sreg byos// 'on tang bsod nams chen por 'gyur// spong ba
218b8(mdo): yis ni ci zhig bya// spong ba'i lam ni sdug bsngal te// sems 'dul ba ni bya dka' ste// de tshe bdud kyis de skad cig/ byang chub sems dpa' de la spras// de skad smra ba'i bdud de la// byang chub seMs
219a1(mdo): dpas 'di skad smras// sdig can myos pa'i rtsa lag po// khyod ni rang gi don phyir 'ongs// nga la bsod nams cung zad kyang // don tu gnyer ba byed do bdud// gang dag bsod nams don tu gnyer// 
219a2(mdo): de la 'di skad sba ba'i rigs// 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi yin pas// phyi 'chi snyam du nga mi sems// tshangs par spyod la gzhol 'gyur bas// phyir ldog par ni myi bya'o// chu klung dag gi chu rgyun kyang // rlu
219a3(mdo): gis rnam par skyems byed na// bskams pa nyid kyis khrag cas swA// 'di yis ci phyir skams kyi 'gyur// khrag ni skams par gyurd pa dang / de'i 'og tu sha skams gyur // sha ni zad par gyurd pa dang / 
219a4(mdo): byir zhing sems ni dang bar gyur// byir zhing 'dun dang brtson/ 'grus dang // ting nge 'dzind kyang gnas par gyur // da ni de/ da ltar gnas pas na// tshor ba dam pa thob gyur kyang // lus
219a5(mdo): dang srog la myi lta ste// sran thub dag par byung la ltos// pal 'dun pa yod gyurd cing // brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab yod/ 'i brtson 'grus bskyod nus pa// 'jig rten na ni ngas ma mtho/ 
219a6(mdo): srog chad shi ba ches bla ste// 'tsho ba ngan pa de lta myin// g.yul ngo nge shi ba legs pa ste// pham nas gson pa de lta byen// sngar ma dpung las myi rgyal ste// dpa' bo dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur// rgyal
219a7(mdo): yang de ni rlom sems byed// bdud khyod las ni myur rgyal bya// 'dod pa khyod kyi dang po'i dpung // myi dga' ba ni gnyis pa yin// khyod kyi gsum pa bkres dang skom// sred pa dpung tshogs bzhi pa yin// 
219a8(mdo): rmugs dang gnyid ni lnga pa ste// 'jigs pa drug pa brjod pa yin// khyod kyi the tsom bdun pa ste/ 'khro dang 'chab pa brgyad pa yin// thob dang tshigs bcad bkur sti dang // log par grags pa gang thob dang / 
219b1(mdo): bdag ma spyod par byed pa dang // gzhan sa spyod par byed pa dang // de dag rgan pa'i ma lag tu lung ba 'dun kyi dbyu yin no// dge sbyong bram ze 'jig na// 'din gragapas la dpa dang // khyod dbungag
219b2(mdo): yin lhar bcas kyi// 'jig rten du 'di ni rab dul ba// po btangs byas snod chus bzhin// shes rab kyis ni de dag bshig/ dran pa legs pa nyer bzhag ste// shes rab legs pa sgom byas nas// 
219b3(mdo): shes bzhin du ni khyod par bya// tho ngan khyod kyis ci byar yod// de skad ces smras pa dang // bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid kyi bde ste// yid pa rangs nas// yid la gcags bzhin du de nyid du
219b4(mdo): snang bar gyur to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dang/ la 'di snyam du sems che// dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig la ngas pa dang ma 'ongs pa dpad ltar byung ba'i dus na/ bdag la gno// 
219b5(mdo): byed cing // lus la gdung ba byed de// sdug bsngal drag po/ tsha ba mye bzad pa// yid du myi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pas/ de dag shind tu sdug bsngal ba myong ngo snyam mo// dge slong dag
219b6(mdo): ngas 'di snyam du bsams te// spyod pa 'di dag bsgrub pa 'das myi'i chos tha ma las mchog tu gyurd pa// 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon tu ma byas te// 'odi ni byang chub kyi
219b7(mdo): ma yin/ lam 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba 'byung ba nub par byed pa ma yin te// byang chub kyi lam ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba nub par byed pa gzhan
219b8(mdo): zhig yod do snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ nges pa'i skyed mos tshal du shi ba 'dzam bu'i grib ma la 'dug ste// 'dod pa rnams las dben pa sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos rnams las dbyen
220a1(mdo): pa rtog pa dang bcas pa// dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nas// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar rdzogs par byas ste// gnas pa/ 
220a2(mdo): de byang chub kyi lam yin te/ skye ba dang rgab dpa'achi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba rnams nub par 'gyur ba yin snyam nas// de byang chub kyi lam yin no snyam ste/ nga'i rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ 
220a3(mdo): ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ 'di ltar nyam chung bar gyur pas ni lam de mngon par rdzogs par bya skye nus so// gal te / nga 'di ltar lus ngam zhing nyam chung bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis byang
220a4(mdo): chub kyi snying por song na ni// ngas phyi ma'i skye bo la snying brtse ba dar myi 'gyurd te// 'di yang byang chub kyi lam ma yin gyi/ zas rags pa zos la lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de// de nas gdod
220a5(mdo): byang chub kyi snying por 'gro'o snyam mo// dge slong dag de na lha'i du gang dag ngan pa la mos pa de dag gis nga'i sems kyis yongasu rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ ngag la ba der 'ongs te ngal 'di
220a6(mdo): skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa zhal zas rags pa ya gsol cig/ bdag cag gis ba spu'i khung bud ma dngas bstsal pa bgyi'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag ni zas kyi za bar bdag/ 
220a7(mdo): nyid kyis dam bcas la/ bdag gi spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nye 'khor ba rnams kyis kyang dge sbyong ko'u ta ma ni zas myi za ba yin par yang shes te/ ngan pa la mos pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag gis nga'i ba spun
220a8(mdo): khung bur mdangs bcug par gyurd nas/ nga shind tu brdzun smra bar gyur da to snyam ste// de nas byang chub sems dpas rdzun smra ba spang ba'i phyir// lha'i bu de dag gi tshig sa mnyan par kha zas rags pa bza' ba
220b1(mdo): sems btud do// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lo drug gi bar du brtul shugs dang dka' thub nyams su blangs nas stan de las la dngas te/ kha zas rags pa 'di lta ste/ bu ram gyi dbu pa
220b2(mdo): dang / modan sran sde bu'i 'u bcud dang ha re nu ka'i khu ba/ chu dang / zan dang 'bras can dang 'dren ma bza'o// zhes tshig tu brjod do// dge slong dag de nas lnga sde bzang po dag 'di snyam du bsams te/ dge
220b3(mdo): sbyong go'u ta mas lam 'di dang / bsgrub pa 'dis myi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur da pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba gang yang mngon gsum du byed ma nus na/ kha zas rags pa 'di zos te bzod nyams la sbyor
220b4(mdo): ba dang ldan par gnas pas ci nus te/ myi mkhas pa byis pa yin/ no snyam du bsams nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas nas so// dang ste/ grong khyer ba re na ser song nas drang srong ltung ba ri dgas kyi nag
220b5(mdo): su gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thog pa nyid du dka' baspyad pa spyod pa na grong ba'i bu mo gzhon nu bcus blta ba dang bya ga bya ba'i phyir bsnyen bkur byas so// lnga sde bzang po de dag gis
220b6(mdo): kyang rim gror byas shing rgya zug 'bru gcig dang 'bras bu gcig dang til 'bru cig dbul ba yang phul lo// grong bu'i bu mo bcu na bu mo stobs ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / stobs byed ma dang / shinang tu sdug dang / sde las/ 
220b7(mdo): rnam par rgyal dang / a ti mug ta ka'i 'phreng ba dang / mdzes ma dang / rdza byed ma dang / skra lcang lo rgyas dang / ral bu can dang / legs skyes ma zhes bya ste/ gzhon nu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshod ma'i
220b8(mdo): rnam pa de dag byas te phul lo// byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag zos nas rim gyis spyod yul gyi grong du bsod snyoms spyad pas mdog dang gzugs dang / stobs dang ldan par gyur da to// de tshun chad byang chub ses
221a1(mdo): dpal la// dge sbyong mdzes pa/ dge sbyong chen po zhes mdzer to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid du dka' ba pyad pa spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpas brtul zhugs dang dka'
221a2(mdo): thub nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba dang / lus rtag par bya ba'i phyir/ grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes mas nyin gcig bzhin du/ bram ze brgyad brgya la zan byin zhing 'di skad du/ bdag gi zas zos pas/ byang chub
221a3(mdo): sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa re shog shig ces smon lam yang btab bo// dge slong dag lo drug 'das nas/ dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ gal te bdag gis 'dos
221a4(mdo): g.yogs 'ga' zhig rnyed nas re stes snyam mo// dge slong dag de'i tshwa grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba zhig shen de sha na'i ras kyis bkris te/ dur khrod du bor bar gyurd pa'i phyag
221a5(mdo): dang khrod pa dengs mthong nas ngas phyag dar khrod pa de blang ba'i phyir/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te dgus nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dang / de nas sa bra'i lhas/ bar snang gi lha rnams la bsgra
221a6(mdo): bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skye sa pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor te/ phyag dar khrod pa la sems bdud pa ngo mtshar te/ grogs po dag 'di ni rmad du byung ngo // bar sna
221a7(mdo): ke lha rnams kyis ma tha'i sgra thos nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la sgra bsgrags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pas kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa la'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum khas kyang 'thab bral ba la'o// 
221a8(mdo): 'thab bral bas kyang dga' ldan pa la'o// dga' ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o// 'phrul dga' bas kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa la'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs ris pa'i bar du'o// skad ces
221b1(mdo): de dang thang cig de dang yud tsam de la grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor te phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/ 'di rmad du byung ba'o zhes sgra gcig
221b2(mdo): dang / brjod pa cig gis 'og byin gyi gnas kyi bar du grag par gyur da to// de nas byang chub sems dpas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyed na/ gal te chu zhig rnyed na re stes snyam mo// de nas
221b3(mdo): de nyid du lhas lag pa sa la brdabs pa dang / der rdzing bu zhig byung bar gyur da te/ de bas pa du yang lag pa brdabs pa'i rdzi de zhes grags so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gi
221b4(mdo): chu ni rnyed na gal te phyag dar khrod pa 'di bkru ba'i rdo leb cig rnyed na re/ stes snyam pa dang / skad cig de nyid la brgya byin gyis rdo leb pa zhag nas/ de la byang chub sems dpas phyag dang khrod pa de bkrus so// 
221b5(mdo): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad sa spras so// skyes bu dam pa 'di kho bo la bcol cig dang / 'o na sa bkru'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyi
221b6(mdo): bstand par bya ba'i phyir// brgya byin la ma byin par bdag nyid kyis bkrus so// de lus ngal te chad nas rdzi nas byung snyam pa dang / bdud sdig can 'phra dog gis tshogs dang ldan pas/ rdzing bur gad pa mthon po zhig
221b7(mdo): sprul to// rdzing de'i nang na shing grub byed ces bya ba mthon po zhig yod te/ byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang mthun par bya bas/ lha mo la phan btags pa'i phyir shing de'i lha mo la smras pa/ lha mo shing gi yal ga spod/ 
221b8(mdo): cig/ des kyang shing gi yal ga smad nas/ byang chub sems dpas de la 'dzus te byung ngo // byung nas kyang shing sgrub byed de'i drung du phyag dar khrod pa chos gos snam sbyar du byas nas/ drubs te de sang du'ang de la phyag dang
222a1(mdo): drubs pa zhes mying du grags so// de nas tshigs gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba des lha'i gos ngur smyig gi mtshon du btsos pa rung ba/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa dag byang chub
222a2(mdo): sems dpal la phul lo// byang chub sems dpa'as kyang de dag kyang blangs te// snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos nas/ spyod yul gyi grong du phyogs pa dang / de na lha rnams kyis steng rgyas kyi sded dpon
222a3(mdo): phyi grong na dka' byed ces bya ba'i grong myo zhig yod pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la nam byed tsam na smras pa/ khyod kyis gang gi phyir mchod sbyin byas pa de brtul shugs nyams 'og tu chud nas/ de kha zas bzang po rags
222a4(mdo): pa bza' bar sems kyis/ sngon khyod kyis bdag gi zas zos na byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog shig ces smon lam btab
222a5(mdo): pa gang yin pa'i khyod kyi bya ba de gyis shig/ dge slong dag de/ nas grong myi dga' byed kyi bu mo legs skyes mas lha de dag gi tshig/ de zos nas/ myur ba myur bar ba stong gi 'o ma lan bdun du snying
222a6(mdo): khur byas pa bzang po bcag tu myu da pa snying po can blangs te/ phreng sa nas kyang 'os de/ 'brags pa ba sar pa dag dang / phru gas bar thugs nas thab sar pa bcugs te/ 'thas de sgrub bo// de sgrub pa na/ 
222a7(mdo): snga ltas 'di dag snang ste/ 'o ma de'i nang na dpal bye'u dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang / pad ma dang sdong ris las bsogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo // de nas des 'di snyam du bsams te ltas 'di lta
222a8(mdo): bu dag snang ba lags na/ byang chub sems dpa'as zas thos nas byang chub thob par 'gyur du the com myed do snyam pa dang / rgya mtsho ba shes shing chog shes pa'i mtshan 'khan phyogs der byind par gyu rad nas/ des kyang bdud na
222b1(mdo): pa nyid lung bstand to// de nas legs skyes mas thug pa de tshos pa dang / thang la bzhag ste me tog gis gtor da/ spos chus gtor da nas gus par bstan bting ste/ byan mo gong ma zhes bya ba la smras pa/ kong ma/ 
222b2(mdo): song la bram ze bos shig/ ngas ni 'o thug sprang ci can 'di blta'o// jo mo legs so zhes de'i ltar mnyan nas shar gyi phyogs logs su song ba dang des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // de bzhin du lho phyogs logs
222b3(mdo): su song na yang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // de bzhin du nub phyogs dang byang phyogs logs su song na yang / de dang der byang chub sems dpal mthong ngo // de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis gzhan
222b4(mdo): mu stegs can thams cad tshar gcad par gyur pas 'ag tsam yang myi snang ngo // de nas de slar log ste/ jo mo la 'di skad ces smras so// gang dang gang du mchis kyang de dang de na dge sbyong mdzes pa gda'
222b5(mdo): ba las/ dge sbyong bram ze gzhan ni 'gal yang myi gda'o// gas skyes mas smras pa/ de nyid bram ze yin te/ de'i phyir 'di ba thams kyis gong ma song la de nyid pos shig/ jo ma legs so zhe/ 
222b6(mdo): smras te/ gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ legs skyes ma zhes bgyi bas 'drend to zhes smras so// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes / 
222b7(mdo): khyim du song ste stan bting ba la 'dug go// dge slong dag de nas grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes mas/ 'o thug sprab rtsi can gyis gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la yul lo// de nas byang chub ses
222b8(mdo): dpas 'di snyam du bsams te legs skyes mas kha zas 'di lta bu 'di byin pa 'di bdag gis deng zos te/ the tsom myed par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo// / 
223a1(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpapa pas te thangs te/ grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes pa sa 'di skad ces smras so// kyele gser gyi snod chen po 'di'i skur bya/ des smras pa khyod sdoms shig/ byang chub sems dpas/ 
223a2(mdo): smras pa/ kho bo la ni snod 'di lta bu myi dgos so// legs skyes mas smras pa/ ci dges su mdzod cig bdag ni snod ma mchis par su la yang zas myo co lad to// de nas byang chub sems dpas zas de thogs te/ lteng rgyas
223a3(mdo): nas byung nas dro la bab pa dang / chu'i klung chu bo ne ran 'dza na'i ngogs su song ste/ zas dang chos gos rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas byang chub sems dpal lus bsil bar bya ba'i phyir klung ne ran 'ja ni nang du zhugs so// 
223a4(mdo): dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khrus byed pa'i cha lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpal la mchod pa'i las kyi/ phyir/ lha'i a ka ru dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang byug pa dag kyang klung
223a5(mdo): du ldugs shing / lha'i me tog kha dog sna tshogs dag kyang chu'i dang du gtor to// de'i tshe klung chen po ni ran 'dzan lha'i spos rnas dang / me tog rnams kyis gang bar gyur da te 'bab po// byang chub
223a6(mdo): sems dpa' spos chu gang gis khrus byas par gyur pa de/ lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis blangs te/ mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang rang gyi gnas su khyer ro// byang chub sems dpa'
223a7(mdo): sgra dang / mag coms gang yin pa de dag kyang grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes mas bkra shis pa yin no snyam nas mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir dakhyer ro// byang chub sems dpa' klung nas byung nas 'dug par
223a8(mdo): 'dod de sringal blta'o// de nas krung ne ran 'jana'i klu'i bu mo gang yin pa de sa'i 'og na sa byung ste/ yid las byung ba'i seng ge'i 'i byang chub sems dpa' la phus nas/ bya bachub sems dpal de la 'dug ste/ dros
223b1(mdo): pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la/ snying brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/ ci tsam dgos par lo thug spra ba ci can de 'thungs so// 'thungs nas kyang gser gyi snod chen po de la ma chags par chur bor ro// bor ma thag tu klu'i rgyal
223b2(mdo): po rgya mchos mchod pa'i 'os yin no zhes dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de blangs nas rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas myig stong pa grong khyer 'jigs pa/ nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su sprul nas/ kha rdo rje'i mthur bsgyur te
223b3(mdo): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las gser gi snod chen po de 'phrog tu brgal na/ ma nus nas/ rang gi gzugs kyis gus par byas te/ blangs nas mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas su
223b4(mdo): khyer ro// khyer nas kyang snod chen po'i dge 'dun gyi dus ston bya/ sa te/ de sang du'ang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lo ga ni dag bzhin du snod chen po'i dus stond byed do// seng ge'i khri de 'ang
223b5(mdo): klu'i bu mo de nyid kyis mchod rtenang du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyi rakhyer ro// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas zas rags pa thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs pa
223b6(mdo): shes rab kyi stobs kyis skad cig de nyid la/ lus la snga ma'i kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpel byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba yang byung bar gyur to// 
223b7(mdo): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lo drug bar du brtul shugs nyams 'og chud byas bcom ldan 'ablo gros 'di snyam sems/ gal te bdag ni 'di ltar rang bzhin bsam gtan ye shes stobs ldan pa/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du
223b8(mdo): song ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'tshang rgyar byas na ni// de lta na yang bdag gis phyi ma'i skye bo dag la snying brtsem byas gyur// bsod nams ngan ngon tsam dang ldan pa'i lha phyi 'di dag ngan pas ye shes tshol// de dag
224a1(mdo): ni nyams chung gyur da na bdud rtsi 'chang rgyar byed pa myi nus sam/ kha zas rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed pa byas nas ni// shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyend pa/ 
224a2(mdo): nyid 'tshang rgya bya ba bsams// grong ba'i bu mo sngan chad spyod pa spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de// 'dren pa rtul shugs grub par shog ces de lta bu'i yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed// de ni lha yis bskul
224a3(mdo): ba thos nas de tshe'o thug sprang rtsi can blangs te// klung gi 'gram du song nas dka' ba'i yid kyis ne ran 'dza na'i ngos na 'dug/ bskal pa stong du spyod pa khyad cing dbang po zhi la rab tu zhi ba de/ lha dang klu'i
224a4(mdo): tshogs dang drang srong dag gis bskor te ne ran 'dza nar 'ongs// pha rold rgal nas sems can sgrol ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byar ba sems nas ni// thub pa dag po dr-i myed 'jig rtend snying rtse phyir
224a5(mdo): ni klung du zhugs te 'khru// bye ba phrag stong lha dag dga' bo'i yid kyis spos rnams dang ni phye ma dag/ klung du 'thor zhing sems can dam pa bkru ba'i don tu chu la gang bar byed// byang chub seMn/ 
224a6(mdo): dpa' dri byed des pa bkrus te/ ngogs na 'dug par shes gyur nas// lha stong rab tu dga' ste sems can dag pa bkrus pa'i chu de mchod phyir khyer// dur spyugs bzang po dri ma myed pa'i kos dag/ lha'i bu y-is
224a7(mdo): de la byin// rung ba dag dang sham thabs bgos nas bcom ldan 'das ni chu rlung ngos na 'dug/ klu'i bu mo dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis seng ge'i khri yang bshams// de la 'jig rten dag gi myig 'byed
224a8(mdo): yid kyang rab tu zhi pa de 'dug nas// blo gros ldan pa legs skyes ma des gser gyi snod du kha zas blugs te byind// rkang par phyag 'tshal nas ni de dag kha lo sgyur ba bdag gi gsol zhes byas// blo gros ldan
224b1(mdo): pas ci tsam dgos par zas kyang zos nas snod ni chu bor te// de ni grong khyer 'jig pa lha'i bla yas mchod par bya zhes khyer da/ gang tshe rgyal bas kha zas rags pa dam pa zos pa de'i skad cig la// de'i lus kyi stob/ 
224b2(mdo): dang gzi brjid dag dang dpal yang snga ma kho bzhin du gnas// legs skyes ma dang lha rnams dag la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas// seng ge ngang pa'i stabs dang glang po'i 'gros kyis byang chub shing
224b3(mdo): drung chas// // ne ran 'dza na'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcwo brgyad pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpal krung ne ran 'ja nar khrus byas te/ zas zos nas lus kyi mthu stobs
224b4(mdo): bskyed do// bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing gi rgyal po byang chub chen po'i drung ga la bder/ skyes bu chen po'i stabs gang yin pa des song ste/ 
224b5(mdo): myi bskyod pa'i stabs dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i stab/ sa dang / ri'i rgyal po lhun po lta bu'i stabs dang / myi mngon/ pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / ya yo myed pa'i stabs dang / 
224b6(mdo): 'tshe ba myed pa'i stabs dang / rings pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / 'khrug pa myed pa'i stabs dang / 'byor pa byed pa'i stabs dang / 'drud pa myed pa'i stabs dang / zhum pa byed pa'i stabs dang / ha cang myi sdod
224b7(mdo): pa'i stabs dang / mye g.yos pa'i stabs dang / tab tab po myed pa'i stabs dang / tshul du shes pa'i stabs dang / dri ma myed pa'i stabs dang / dge ba'i stabs dang / zhe sdang byed pa'i stabs dang / kati mug myed
224b8(mdo): pa'i stabs dang / chags pa myed pa'i stabs dang / seng ge'i stabs dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / klu'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / sred byed kyi bu'i stabs dang / sa la myi reg pa'i stabs dang / rtsibs
225a1(mdo): stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i ri mo sa la snang ba'i stabs dang / sor mo dra bas 'brel cing sen mo zangs lta bu'i stabs dang / sgra 'byin pa'i stabs dang / ri rdob pa'i stabs dang / mthon dman mnyam par
225a2(mdo): byed pa'i rkang pa'i 'thil gyi stabs dang / dra ba'i bar nas 'od dpe zer phyung nas sa la reg na/ bide 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / pad mo'i dri ma myed pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i stabs dang / sngon dge ba la legs par
225a3(mdo): pyad pa'i 'gros kyi stabs dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhud pa'i stabs dang / rdo rje ltar bsam pa brtan zhing myi phyed pa'i stabs dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad gcod pa'i stabs dang / bde ba thas
225a4(mdo): cad bskyed pa'i stabs dang / tha dad pa'i lam stond pa'i stabs dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs myed par byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs pas kyi rgol ba chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa'i stab
225a5(mdo): dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang nyon mongs pa sel ba'i stabs dang / 'khor ba'i phyogs myed par byed pa'i stabs dang / brgya byind dang tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rtend skyong
225a6(mdo): ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i stabs dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po na/ dpa' bo gcig pu'i stabs dang / rang byung zil gyis ma non pa'i stabs dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i
225a7(mdo): stabs dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyi skabs dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i skabs dang / zhi ba rdul myed pa'i bdud kyi 'jigs pa myed pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i
225a8(mdo): grong khyer du 'gro ba'i stabs ste/ de 'dra ba'i stabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por chis so// dge slong dag klung ne ran 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der rlung gi sprin kyi lha'i bu rnams
225b1(mdo): kyis lam phyag dang byas par gyurd to// char sprin rnams kyis spos chus chag chag btab bo// me tog kyang chal mar bkram mo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'il 'jig rtend gyi khams 'di na/ shing ji ste/ 
225b2(mdo): yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shing byang chub ga la de logs su rtse mo 'dud par gyurd to// gang dag de'i nyin par bcas pa'i byis pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba de logs su 'gro bstand te nyal lo// 
225b3(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na ri rab la sosogs po reg dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po ga la de logs su 'dud par gyur da to// rlung ne ran 'ja nas bzung ste/ 
225b4(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams/ kyis 'tshon rgyang grags tsam tshun chad kyi lam mngon par bkod pa dar gyur da to// lam de'i 'gram g.yas g.yo su 'di rin po che
225b5(mdo): sna bdun gyi stegs bu dbang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mtho ba/ nga du rin po che'i dra ba bris pa/ lha'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan da nga ba dan gyis legs par brgya nad pa 'phrul to// mda' rgyangs
225b6(mdo): tsam rin po che sna bdun gyi zhing ta la'i stegs bu de bas mtho ba mngon par sprul te/ shing ta la thams cad rin po ches brgyus pas phan tshun 'brel par 'dug go// shi ta la gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing spom chus
225b7(mdo): yongasu kang ba/ gser gi phye ma bdald pa/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar po las batshogs pas kang ba rin po che'i stegs bus bskor pa/ nor bu rin po che bye du rgyas them smras
225b8(mdo): brgyad pa chu sregs dang / bya kar dang / ngang pa dang / dur pa dang / khrung khrung dang rma bya sgra 'byin pa'i rdzing dag byas so// lam de na lha'i bu mo brgyad// dr-i ni chag chag 'debs so// lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni me tog sil ma
226a1(mdo): lha'i dri gsung dang ldan par 'bor ro// shing ta la thams cad kyi mdun logs su rin po che'i mkha' rten bzhag ko// rin po che'i mkhal rten thams cad la/ lha'i bu mo can dan dang a ka ru'i phye ma'i
226a2(mdo): phur ma thog pa dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bdug pa'i phog por thogs pa brgyad khri 'khod par gyur da to// rin po che'i mkhal rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo lha'i klu dbyangs len pa lnga khri 'khod par gyur to// 
226a3(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhing rnams kyi rab tu bskyod/ 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de byind/ sil snyan brgya stong ni sgrogs/ me tog mang po'i char chen po ni 'bebs/ gos brgya ma
226a4(mdo): me phyag gcis/ da krung na pa bya ni dzin byed/ bye mo dang / rkyeg 'a dang / 'a brug dang // sa kyi ga dang / ga ga de sa du ngas da bus dang byag rdzonas kya mya mo go byed/ zhi la kyu song ni lu zhig 'i ti/ da pa rnam pa de lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po
226a5(mdo): song ngo // gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpal byang chub mngon du ra rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa de nyid kyi nub mo// stong gsu kyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des
226a6(mdo): tshangs pa'i 'khor chen po de la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po banabs pa/ dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/ 
226a7(mdo): go cha sra ba banabs pa/ thugs yongasu myi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad tsar phyi nad pa pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la
226a8(mdo): mang la dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa zas cad kyi bya ba shin tu mkhyend pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rje su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thas cad la shi nad tu
226b1(mdo): zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thos// 
226b2(mdo): cad la rab tu tha rad pa'i lam stond pa/ ded dpon chen por gyur da pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad
226b3(mdo): yang dag par bsgrub pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ rtog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig rtend kyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos
226b4(mdo): pa/ pad ma chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang / kho ba 'khro ba dang bral ba/ myi g.yo ba myi bskyod pa/ re rab chen to/ da lta bu/ shind tu dri ma myed pa/ shind tu yong su dag pa/ shind
226b5(mdo): tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/ chos dzas cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpal de bdud kyi sde rab tu grang
226b6(mdo): ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongasasu rdzogs pa/ 
226b7(mdo): mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrag pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thos cad tshil par mdzad pa dang / sems can thos cad kyi chos kyi phyog rnam par spyang ba
226b8(mdo): phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas char ka cad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mngal dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir/ 
227a1(mdo): byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la grogs po dag/ khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang
227a2(mdo): sbyar gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gi bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis byabs dang snying rje dka' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes tshang
227a3(mdo): pa'i lam snang ba// bskal pa stong du 'apyod pa de ni byang chub shi badrung chas par gyu nga// thub pa de la bsam pa'i rtul shugs bsgrub par byed pa'i mchod pa legs par bya// de la skyabs su song na ngan
227a4(mdo): 'gro la 'jigs dang myi phrad kyi khom gyi 'gyur te// lha'i nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas yangs 'gro bar 'gyur// lo drug bar du dka' ba spyod pa spyad nas 'di ni
227a5(mdo): byang chub shing drung bzhud// kun kyang dag la zhi ba rab tu mchu ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par bgyis// de ni stong sum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po ste
227a6(mdo): brgya byin tshangs pa nyi zla'i grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang myed// gang bcas tshe nabye ba khrag khrig rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur da pa// de ni ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen mchog
227a7(mdo): drung bzhud// gang gi tshe spyi tshugs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa yin zhing // gang gi sku la mtshan rag dam pa ldan zhing sum bcu rtsa gnyis legs brgya nad pa// gang gi gsung 'dir
227a8(mdo): yid du 'ong zhing snyan la nam tha tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan cing // gang gi thugs ni rab zhi blo pa bral ba/ de la mchod pa byed du 'ding// gang dag blo grom brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su 'asam gtan/ 
227b1(mdo): bdel bas 'da' bya dang // nyon mongs 'ching ba'i khri shing kun dang 'dra ba de dag gcod par byed 'dod dang // gzhan las ma thos par ni rang rgyal byang chub zhi pa 'chi byed thob 'dod dang // gal te sa ga zu
227b2(mdo): dag na sangs rgyas nyid 'dod de dag 'dren pa mchod phyir gyis// gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin po che rnams mtha' las dang // khang bzangs ska khung bsil khab mang ldan pa
227b3(mdo): dang zung du 'brel dang bzhon pa dang // me tog 'phreng ba shi nad tu mdzes pas brgya nad nas skyed pos tshal gyis rab brgyan dang // rka lag 'gro dang myig rnams yongasu btang ba de ni byang chub snying por
227b4(mdo): phyogs// dge slong dag de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po skad cig de la// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig te/ na gyi khams 'dir phyi nad te lag 'brel ltar mnyam par
227b5(mdo): ber gyur pa/ gyo mo dang rdo myed pa/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / bye du rgya dang dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dbang ngul ma ba/ rtswa sngo zhing 'jam la ka yas su 'khyil zhing g.yung ru
227b6(mdo): 'khyil pa/ ka ma yin de'i gos ltar reg na bde' ba/ de dag gis sbyong na bu kyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rtend kyi khams khyab pa 'dir phyi dang // de'i me rgya mtsho chen po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chun
227b7(mdo): rgyu ba'i sems can rnamapa sa / gnod 'azung 'ad kyang byed do// 'jig rten gi khams de ltar brgyan pa 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dnga'ajig rten stong ba rnams kyis mthong ni/ 
227b8(mdo): sems dpams mad pa'i sas kyi bye/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya gro pa legs par brgyad do rte/ byang chub sems dpa' sa mchod pa'i las kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / lha'i dang kyi'i la
228a1(mdo): shind tu 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnaMs kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa/ brgya nad par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs
228a2(mdo): kyis brgyand pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig lta bung snang bar gyur to// 'jig rtend gyi bar dag dang / rinag po dang khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dag kyang mye snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
228a3(mdo): dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyis gsal bar snang ngo // byang chub kyi snying po yongs su sbyong ba'i lha'i bu bcu drug yod de/ 'di lta ste lha'i bu ud ka li zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu mud kha li zhes
228a4(mdo): bya ba dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / dpa' stobs dang / dpung / rgyan stobs dang / rab brtan dang / sa 'dzin dang / snang byed dri ma myed dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chos kyi me tog dang / 
228a5(mdo): 'gro grub dang / myig thogs pa khyed dang / bkod pa chen po dang / tshul khrims rnam dag dri ldan dang / pad ma'i 'od de lha'i bu bcu rtsa gakho de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po yongasu skyong ba dag ste/ zas
228a6(mdo): cad kyang phyir gyi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pag swAn ko// de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po brgyan te/ dpag tshad brgya bcu 'o yug tu rin po ches bdun gyi stegs
228a7(mdo): bum pa bdun gyis ni 'azhor// shing ta la'i 'breng ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po rje'i dril bu gser ka'i drwa ba rim bdun dang/ rin po che btul pa 'is 'dun gyis banong / lajas bu'i du tho ga bang kyi glegs
228a8(mdo): rin pa sems cad kyi rnam pa dag dang / gzer gyi tshong po dag dang 'jam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi bdas dag gi 'di khyabs par byab/ rnying pa mi tshig gi slos kyis ni 'jugs/ rin pa tsho'i dram pa'i tham mo// 
228b1(mdo): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kyi khams tha dad pa dag na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa/ bzang ba mngon du mchod pa/ lha yul pa dang kyi yul ba gang dag yod pa de dag thas cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po de
228b2(mdo): snang bar gyurd to// phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skyes pa dang / zab la skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig
228b3(mdo): rtend ki khams tha dad pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs tshad myed pa dpag tu byed pa dag gis/ byang chub kyi snying po brgyan par byed pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po de
228b4(mdo): snang bar gyurd to// de ltar lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongs su sbyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag smra/ lad par gyur da te/ de dag lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za
228b5(mdo): dang / lha ma yin dag gis mthong nas/ rang rang gi gnas du khrod tsam gyi 'du shes bskyed par gyur da to// bkod pa 'di dag thong nas/ shi nad tu ngo mtsha rad cher 'dzind to// e mo'o bas
228b6(mdo): nams kyi rnam par smyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa legs so zhes ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod do// byang chub kyi zhing gi lha mo bzhi yod de/ 'di lta ste 'od sa dang / snyan ldan dang / yid bzang
228b7(mdo): dang / mdangs ldan ma ste byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi po dag gis kyang byang chub seMs dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi shing pha ba phun gsum tshogs pa/ sdong po phun sum tshogs pa/ yal ka dpalo ma dang / 
228b8(mdo): me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs phun gsum tshogs pa khrun dang spobs phun sum tshogs pa/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ shi nad tu 'grel pa/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mtho ba de dang 'tsham par 'phye/ 
229a1(mdo): bkra ba lA na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rin po che shipat+pa la li 'phreng ba rim 'dun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun dang
229a2(mdo): rin po che brgyus pa'i 'phreng ba'i rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing phyi rim bsko rad pa/ shing yongasu sa brtol dnga'adra ba/ myig gis blta bas kyi ngoms pa bskyed do// gang du byang chub sems dpal 'dug
229a3(mdo): nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil te/ sra ba snying po yod pa/ myi phyed pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin gnas
229a4(mdo): par gyurd pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi snying por/ 'gro ba na/ lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed de/ 'od de des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyurd to// / myi khom pa thams cad
229a5(mdo): bcad par gyu rad to// ngan 'gro'i tshor ba thams cad bskams par gyur to// sems can gang dag dbang po ma tshang ba de dag gi dbang po yod su rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad
229a6(mdo): sos par gyur to// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs 'byind pa thob par gyurd to// bcing bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las grol bar gyurd to// sems can dbul po rnams ni longs khyod dang ldan/ 
229a7(mdo): bar gyu rad to// nyon mongs pas gdungs pa rnams ni yongs su gdung ba myed par gyur da to// bkres pa rnams ni lto 'drangs par gyurd to// bsgom pa rnams ni sgom pa myed par gyur to// sprus pa rnams ni bde bar/ 
229a8(mdo): btsas par gyurd to// zhum pa nyams chung ba rnams ni stobs phun gsum 'tshogs par gyurd to// de'i tshe seMs can gang la yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'khro bo dang / chags pa dang / tha ba dang
229b1(mdo): cigapa pa sna pa skyed pa gyu te// de la 'digad sa/ na byed pa la zug ba / la bdasang ba'i/ ldananapa n-i smon na/ 
229b2(mdo): ba thob par gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can rnams// phan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa// thub chen 'od kyis reg pas na// de dag byams pa'i sems kyang skyes// ye dgas 'jig rten da yi dgas rdzas
229b3(mdo): bkres bsgom nyen pa ji snyed pa// byang chub sems dpa'i dazi brjid kyis// de dag zas skom rnyed par gyur// mye khom tha/ thams cad chad gyurd cing // ngan 'gro rnams kyang skams par gyu
229b4(mdo): sems can thams cad bder gyur da te// lha'i bde bas rab tu tshim// myig dang rna ba myed pa dang // gzhan yang gang dag dang nga po nyams// de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing // yan lag
229b5(mdo): thams cad mdzes par gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang las stsogs pa'i// nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang / gnod gyur de tshe nyon mongs kun// zhi bar gyurd te bde dang ldan// smyos pa dag ni rab dran zhe
229b6(mdo): dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan// nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing // bcings pas bcings pa grol bar gyur da// ser sna myed cing dgra myed de// gnod sems dang ni chod pa dag/ phan tshun byed pa myed gyur da te
229b7(mdo): de tshe byams pa'i sems su gnas// pa dpam dag bu cig la// ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar// de bzhin sems can phan tshun du// de tshe bu phangs bzhin du sems// byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'dra yas
230a1(mdo): phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang // gang gi bye ma'i grangs snyed kyis// zhing rnams bsam gyis myi khyab gsal// ri bo nag po rnams dang ni// lo yug dag kyang gyi sdang bar gyurd/ 
230a2(mdo): zhi rnams de dag kun// gcig po ji bzhin ji ltar snang // lag 'thil lta bur gyur pa ste// byang chub seMs dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// zhing rnams thams cad legs brgyan pas// thams cad rin cen nyid du
230a3(mdo): snang // byang chub snying po'i rim gro ba la// lho ni de ltar bcu drug yod// dpag tshad brgyad bcu'i sa khyon nang // byang chub snying po brgya nad par 'gyur// zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// bkod pa chen po gang
230a4(mdo): yod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag thams cad der yang snang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // s+yai// 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rang rang gzhal myed khang rnams la// 
230a5(mdo): dur khrod tsam du shes par gyur/ 'di ni bkod pa de mthong nas lha dang phyi rnams ngo mtshar gyur da// bsod nams gang gi rgyu mthun 'dir// phun sum 'di 'dra 'di legs mdze rad/ skyes dpang / 
230a6(mdo): dang yid rnams kyis// 'don 'bya ba byed par yang // de'i yid la 'dod pa dang // bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag dang // sngon khyod chen rdzogs gyur pa'i las del
230a7(mdo): rnam par sbyin pa yis// 'di 'dra'i phun sum 'tshogs 'di 'byung // byang chub shing kyi lha mo bzhis// lha'i shing ni yongs 'du ba// de bas khyad par 'phags pa yis// byang chub snying po brgyan de pa/ byang chub
230a8(mdo): snying po bkod pa gang // lha yis mngon par 'dus byas pa// yon tan de dag tshig gis ni// thams cad brjod pa yod myi nus/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus lus// 'od byung ba rnam par
230b1(mdo): dag pa drim byed pa/ yus dang sems tshis par byed cing dga' ba bya byed pa/ nyon mongs pa lams cad sel pa// sems can la dga' ba dang 'de bathun/ dngu pa dang mchog tu dana' thamam sa cad 'byed pa
230b2(mdo): na pa na bya@# na nga sa sa su// me pa 'din// / 
230b3(mdo): gser gi 'od kyis brgyand par lta re gyur pa las// ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba'i mthong ba dang / ji ltar 'od srung chos kyi rgyal po skyon myed pa'i dri myed 'ad tho sa
230b4(mdo): mtshon mchog ldan zhing pan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig byu/ padu the tsom byed// sngon chad nyes pa byas pa'i las kyis ba dag gi khyim ni shind tu mun pas gang // khyim 'di na ni nyi ma hA/ 
230b5(mdo): bdag gi rgya chen 'od kyang shind tu snang // me dang nor bu dag de pa dri myed klog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od myi snang // brgya byin 'od da/ nga tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha mye rnams kyi 'od kyang myi snang ni// de ring
230b6(mdo): khyim 'di'i nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba'i dge ba'i mdzes gyur da la// sems kyang dka' ba bskyed cing lus kyang bde la bar gyur da la lus ni bsil gyur da te/ lus kyi steng du mo cham 'bab pa de yang bdag la bsil bar
230b7(mdo): gyu rad pa las// skal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shaMng dru bzhud pa shi nad tu gsal// klu'i me tog mdzes dang bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu teg do shal dang // rgyan dang gdu bu dag dang phye ma rnams dang bdug
230b8(mdo): pa mchog rnams myur thogs la/ klu dbyangs dag dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs gyis shing dza dang rdza rnga bzang // bdu bzhi pa 'gro ba kun kyis mchod/ 'os phan par mdzad la mchod pa byed du nges// de ni langs te/ 
231a1(mdo): klu'i bu mo rnams dang lhan cig phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang // de nas ri bo lhun po lta bur kazi brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyand pa zhig/ lha dang lha phyidabye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i da
231a2(mdo): dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis bskor// dga' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 'di zhes stond cing 'dod pa mthong // klu'i rgyal te rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas 'jig rten mchog la mchod byas te// gus dang / 
231a3(mdo): bcas pas de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug/ klu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu la yid kyis thub la mchod pa byed// me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa dag kyang mthor zhing sil snyan
231a4(mdo): rnams kyang byed// klu'i rgyal po rab tu dgal nas thal sbyar yang dedag yon tan rnams kyis bstod// 'dren pa 'jig rtend dam pa dkung bla nya ba'i zhal 'dra mthong bar 'gyur ba legs// bdag
231a5(mdo): gis sngon chad drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de 'dra ste de ring khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste/ bzhed pa'i go/ 'phang brnyes par gyur // gang gi don tu sngon chad dul dang
231a6(mdo): sbyin dang bsdams shing bdog pa kun btang la/ gang gi don tu dul dang tshul khrims skyams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgoms// gang gi don tu brtson 'grus brtan dpabasam gtan dges dang shes rab
231a7(mdo): 'bar mdzad pa// khyod kyi smon lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar gyur pa// ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub shi pa la 'dud// ji ltar bum pa chab kyis gang ba/ 
231a8(mdo): stong dag khyod la shor pa rab bgyid cing // ji ska ca sha'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' sti ldan pa'i sgra smad 'byin pa dang // ji ltar dang pa khrung khrung tshogs kyang mkhal las mchi zhing tshul du zhim ldan par// 
231b1(mdo): skye dgu sdug bsngal thar bgyid dang // ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyis rgyun chad gser ya 'badal bus ldang ba las / srid pa gsum du skye ba dang rga' thar mdzad pa'i ded dpon de ring 'gyur// ji ltar lha
231b2(mdo): rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs te/ khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang // tshangs dang tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don dang lha rnams bsam gtan bde ba spangs pa dang // gang yang sred pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa mchis
231b3(mdo): pa thams cad 'dir lhags las// srid pa gsum du skye dag la thar par mdzad pa'i sman po'i rgyal por 'di ring byon// ji ltaradalha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis pa'i shul de nas ni khyod
231b4(mdo): gshegs la// bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srungs dag kyang de nas gshegs// ji ltar pad ma bzang po dri ma ma mchis rnam dag dog la brtol byung ste/ 
231b5(mdo): de la stobs chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor las de ring dgra bcos gyur da/ bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud// de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drung nas ni khyod baspyod pa la
231b6(mdo): g.yos ma nus// mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma gang ga'i klu gi bye ma snyed// khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir pyad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par mdzes// spya skar zla bar bcas shibaskar
231b7(mdo): ma nyi par bcas shing mkha' las sar lhung gdal// raM mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams par gyur yang gdal// skyes bu mkhas pa la las khams bzhi po dag re re nas ni ston nus pa/ 
232a1(mdo): khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub mthog pazhengs kyi dgang gi srad du kha ma sbyang ba mthong ni mchod bkyis yon tan brjod pa dang// byang chub tu ya sas bdag gis rnyed pa
232a2(mdo): ba rgya chen rnyed par gyurd// bur bcas bdag dang klu'i bu mo mas cad skye gnas 'di las thar gyur da cig/ glang po dregs pa'i stobs su bzhud pa khyod kyi skabs des bdag cag mchi bar bgyi// dge slong dag
232a3(mdo): de ltar klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser gyi 'od ces bya ba/ klu'i bu mo rin po che'i gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs thogs pa dang / mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs thogs pa dang
232a4(mdo): nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha'i dang myi'i 'phro dang ba brgyus pa sna tshogs thogs pa dang // pog por sna tshogs thog/ das pa dang / sil snyan dang klu dbyangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu ma
232a5(mdo): pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub se dpa'i gan du dong zhing / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mngon par gtor te// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyis kyang bstod do// 
232a6(mdo): 'khrul pa phyi mngar gyi snyengs kyi mdzes bag gyis// kyi zhum myi dman rab tu dbyes pa gdus dka' ba// ma chags kyi snang sa mongs zhipa myo mnga' bar// chags bral nas grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sman/ 
232a7(mdo): pa zug du bral ba gdul ba gdul mdzad pa// 'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar mdzad sman pa mchog gnas dang skyabs ma mchis shing dman pa mkhyend nas ni// 'jig rtend gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs
232a8(mdo): su khyod 'byung ngo // ji ltar lha tshogs rab tu dad cing dgar gyur te// me tog char pa chen po mkha' las 'bebs pa dang // de dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar babyed pa las// di ring rgyal bar gyur gyis rab tu dgas
232b1(mdo): par mdzod// shing dbang drung du gshegs sa bzhengs pa gyi mngal bzhugs// bud kyi mas rgyal mdzod nyod mongs na pa drol / sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji skur sangs rgyas ltupa// byang chub nis/ 
232b2(mdo): dam pa mchog ni 'tshang rgya mdzod// khyod kyis gang gi don tu bskal pa bye ma du// 'gro ba 'grol ba'i don tu dka' ba khyad par mdzad// khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la dbab kyis// shing dbang drung
232b3(mdo): du gshegs te byang chub mchog reg mdzod// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsams te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci zhig la bzhugs nas// bla na myed pa yang dag
232b4(mdo): par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo// de nas des yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ rtsa bting nas bzhu gas so snyam mo// de nas gnas nas chang ma'i ris kyi lha'i
232b5(mdo): tshogs brgya bar snang la 'khod pa dag gis/ byang chub sem dpa'i sems kyis yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ ka 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin no// skyes bu chen po
232b6(mdo): de de bzhin te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag/ rtsa bting ba la bzhugs nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// dge slong dag byang chub sems
232b7(mdo): dpas lam gyi g.yos rol na/ badz+ra 'tshong kra shes zhes bya ba lnga sngo ba// 'jam pa shind tu gzhon pa nyams dga' ba lcang lo pa 'khril pa lta bur 'dug pa/ g.yas su 'khyil pa lta bur 'dug pa
232b8(mdo): mabya'i 'grin pa lta bur/ ka ma yin 'di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa/ dri Sha dog dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag / rnga zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas la ma khor/ 
233a1(mdo): rtsa 'tsho dkra shis pa gal ba de song nas byind pa dang / 6 'tshong dgra shes pa la snyan pa'i tshig gis smras te/ tshig de ni kun zhes par byed pa dang / rnam par zhes par byed pa dang / rnam par gsal pa/ 
233a2(mdo): byed pa dang / myi chod pa dang / chags par byed pa dang / snyan cing 'chems pa dang / mnyam par 'os pa dang / snum pa dang / dran par byed pa dang / bskul ba dang / tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mye
233a3(mdo): rtsub pa dang / sha sha po ma yin pa dang / mya brlang ba dang / myi rkam pa dang / 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang / rna ba bde ba dang / lus dang sems shind tu dga' bar byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug pa
233a4(mdo): 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa sel pa dang / ka la bying ka'i sgra skad lta bu dang / bya kun la dang / shang shang de bu las pa sogs pa sma'ab+h+ya dan pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / rnga bo che dang klu dbyangs kyi sgra smad kyi
233a5(mdo): dang ldan pa dang / gnod pa byed pa dang / bden pa dang / gas ba dang / yang dag pa dang / tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i mang lta bu dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra shugs lta bu dang / ri dog pa'i sgra
233a6(mdo): bu dang ldan pa dang lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bstod pa dang / zab pa dang / gting dpag rka ba dang / bdud kyi stobs myod par byed pa dang / phas kyi rgol pa'i smra ba 'jom pa dang / se
233a7(mdo): ke'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / ta dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin pa'i pha po lta bu dang / klu spogs pa lta bu dang / 'brug zer ba'i sgrasba lta bu dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zas cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang
233a8(mdo): 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / tab tog ma yin pa dang / 'cheb myed pa dang / mye shol ba dang / 'cham pa dang / rigs pa dang / dus su smra ba dang / dus las kyi yol ba dang
233b1(mdo): chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang / mnyen pa dang thogs pa byed pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / skad cig gis skad thams cad spogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad zhes par byed
233b2(mdo): pa dang / bde ba thams cad bskyed pa dang / tha rad pa'i lam yang dag par stond pa dang / lam gyi tshogs smra ba dang / 'khor las myi 'da' ba dang / 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thos
233b3(mdo): cad kyis gsungs pa dang mthun pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i tshig gis swa 'tshong kra shes la/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bkra shrIs hA dag pa la myur du byin// de ring pa la cha byin don chen gyur da// 
233b4(mdo): dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud ni bcom nas su// byang chub de// pa zhi ba reg par 'gyur// gang gi ched du nga yis bskal stong du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang gtong byas dang // tshul khrims
233b5(mdo): brtul shugs dka' thub rab khyad pa// de ni de ring yid thob pa ra gyur da// bzod pa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus// sam gtan stobs dang de bzhin shes rab stobs/ bsod nas
233b6(mdo): dang ni mngon zhes rnam thar stobs// don de ring bas grub par gyurang // shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs dag dang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni chags skyed byams pa'i stobs/ so ma yang dag rig pa bded kyi
233b7(mdo): stobs// de ni de ring ngas 'grub par 'gyur// de ngang la ma byin byas don/ khyod la bsod nams stobs ma mtha' yas te// de ni khyod kyis ngan pa'i rgyur gyi 'gyur// khyod kyang ston pa zan
233b8(mdo): myod par 'gyum// bkra shis pas mi 'dren pa'i tshig snyan rab thos nas// dka' zhib sagu la yid rangs rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// swa 'jas gzhon zhing 'jam la reg par ldan pa sngams
234a1(mdo): nas na dag pa'i yi kyi 'di na / sa kya chub ko 'ayang da byedana'abyung napa blta 'a 'od rgyas
234a2(mdo): yon tan chen po'i rgya mtsho grags pa dpag myed khyod bzhes shig/ bdag gis go 'phang dam pa 'chi byed thog mar 'tshang rgya bgyi// brtul shugs dka' thub rnam pang bya dka' skal ma pas pyad par// 
234a3(mdo): bkra shis pa mchog bting bas byang chub 'di ni thob myi 'gyur// gang che bro gros ldan pa shes rab bsod nams thabs kyis 'phags// de nas rgyal ba thub pas rdul myed 'gyur zhing lung ston to// bkra shis
234a4(mdo): gal te byang chub gzhan la sbyin nus na// srog chags bsdu de ba byas te sbyin par yid gnyis khyod ma za// gang che nga yis bya ba/ chub thob zhes bdud ci rnam par dbyes// khyod 'ongs chos
234a5(mdo): kyi dam pa nyon dang gdul dang bral bar 'gyur// 'dren pas shin tu 'jam pa'i cha ni swar gang blangs// seng ge ngang pa'i sku bas kyis chas nas sa ni rab tu g.yos// lha klu tshogs rnas
234a6(mdo): thal mo sbyar te rab tu dgal yid kyis/ deb 'dis bdud dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg par 'gyur snyam sems// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba na// lha'i
234a7(mdo): bu rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' deng 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thog par 'gyur zhing / mngon par rdzogs pa 'i 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ byang chub kyi shing
234a8(mdo): brgyad khri brgya nad par gyurd to// de na byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin la pang du dpag tshad brgya pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni spos kyi rang n+dan la 'phang du dpag tshad stong pa
234b1(mdo): yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni can dan gyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos gi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag cad lnga 'bum pa ya pa yod/ 
234b2(mdo): byang chub kyi ga tshig na na pa tsho'i rang bzhin canas 'bang du dpag can 'grus phrag pa lang yod// byang chub kyi zhing 'jig na rin po se mams cad kyi rang bzhin na la yang du ta 'phrum / 
234b3(mdo): bcu pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na ji ltar 'tsham pa'i seng ge'i khre lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs btang ba bshams par 'gyu dad to// kha cig gi drung du ni spos kyi khri sta nad to/ 
234b4(mdo): kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khri stan no// byang chub ses dpa' ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dal snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol
234b5(mdo): pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs ma zag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la/ byang chub seMs dpa' mtshan dang / dpe' byad bzang pos legs par brgya nad pa'i lus kyis/ byang chu
234b6(mdo): kyi shing drung gi seng ge'i khri de dag zas cad la 'dug par kun tu snang ste/ byang chub seMs dpa' dang lha'i bu so so'i yid la yang / byang chub sos dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi seng ge'i khri la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug
234b7(mdo): gi gzhan gi la ni ma yin par sheso// ji ltar de dag gis shes pa de bzhin du byang chub seMs dpal ting nge 'dzin rol pa la bkod pa 'di nyid kyis mthus/ seMs can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang
234b8(mdo): gzhin rje'i 'jig rten pa thas cad dang // lha dang phyi zas cad dang 'gro ba mas cad du skyes pa'i seMs can zas cad kyis kyang / byang chub seMs dpal byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo // de lta
235a1(mdo): 'on kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnaMs kyi blo gros yong su tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas lnga spang gang thogs te/ byang chub kyi shing ga la ba der phyind pa dang / byang chub kyi shing
235a2(mdo): la lan bdun skor ba byas te/ bdag nyid kyis phra'i the mo nang du bstan rtsa ba ni phyir bstan nas/ ma bting ba kun nas bzang po bting ste seng ge lta bu dang / dpa' bo lta bu dang / stobs lta bu dang / brtan
235a3(mdo): ba lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lta bu dang / mthu lta bu dang / glang po lta bu dang / dbang phyug lta bu dang / rang byung lta bu dang / ye shes lta bu dang / bla na myed pa lta bu dang / khyad par lta bu dang / mngon par
235a4(mdo): 'phags pa lta bu dang / grags pa lta bu dang / brjod pa lta bu dang / sbyin pa lta bu dang / tshul khrims lta bu dang / bzod pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lta bu dang / bsam gtan lta bu dang / shes rab
235a5(mdo): lta bu dang / ye shes lta bu dang / bsod nams lta bu dang / bdud// phyir rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang / tshogs lta bur skyil mo kru bcas nas cha bting bas su 'dug te 'dug nas// lus
235a6(mdo): drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon tu bzhag nas 'di 'dra ba'i yid brtan po byas so// stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni rnams kyang rung / pags pa rus pa sha rnams zhig kyang rung // bskal mang rnyed
235a7(mdo): dka' byang chub ma thob pa ma/ snyan 'di las ni sum bskyod kyi bya'o// byang chub snying po bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// / dge slong de ltar byang chub ses dpal bya/ 
235a8(mdo): chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang // 'dod pa spyod pa drug gi lha rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed pa myi 'byung brang snyam ste/ gang phyogs log su gnas par byung to// de bzhin du sgo dang
235b1(mdo): nub dang / byang phyogs dang lha rnams kyis yongasasu bsrungs par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpal bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od/ 
235b2(mdo): byung nas/ 'od des phyogs bcu kun tu grangs myed dpag tu myed pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang snang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs
235b3(mdo): na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma myed pa'i 'od kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rtend kyi khams dri ma myed par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdel ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul pas/ byang chub ses
