235b4(mdo): dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor zhing mdun du ba dar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa ba drer song ste phyi nang nas byang chub sems dpal la mchod pa'i las
235b5(mdo): kyi phyir // de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu bya te/ rje rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas/ phyogs bcu nam/ mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
235b6(mdo): 'khor gyi khyams bye bu chu sngon po dag pa las byas pa gcig tu bsad to// 'gro la lnga bskyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mdun du yang bya chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi zhi po la 'dug par bstan
235b7(mdo): sems can de dag kyang phan tshun du sor mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpal stond cing sems can tshul du shes pa'i gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa 'di su zhig/ 'di ltar rnam par mdzes pa'i sems can 'di
235b8(mdo): su zhig ces mdze rad to// sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang smra sad te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smra'o// 
236a1(mdo): myed pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang rnyog pa gang yid bag chags bcas bton pa// gang gis lus las 'od phyung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams thams cad 'od ni byed par byas// gang gis bsod nams ting nge 'dzin
236a2(mdo): ye shes tshogs ni skal pa mang por kun speld pa// shag kya thub pa thub chen dam pa 'di ni phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes/ de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten / 
236a3(mdo): khams rin po che bkod par byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdugs pa rtsegs pa kun tu stond pa zhes bya ba/ 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpal bkrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor zhing
236a4(mdo): mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sos dpal ga la ba der song ste/ phyind nas/ byang chub seMs dpal la mtsho dad pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis zas cad dang ldan
236a5(mdo): ba'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dag phan tshun 'di skad mdze rad te// gang gi phyi rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di snang bar gyur dpa
236a6(mdo): 'di ku'i 'bral bu zhes gadzed to// de na pa rin pa che'i gdugs des pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis rin po ched dang smos gdugs stong phrag bye ba 'ag khrig dag// byams pa'i yid kyis 'od ba byed pa bzhugs
236a7(mdo): dang bya ngan 'das pa phul// de'i sa mtshan mchog ldan pa phan mdzad sred byed bu'i mthu ldan pa// yon tan mngal ba byang chub shing drung gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas/ de nas nub phyogs na byang chub sems dpal me tog
236a8(mdo): gi 'breng ba dang nags la kyi 'phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyal pa mngon par mkhyend pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten kyi khams me tog cas pa ka'i 'dog tu/ byang chub ses dpalam sa dpa' chen po pang mo'i ngabacad na/ 
236b1(mdo): bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpal bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yong su bskor cing mdun tu 'dar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub ses dpal ga la ba der song ste phyi nang nas byang chub sem/ 
236b2(mdo): dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i 'dra ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// de na phyogs bcu'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dag phan tshun 'di dag mdzer te/ 'od
236b3(mdo): kyi bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes mdze rad to// de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rin cen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin cen tog/ rin cen dam pa rin cen
236b4(mdo): grags pa de chos dges/ dkon mchog gsum po rgyun myi 'chad pa 'i brtson 'grus brnyes// byang chub mchog rnyes gyurd te de'i mchod pa 'di// de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla zil du brlag
236b5(mdo): par byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rtend gyi mas nyi ma 'khor bar byang chub sos dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub ses dang
236b6(mdo): bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 
236b7(mdo): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams thas cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed pa de snyed 'khor gyi khyams der kun tu bstand to// de na byang chub seMs dpal kha cig 'di skad mdze rad to// bkod pa rna/ 
236b8(mdo): pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes mdze rad to// de nas bkod pa de dag mas cad las tshig su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis bsod nams ye shes shin tu mang pos lus ni rnam spangs shing / gang gis brtul
237a1(mdo): shugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis ngag sbyangs la// gang gis/ khrel yod mos pa byams dang de bzhin snying rjes sems sbyangs pa// de ni shing rgyal drung gshegs shag kya khyu mchog de la mtsho// 
237a2(mdo): pa byed// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa/ yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rtend gyi khams yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po yon tan
237a3(mdo): kye blo gros zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpal bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar de/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpalag la ba der song ste
237a4(mdo): nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyi ma 'khor gyi khyim drer yon tan gyi bkod pa thas cad dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa ma ngan bang spru lad te/ khang pa de las tshig su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang
237a5(mdo): gi yon tan dag gis lha dang lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin lto 'phye che// dag rtag tu yon tan bsgos// yon tan can de yon tan ldan pa 'i rgyal rigs skyes// yon tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing gyi drung na bzhugs
237a6(mdo): de nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin ce na srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhib 'jig rtend gyi khams rin po che 'byung bar// byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya

237b1(mdo): pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin cen rnam dag dang / khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang mchog dang gzung dang gzhon pa mkha' rten rgya nad// me tog 'phreng ba mdzes dang mdun sa dag dang bskyed mos tshal rnams dang // rkang pa

237b5(mdo): der tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char mngon par phab bo// dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor de las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rigs dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi chos kyi sprin gis
237b6(mdo): srid gsum thams cad khyab// dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa thob byed 'char pa 'bebs// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba'i khri shing thams cad bag chags bcas te gcod par 'gyur// ba
237b7(mdo): gtan rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'i me tog rgyas pa dad par byed pa 'byind// de nas bya ba dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs po rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa sdang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
237b8(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams gser gyi dra bas khyebs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi dra bas brgyand pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis/ 
238a1(mdo): yong su bskord cing mdun tu bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der so ba ste phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ khang pa pa rtsegs pa de da// 
238a2(mdo): thas cad dang / rin po che'i mkha' rten rnams su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgya nad pa dag mngon par srul da te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyi
238a3(mdo): lha dang myi'i me tog gi 'phreng ba thogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su btud nas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba sbyangs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang gis sangs rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod/ 
238a4(mdo): cing // gus dang bcas pas dad pa che ba bskyed la// tshangs pa de'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smras pa// byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag/ 'tshal// de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs
238a5(mdo): pa kun tu gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten kyi khams kun turnam par bltas par/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dang / 'chen po rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang
238a6(mdo): chub sems dpal bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskord cing mdun du bdang te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpal la mchod
238a7(mdo): pa'i las kyi phyir bye dUr+ya'i 'khor gyi khyams der/ 'dzam bu gling gi gser gyi pad ma rnas mngon du byung bar bstand to// pad ma de dag gi snying po la bud myed lus phyed snang ba/ kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa
238a8(mdo): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyand pa bstand te/ lag pa g.yas g.yon na 'gul rngub dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang // ser skud dang / mu tig gi do shal las ba sogs pa rgyan rnam pa mang po thogs shing me tog dang / dang kyai sde
238b1(mdo): sbyangs nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ka la ba de logs su lus btud de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas nyan thos dang // rang rgyal dag dang bla ma
238b2(mdo): rnams la 'dud// khrims ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal byed// yon tan ldan pa de la gdud pa byos// de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
238b3(mdo): kyi khams tshogs kyi dam par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba 'od des bskul pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor da cing mdun du bdang / 
238b4(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpal ga la ba der song ste phyind nas/ byang chub seMs dpal la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs
238b5(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / sngon dang / 'breng ba dang byug pa dang / bye ma dang gdug spos dang / go sa dang rgyan dang / gdug sa dang rgyal mtshan dang
238b6(mdo): ba nan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i khab pa dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig dang / rta dang glang po che dang shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang bzhon pa dang / shing ljon pa dang lo ma dang / me tog
238b7(mdo): dang 'bras bu dang / khye'u dang bu mo dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rtend skyong ba da
238b8(mdo): myi dang phyi ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas char chen po mngon par bab ste/ thams cad dka' ba dang bde ba skyed kyi/ sems can gapa la yang 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod pa byed do// 
239a1(mdo): de bzhin du sbyar te de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phyogs bcu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras po kang // phan pa byed par mchod par byang chub lhags gyur da pa/ 'gro la phan pa de dag rnams kyis bkod rim dang / 6
239a2(mdo): dang rim pa mdzes pa dag gis dpel tsam nyon// kha cig do shal khrag khrig rab tu dbyang byas te/ nam mkha' las ni 'brug ltar shi nad tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig mkha' las me tog gzhal myed khang ston da
239a3(mdo): cing / cod pan rin cen logs la tsug pud 'phyang zhing lhags/ kha cig stong pa mtshan byed sngon myed mchog brjod cing / sa las seng ge lta bur shin tu spogs shing lhags// kha cig sngon cad ma mthong me tog
239a4(mdo): mdzes 'thor zhing // khyu mchog ci 'dra de 'drar shi nad tu sgrogs / dpa lhags// kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong stond cing / bya lta bur mkha' las shi nad tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig
239a5(mdo): bder gshegs sras kyi yon tan 'phreb brjod cing // zla ba lta bur mkha' las shi nad tu rgyas shing lhags// kha cig nyi ma ltu bu ra 'od gzer rab 'gyed de/ bdud kyi gnas rnams thams cad
239a6(mdo): mog yog byed cing lhags/ bsod nams tshogs bsags kha cig dbang po mchod sdong 'dra'i// dri myed thogs myed byang chub snying po der yang lhags// kha cig mkhal las nor bu rin cen 'dra ba 'thor// zla ba
239a7(mdo): zla bzangs zang skyes rnam mdzes man da ra/ ba ra sha tsam pa ka dang sna ma'i me tog 'breng // byang chub sems dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la 'thor// kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod la// sa bskyod
239a8(mdo): nas kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lcags// kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs byed la// bar snang gnas te me tog skon bu 'thor zhing lhags// kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po 'go la thogs nas ni// sa la spos
239b1(mdo): mu 'tho zhi cag ka 'debs shing lhags/ 'acig rin cen mchod sngongasna tshogs thogs nas ni// rgyang rings 'dug ste byang chub sems dpal stond cing lpags// kha cig tshangs pa lta bu zhi ba'i gzugs/ 
239b2(mdo): bsgrurab te// yid bzhin rab zhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa// de dag pa spu dag las byams dang snying rje dpa// dka' dang btang snyoms chad byed yid 'ong sgra byung lhags// kha cig brgya byin sa sar
239b3(mdo): stong phrag khrag khrag gi// lha rnams dag gis mdun du bdar nas lcags gyurd cing // de dag byang chub shing drung phyi nad nas thal sbyar te// brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor// kha cig phyon/ 
239b4(mdo): bzhi dag gi khyong ba ji lta ba pa// dri za srin po gyi 'am chi yis / dngasu spor te// klog lta gsal ba'i me tog chams 'bebs shing lhags// dri ma mye 'am ci'i skang gis brtan pa stong / 
239b5(mdo): cig me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras bur bcas// me tog pa/ cas shing mchog gi dri ni rab 'byin la// lo yar sangs rgyas sra sa po lus byed gnas thogs lhags// btud nas sa'i snying pa
239b6(mdo): me tog rnams kyang 'thor// kha cig ud pa la pad ma kar po rgyas// pad ma'i snying por sum bcu pa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas// de 'drar me tog rgyas pa'i rdzing bu thogs te lhags// chags myed yid ldan
239b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' mkhas la bstod// kha cig lhun po lta bur lus chen bsgyur te lhags// bar snang gnas nas rang gi lus kyang rab tu 'dor// bor ma thag tu me tog 'phreng ba rnams su gyur da// stong
239b8(mdo): gsum dag gis rgyal ba'i zhing nas khebs par byed// kha cig phyag gnyis srog pa'i bskal pa lta bu dang // de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jig par stond cing lhags// de dag lus la sachos kyi sgo mo mang drag ste/ 
240a1(mdo): de dag zos pas sems can khrag khrig sred pa spong // kha cig mchu ni byis pa 'dral bzhin mdzes shing // Sha bzhin rdzogs la mya mi 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lhags// do shal sna tshogs legs brgyan bu mo/ 
240a2(mdo): chas pa 'dra// de la lta bas lha'i tshogs d+has ngoms myi 'gyur// kha cig rdo rje lta bur mya phyed lus can te// rkang pas 'og gi chu'i phung po 'gog cing lhags// nyi ma 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin rgyas snang byed la// 'od
240a3(mdo): byed nyon mongs skyon rnams bcom pa kha cig lhags// kha cig rin po ches brgya nad lag na rin cen thogs// zhing yang bye ba stong dag khyebs par byed cing lhags// sems can yang la phan dang bde dang tshim bya/ 
240a4(mdo): phyir// rin chen me tog dam pa dri zhim char pa 'bebs// kha cig gzungs chen rin po che'i mdzod gyur da cing // ba s+phu rnams nas mdo sde khrag khrig rab brjod la// spobs par ldan zhing blo gros ldan la
240a5(mdo): blo mchog ldan// rgyags shing rab 'dregs skye bo rtogs par/ byed cing lhags// kha cig ri bo lhun po rnga ltar thogs nas ni// rab tu rdung zhing mkha' las yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags// de'i sgra
240a6(mdo): ni phyogs bcur bye ba'i zhing mthong ste// bdud rtsi ma thob ston pa do mod 'tshang rkyang sprog/ byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub seMs
240a7(mdo): dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir// byang chub seMs dpa' dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to// byang chub seMs dpa' nyid kyis kyang / phyogs bcu dag gi sangs
240a8(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na// byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyed bkod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po/ 
240b1(mdo): der kun tu bstand to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam du sos te/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i bdag po dbang phyug dbang sgyur ba/ bdud bsdig can de la/ 
240b2(mdo): bdag nyid ma sman par/ bdag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni myi chas/ bdag gis bdud sdig can bskul bar bya'o// de las rnam par rgyal na/ 'dod pa
240b3(mdo): na spyod pa'i lha las sogs pa thams cad tshar gcad par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang bdud kyi 'khor bdud kyi ris lha'i bu sngon dge ba'i phra ba bskyed pa 'khod pa dag gis/ nga'i seng ge'i rnam par rol pa mthong na
240b4(mdo): bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ses bskye/ da par 'gyur ro// snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas byang chub seMs/ dpas de ltar bsams nas// de'i tshe sbyin 'tshams kyi bar gyi man
240b5(mdo): spu nas/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thas cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer gcig phyung ste/ 'od gzer des stong gsu gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khaMs 'di thas cad bdud kyi gan
240b6(mdo): thams cad snang bar byas nas mog mog por byas te/ rab tu g.yos par yang byas par gyur da to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad kyi khas 'di zas cad kyang snang ba chen pos yongasu khyab par gyurd to// 
240b7(mdo): bdud sdig can gyis 'od de las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di yang zos so// seMs can shind tu dag pa skal mang myod spyad pa// zas gtsang sras pos rgyal srid dag ni rab spangs te// phan byed de ni bdud rtsi mngon
240b8(mdo): par 'dod pas byung // byang chub shing drub 'ongs kyis de ring bsgrim pa gyis// de ni bdag kyang rgal la gzhan yang sgrol bar byed// de ni bdag nyid sgrol pas gzhan yang sgrol bar byed// de ni bdag kyang dbugs 'byin
241a1(mdo): gzhan dag dbugs kyang 'byid// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas gzhan dag mya ngan tho// ngan song gsum po sa sus stongs par byed par 'gyur// lha myi rnams kyi grong khyem gang bar byed par 'gyur/ 
241a2(mdo): phan pa byed pa de ni bdud ci thob gyur de nas// bsam gtan mngon shes bdud ci bde'i mchog sbyin par 'gyur// gang tshe rang 'byung nyid kyis chos char mngon phab che// nag po'i rtsa lag khyod kyi grong khyer stobs byed
241a3(mdo): 'gyur// stobs myed pas kyang stobs myed 'gyur te dpung nyams 'gyur// phyogs ni phyogs myin ci bya gar 'gro zhes myi 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bskul na
241a4(mdo): rmyi lam rnam pa gsum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis so// rnam pa sum bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdag gi gnas mun pas khyab pa byis pa dang / rang gi gnas rdul gyis gang zhing gyo mo dang gseg
241a5(mdo): mas gang bar rmis pa dang / bdag nyid sngangs skrag nas phyogs phyogs su 'bros par rmis pa dang / bdag cod pan dang bral zhipan ma lhung bar rmis pa dang / bdag mchu dang gre ba dang dkan skams
241a6(mdo): par byis pa dang / bdag nyid snying kun tu gdungs par rmis pa dang / skyed mos tshal gyi lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu rnams rnyings par byis pa dang / rdzing rnaMs bskams te chu byed par rmis pa dang / ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang
241a7(mdo): rma bya dang ka la byang ka dang / ku na la dang shar shang de'u las btsogs pa/ bya'i tshogs rnas 'dab gshog zegs par rmis pa dang / rnga dang dung dang rdzang dpa' khar dza dang rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang rgyud gsum pa dang / 
241a8(mdo): pheg dpanga'akhar ba'i sil khrol la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad rnaMs chag grugs de sa la lhung bar rmis pa dang / 'khor sdug pas kyang bdud spangs te/ po 'dzum gnags cing phyogs gcig tu dong nas sems shing 'gro
241b1(mdo): par rmis pa dang / chung ma'i dam pa 'breng ba can ya mal nas sa la lhung ste// nga lag pa gnyis 'go la rdob par rmis pa dang / bdud kyi bu gang dag shi nad tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / shi nad tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / 
241b2(mdo): shi nad tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / shi nad tu shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang / byang chub seMs dpal byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar rmis pa dang / me bdag gi bu mo rnams kyang kyai hud yab kyi
241b3(mdo): hud yab ces cho po 'debs par rmis pa dang / bdag lus la gos dri ma can gyod par mis pa dang / bdag mgo rdul kyis kapa la skyelu bse bser po dang nyam chung ba dang mdangs nyams par mis pa dang / bsil khang dang / 
241b4(mdo): khang pa brtsegs pa dang ska bakhung dang/ rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis dkang nas rdib pa mis pa dang / de'i sde dpon dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang grul bum dang dri za'i bdag po gang yin pa de dag zas
241b5(mdo): cad kyang o ma tshugs bcas te ru zhing rmongs btab nas byer ba rdo rjes pa dang / 'dod pa na gyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di lta ste yul 'khor srung dpa'aphags skyes po dang / phyog s+yai barban
241b6(mdo): dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / zab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dang / dbang sgyu ba las stsogs pa gang yin pa de dag zas cad kyang bdud la myi gus shing byang chub sems dpa' la/ 
241b7(mdo): phyogs par rmis pa dang / zab mo'i nang na de'i ral gyi shubs nas a phyind cing bdag myi shes pa'i sgra 'byind par skyes pa dang / rang gyi 'khor gyis bdag por rmis pa dang / bkra shis kyi bum pa spo lhung bar rmis
241b8(mdo): pa dang / bram ze phyis byin gyi bu yang dkra myi shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par bris pa dang / sgo ba dga' byed kyang kun tu myi dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs rmis pa dang / nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khyabs par rmis pa dang / 'dod pa
242a1(mdo): gnas na gnas pa'i dpal yang rku bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi dbang yang myed par gyur da par rmis pa dang / rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs ma yin par rmis pa dang / nor bu dang mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang/ 
242a2(mdo): chad cing rnam par chad nas brul bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par rmis pa dang / shing rnams kyang bcad cing / ba gam yang ltung ba pa yang rmis pa dang / bdud kyi sde dpon pa thas cad
242a3(mdo): kyang khas bu 'du skyel bar rmis te// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmis so// de sad pa dpa'ajigs sngangs skrag nas/ nang myi thams cad 'thogs te/ 
242a4(mdo): dpung dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang sde dpon dang / sgo ba dang de dag 'dus par reg nas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdud des rmyi lam de dag mthong nas nyams thag ste/ rje dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gro/ 
242a5(mdo): zhes bya ba dang // bu rnams dag dpa'akhor rnaMs gang dag yin/ la smras// nag po'i a lag kun la de dag sngos su dris// shag kya'i nang du skyes pa mtshan mchog yan lag spras// lo drA/ 
242a6(mdo): bar du bya dka' brtul shugs drag po kyang // byang chub shing dre 'ongs kyis rab tu bsgribs shig ces// mdang gsu bar snang las ni tshigs bcad de skad grag/ byang chub sems dpal de nyid rnam/ 
242a7(mdo): par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnam rtog byed// gang tshe bdud rtsi thob ste bsil ba'i dngos reg che// des ni nga gnas ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur/ dpung chen rnas
242a8(mdo): dang lhan cig der ni rab do la// shing dbang drung 'dug dge sbyong gcig de gzhom par bya// yan lag bzhi pa'i sde rnams myur du rab tu sgrims// gal te nga la sdug seMs byi shol ma byed cig/ dgra
242b1(mdo): bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang // de yang gcig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur na ni// bgrang ba las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rigs ni gzhar myi 'chad// dge slong dag de nas 'dun
242b2(mdo): kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas bdud sdig can de la tshigs bcad de smras pa// yab cig ci nongs zhal gyur da cing ni zhal mdog nyams// thugs kyang 'phar la khyod kyi yan lag nyid lag 'dar// khyod kyis ci
242b3(mdo): gsan cigazigs rgyur du bka' stsol cig/ yang dag bsams nas de sbyar ba 'tshal bar bgyi// nga rgyal myed bdud smras pa bu cig pa la nyon// ngas ni sdig pa'i rmi lam shin tu myi bzad rmis// de ring
242b4(mdo): 'khor 'dir de kun ma lus smras na ni// khyed rnams brgyal te sa la rab tu 'gyel bar 'gyur// ded dpon gyis smras pa// gal te thab dus bab te rgyal na nongs ma mchis// gal te der ni
242b5(mdo): bcom par gyur na nongs dang bcas// gal te khyod kyi rmang lam de 'dra'i ltas lags na// bzhag na dge ste g.yul ngor yongs bltal myi 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa// bsal ba grub pa
242b6(mdo): skyes bu g.yul ngor grags par gyurd// gal te brtan la rte nad te legs byas bdag cag rgyal// kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs nas su// kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag myi 'tshal de myi nus// ded
242b7(mdo): dpon gyis spras pa// rgya chen dpu bdog kyang ni shi nad tu mthu' chung ste/ stobs ldan dpa' bo gcig pu mchis na g.yul lus rgyal// gal te / srin bu me khyer stong gsum gang gyur kyang // nyi ma gcig pu'i
242b8(mdo): zil du brlags te/ 'od myi bgyid// gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal gti mug mchis la dpyod pa ma mchis// mkhas dang myi mthun bgyid pa de ni gsol myi nus// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gis// ded
243a1(mdo): dpon gyi tshig ma mnyan nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung chen po/ stobs che ba zab mo la dpal ba/ 'jigs su rung ba/ spu khi zhes byed nus pa/ lha dang phyi rnams kyis sngon ma mtho nga ma thos pa bzhin gyur da pa/ 
243a2(mdo): rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur da pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa// rka lag sprul brgyad stong kas bkris pa dang ldan pa ralo gyi dang mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / sta re dang / rtse gsum kha
243a3(mdo): gdeng dang / bong ba dang gtun shing dang be con dang zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa thogs pa/ lus la go cha bzang po bgos pa/ mgo dang zha lag dang myig log par 'dug pa/ mgod
243a4(mdo): myig dang gtong 'bar ba/ lho dang na lag dbyibs kyi sdug pa/ bany-i nA gzi brjid drag po dang ldan pa/ shi nad tu bzhin bsgyur zhing so ba gas pa 'jigs su rung bar mche ba brtsigs pa lce sdug cing zheng ched

243a7(mdo): bsangs dang / kham pa po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser por 'dug ste/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshogs can/ kha gcig ni myig zhigs pa dang / myig khron pa lta bu dang / byig byung ba lta bu dang / 
243a8(mdo): myig 'bar ba dang / myig 'bur ba kyi sdug pa dang / kha cig ni myig log pa dang / 'bar ba dang / kyi sdug pa/ kha cig ni mi 'bar ba thogs te/ 'gyi ba zhing ri gzhan la zhon te 'ong // kha cig ni shing sa yon byas te/ 
243b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i logs su rgyug cing 'ong / kha cig ni rna ba ni phag na lta bu dang / zhib ma lta bu dang / glang po che'i rna pa lta bu dang / 'phyang ba dang / phag na lta bur 'dug pa/ kha cig ni rna ba myed pa/ kha cig ni keng / 
243b2(mdo): rus mang po spruld nas/ lus rid cing gsus pa che la sna zhom pa/ gsus pa bum pa lta bur 'dug pa/ rkang pa 'go'i thod pa lta bur 'dug pa/ pags pa dang sha dang khrag skams pa/ rna ba dang / sna dang rka lag dang myig
243b3(mdo): dang mgo bcad pa/ kha cig ni khrag 'thung 'dod pas/ gcig la gcig 'go gcod pa/ kha cig spa sha sha po dang / sgra myi snyan pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / spa chub pa dang / ldan pa/ hu hu zhes bya ba dang / 
243b4(mdo): zhes bya dang / hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byind pa dang / spyug/ pa len pa dang / dge sbyong ko'u ta ma 'di shing dang bcas te 'on cig ces zer ba dang / rgyob cig ces zer ba dang / rab tu rgyo ba cig
243b5(mdo): ces zer ba dang / chings cig ces zer ba dang / zung cig ces zer ba dang / chod cig ces zer ba dang / gtubs cig ces zer ba dang / gcogs shig ces zer ba dang / bab bab tu 'od cig ces zer ba dag// 
243b6(mdo): kha cig ni wa dang ce spyang dang / phag dang / bong bu dang ba grang dang / glang po che dang rta dang rnga mo dang / rkyang dang ma he dang / ri bong dang / ka yag dpab se dang / ri dgas dang / sgo ska las sogs pa'i kha gdod sna tshogs 'jig su rung ba
243b7(mdo): sngangs par byed pa myi sdug pa dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni seng ge dang / staka dang phag rgod dang / dred dang spre'u dang / gzig dang byi la dang / ra dang / lug dang sbrul dang / ne'u le dpa nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gso/ 
243b8(mdo): dang ru sbal dang / bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / 'ug pa dang / nam mkhal lding lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni gzugs myi sdug pa dag go// kha cig ni 'gro cig pa dang / 'go gnyis pa nas/ mgo brgya stong gi bA
244a1(mdo): dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni 'gro myed pa'o// kha cig ni lag pa gcig pa nas/ lag pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni lag pa myed pa dag go/ kha cig ni rkang pa gcig pa nas/ 
244a2(mdo): rkang pa brgya stong gyi bar dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni rkang pa myed pa dag go/ kha cig ni rna ba dang kha dang / sna dang lte ba'i khung nas sprul gdug pa 'byin to// kha cig ni ral kyai dang mdal gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / rtse gsu
244a3(mdo): kha ka deng dang dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang mda' bo che dang / rdo rje gcig pa dang / rdo rje dang / bong ba dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa la btogs pa'i mtshon ma gsor zhing kar byed la/ byang chub sems dpal la bsdigs mo byed do// 
244a4(mdo): kha cig ni myi'i sor mo bcad nas 'phreng bar burgyus te thogs so// cig ni keng rus dang thod pa dag 'phreng ba lta bur brgyus te thogs so// kha cig ni lus sprul gdug pas bkris so// kha cig ni 'go la zhun
244a5(mdo): ling me can thogs te/ glang po dang rta dang rnga mo dang bgrang dang bong bum he la zhon no// kha cig ni spyi tshugs su 'dug la khab lta bu'i spu can dag go// kha cig ni bkra pa dang bor bu dang / phag rgod dang / 
244a6(mdo): ne'u le dang / ra dang lug dang bi la dang / spre'u dang / ce spyang gi sku lta bu dang ldan la/ sprul gdug pa spyug cing lcags kyi thu lum myin pa dang / me 'byind pa dang lcags dang / zangs 'bar ba'i char 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje'i lce
244a7(mdo): 'bebs pa dang / lcags kyi bye mtshan po che'i char 'bebs pa dang / sprin nag po bsdus te/ rlung gi char 'bebs pa dang / mda'i sprin bsdus te char 'bebs pa dang / mun nag stond pa dang / spra 'byin cing byang chub sems dang
244a8(mdo): logasu rgyug pa dag go// kha cig ni zhags pa skor ba dang / ri chen po bsnyil par byed pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug par byed pa dang / r-i chen po las mchod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po lhun po bskul ba dang / rgyug pa dang / 'bros
244b1(mdo): pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag 'thor ba dang / lus skor ba dang / gad mo char rgod pa dang / brang rdung ba dang / brang la rdob pa dang / mgo sag pa dang / 'go 'bar zhing skra gyen du 'greng ba dang / phan tshun shugs phyung ste/ rgyug
244b2(mdo): ci pa wa'i byig lta bus byang chub sems dpa' la 'jigs par byed do// bud myed rgan mo dag kyang ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te/ 'di skad du kyi hud kyi hud bu/ kyai hud nga'i bu/ longs shig longs la myur du
244b3(mdo): bros shig ces mdze rad to// srin mo'i gzugs dang / sha za mo'i gzugs dang / yi dgas long ba 'theng po bkres pa rid pa laka pa bsgreng ba kha gnus pa dag kyang ngu zhing 'jigs pa stond to// spangs par byed cing / byang chub
244b4(mdo): sems dpa'i mdun na rgyug go// bdud kyi dpung 'dus pa rnam pa de lta bu des dpag tshad brgyad bcu 'o mkhor yug tu kang bar gyur to// bdud gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen
244b5(mdo): po bye ba phrag brgyar gtogs pa'i bdud sdig can rnams kyi dpung dang ga gis thad ka dang / steng gang bar gyu rad to// de la 'di skad ce sa bya ste/ gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs/ 
244b6(mdo): srin po yi dgas sha za'i gzugs dang bcas// 'jig rten myaM sdug drag gzugs ci snyed pa// thams cad skya 'is der ni sprul pa byas// 'go gcig 'go gnyis mgo gsum ldan pa nas// 'go stong bar du ldan
244b7(mdo): ba'i gnod sbyin dang // lag gcig laka gnyis lag gsum ldan pa nas// lag stong bar du ldan pa rab tu ma nga/ rkang cig rka pa gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa na sa/ kang stong bar du ldan pa gzhan yang mang // kha bzhin
244b8(mdo): sngo la lus ni ser ba dang / kha bzhin ser la lus ni sngo ba dang // kha bzhin dkar la lus ni gnag pa dang // Sha bzhin gnag la lus ni dkar ba dang / kha bzhin gzhan la lus kyang gzhan pa dang // de 'dra'i phyaH/ 
245a1(mdo): rnyan dag gi dpung yang lpags// stag dang sprul dang phag gi gdong can dang // glang po rta dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong // spre'u dang seng ge dred kyi gdong can dang // de 'dra'i kha gdong ldan pa'i dpupa rnams lhags/ 
245a2(mdo): ral pa brdzes la 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin mang // lus 'go rus pa 'bar 'bur lba ba can// lus ni myi'i khrag gis rab tu spags// gnod sbyin de 'dra ba dag der yang lhags// rkang pa dag ni dgo ba'i rkang pa 'dra/ 
245a3(mdo): myig gi 'bras bu spre'u'i myig dang mtshungs// mche ba dag ni glang po'i mche ba 'dra// kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags// lus kyi dbyibs ni chu srin 'dra ba ste/ phyag gi 'bras bu gnyis ni rab tu 'bar
245a4(mdo): rna ba dag ni ra'i rna ba 'dra/ kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang dalhags// kha gcig dag ni lag ma dbyig pa thogs// tho ba ma dang thung rtse gsum lag na thogs// kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na 'og/ 
245a5(mdo): 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can gnod sbyin lhags// ka shol/ thogs 'khor lo thogs shing myig bsgyur dang // ri ze chen po lag/ na thogs pa dang // rlung dang rdo dpag nam lcags rab 'bebs shing
245a6(mdo): gnod sbyin 'jigs su rung ba der yang lhags// rlung di rab tu gtong zhong char yang 'bebs// brgya skyong gi klog kyang rab tu 'byind// 'brug gi sgra yang sgrog cing ljon pa skyel// byang chub shing gi lo mnyam myi gsol
245a7(mdo): char ba rab tu 'bebs shing rlung yang gtong // chu bo 'bebs shing chu yis pa yang gapa// de ltar 'jigs su rung ba mtshan mo byung // de'i nub mo sems skyed zhing yang 'gyel// thams cad dbyibs kyi lkug cing gzugs
245a8(mdo): myi sdug/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs ldan de dag mthong nas kyang // yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa po// lhun po lta bur sems ni g.yol ba myed// sgyus 'dra zhing rmyi la ma mtshungs pa dang // sprin dpa'adra bar chos
245b1(mdo): rnams kun la rtog/ de ltar chos kyi tshul la rtog pas na// legs gnas bsam gtan byed cing chos la gnas// gang zhi bang dang nga'i snyam sems shing // dngos dang lus la yang dag mngon zhen pa// phyi
245b2(mdo): mkhas bya gnas des mthong nas ni// 'jigs par 'gyur zhing bdag kyang rab tu myos// shag kya'i sras pos chos rnams brten byung ba// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs// nam mkhal lta bu'i sems dang rab tu

245b4(mdo): bdud kyi g.yas rol du 'khod par gyur da to// gang dag bdud kyi/ phyogs byed pa de dag ni// bdud sdig can gyi g.yon rol du 'kho dad par 'gyur da to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis rang gyi bu de dag la
245b5(mdo): smras pa// yu bu cag ci 'dra ba'i dpung gis byang chub sems dang la gdul bar bya// de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu ded dang na zhes bya bas pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// klu'i dbang po

245b7(mdo): bya bas 'di skad ces smras so// bltas pa tsam gyis snying yang rab tu 'gas 'gyur la// 'jig rtend dag gi snying po ldan pa'i shing chen 'gas// bdag ni blta bas phog na 'gro ba 'chi 'pho ltar// 'tsho bar gyur
245b8(mdo): pa'i mthu ni de la ga la mchis// g.yas rol nas dbyangs snyan ces bya bas smras pa// bltas pa tsam gyis shing yang 'das na s+yai rnams la/ bdag pa sgrim ci dgos shes smras snying po ga la yod// gal te bltas
246a1(mdo): pas ri bo lhun po 'jig gyur kyang // de'i mdun du khyod ni myig dbye yod phyi nus/ gzhan yang myi gang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyis rgal 'dod cing // de'i chu ni rngubs te 'thung bar nus gyur gyi// de'i Sha bzhin/

246b1(mdo): zhu bar gyur da kyang srid// 'jig rtend don tu brtson mdzad pa// thugs dam nges par mdzad pa po// byang chub dam pa ma thob par// shi chen drung nas bzhengs kyi srid// g.yon ro lad nas lag rings kyis bskyod/

254b3(mdo): ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs// klu'i bu mo khro ba lta bur shi nad tu 'dags pa byed pa yin/ brgya byin 'thab bral rab dang dga' ldan bu dra kyi dbang du song // 'phags myin rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngam
254b4(mdo): ldan pa 'di la su zhig dgal// de dag gis smras pa// shing mchog 'di dag lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog rgyas gyur da la// shang / shang de'u dang ni khu byug sgra 'byin bu ba sgra 'byind ldan pa gzigs// 
254b5(mdo): sa la sa ma 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing snum la lcang lo can mchis pa// nags mchog kyi ci tshogs kyis bstend par na tshung rnams dang dges par mi rdza da// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// lo ar bcas pa'i shing rnaMs
254b6(mdo): 'di dag dus kyi dbang gyis me tog rgyas// bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skom pas nyen nas me tog rnams su lhags// gang zhig dus na sa la skyes pa rnams kyang nyi mas skams par 'gyur// pa 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams
254b7(mdo): kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par s+yad// bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis smras pa// zla 'dra'i zhal mnga' gzigs shig pad ma sar pa 'dra ba'i kha bzhin can/ stan cing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig ldan so ni dngul dang kha ba 'dra
255a1(mdo): 'di 'dra'i lha'i gnas na dkon na phyi'i gnas na ga la mchis// gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis rtag tu 'dod par 'gyi ba khyod kyis brnyes// byang chub sems dpa' smras pa// lus ni dran spyugs myi gtsang
255a2(mdo): srin bu'i rigs kyis gang bzhig shig po// myur tu shes shing 'jig pa bde ba ma yin rnams dang ldan par mthong // rgya bar bcas dang myi rgyu ba'i 'gro la bde ba mchog byed pa// go 'phab 'chi 'pho myed pas skye bo mkhas pas
255a3(mdo): mchod pa de thob bya// de dag 'dod pa'i spya rtsal drug bcu ra bzhi myong bar 'gyur ba ste// rkang rngub gser gyi bka ska 'khrol zhing gos kyang shag shig byas nas ni// 'dod pa'i pada' yis phog pa rgyags pa 'dzum zhing 'di skad
255a4(mdo): smras// jo bo khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bsten/ de myi bgyi// sred pa kun gyi nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas 'diHdad smras// 'dod pa ras kyi mdung thung rtse gsum spang pi can kyi spu kr-i
255a5(mdo): 'dra// sbrul gyi 'o dang me mur 'dra bar ngas 'dir rab tu reg pas na// bud myed yon tan 'phrog pas de phyir nga yis bud myed tshogs rnams spangs// bud myed yon tan rnam pa mang pos khrag khrag
255a6(mdo): bye ba de dag gis// gang gi tshe na glang po'i phru ku'i stabs can de brjod ma nus tshe// ngo tsha skyengs nas thug pa'i rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te// dga' zhing mgu ba bskyed nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas
255a7(mdo): pad ma dri ma myed pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lta bu'i zhal// mar gyis sbyin sregs bgyis pa'i 'od 'phro me 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba// sred pa brgya nas pyad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig/ bdag
255a8(mdo): nyid rgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba bsgral du gsol/ de dag rnams kyis dong ka'i shing dang tsam pa ka 'dra rnam mang stod// mchog tu gyu rad pa ri ltar myi g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni// song ste pha'i
255b1(mdo): rkang la 'go bos phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang smras// yab cig lha dang mya'i bla la de la 'od 'khro spangs na legs// bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur da nas pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i myig gis lta// de ni chags pas skye bo/ 
255b2(mdo): myi lta de la khro gnyer mchis ma lags// lhun po g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams la nyi zla ltung bar 'gyur yang gdal// srid pa gsum kye nyes mthong de ni bud myed rnams kyi dbang myi 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig can gyis
255b3(mdo): tshig de skad zos nas/ de bas kyang cher sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde ba yid ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la smras pa// kye myi shes shing glen te khyed kyis gzugs dang 'a rod ma mthong
255b4(mdo): ngam/ ci ltar gyur da na de byang chub kyi snying po las bslang bar ma nus// de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// snyan cing 'jam por smra yang chags pa ma
255b5(mdo): mchis te// gsang ba chen po lta yang sdang ba mchis pa lag// / spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang rmongs ma mchis// lus rnam thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pashi nad tu zab// bud myed nongs
255b6(mdo): pa rgya chen the tsom ma mchis rtogs// 'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags chags ma mchis// gang zhig de'i sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba// lha yul myi yul 'di na lha myi de ma mchis// 
255b7(mdo): de la bud myed sgyu rnams gang lags bstan na yab// chags bcas gang lags de'i snying zhu 'gyur rigs na// de dag mthong yang de'i sems ni gcig ma g.yos// ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni myi g.yo mchis
255b8(mdo): bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas bltam yon tan ka zi brjid rdzogs// bskal pa bye ba mang por tshul khrims brtul zhugs kyang // lha dang tshangs pa sems can gzi brjid nam dag dgel// de dag de'i rkang par mtho
256a1(mdo): gtugs phyag kyang 'tshal// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi// rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa thob gyur nges// yab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor 'thab pa myi 'tshal te/ 
256a2(mdo): stobs ldan dag dpa' thab par sbyor 'di tshegs rab che// yab cig mkhas la nor bu rin cen gtsug yud can// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpal khrag khrig gus par gnas// rin cen 'byung gnas yan lag
256a3(mdo): me tog 'phreng bas brgya nad// stobs bcu mnga' bas mchod phyir 'dir btang rnams la gzigs// ka padag sems pa mchis dang gang dag sems ma mchis// shi por lha dbang gnod sbyin mkhal lding dbang po
256a4(mdo): dag/ yon tan ri bo mngon par 'dud cing phyogs pa las/ bcig do mod slar log na ni legs pa 'dra// gzhan yang gang gi mthar gyi phyind der myi rgyal myi bgyi// gang zhig rtsa nas kyi byin de na
256a5(mdo): bko myi bkye// gapa la bzod pa yang gsol de ni bkrug myi brgya gang gis yid myi bde bar 'gyur ba de myi bgyi// dge slong dag de/ nas de'i tshe zhing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste dpal ldan dang / 
256a6(mdo): 'phe mo dang / dka' thub dang / dge ma dang / spa khas ma dang / mdangs stobs dang / bden smra dang / ldan pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dang la la yang dag par mchod nas/ dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis bya ba
256a7(mdo): chub sems dpal 'phel bar byed// mngon du bstod par byed de// sems can dag pa khyod ni dkur zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o// zla rnam par dag pa khyod ni gdugs dang po shar pa ltar lha de'o// sems can da
256a8(mdo): pa khyod ni chab kyi nang nas pad ma ltar rab tu rgyas pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni nags 'dab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar mdzes pa'o// 
256b1(mdo): sems can dag pa khyod ni 'khor yug gi ri ltar mngon par 'phags pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho ltar rim po ches bltam zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o// 'jig rtend kyi mgon po khyod ni nam mkha' ltar
256b2(mdo): zug pa mu mchis shing thugs kyi rgya che ba'o// sems can rnam par dag pa khyod ni dog sa ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur da cing thugs shi nad tu brtan pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni mtsho ma 'dres pa ltar
256b3(mdo): rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa myi mnga' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni rlung dmar ltar 'jig rten dkyi khams thams cad la rtag tu myi chags shing // thugs gnas su mchis pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni
256b4(mdo): gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sos can thas cad spangs shing brtse/ ngan par dka' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni sred byed kyi bu ltar thuHpar dka' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi 'gon po
256b5(mdo): khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las myi bzhengs pas dam bcas pa brta pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po'i lag gis 'phangs pa 'i rdo rje ltar slar myi ldog pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni ring por
256b6(mdo): myi thogs par stobs bcu dang ldan par byon pas/ brnyes pa legs par brnyes pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi shing ki lha mo rnams kyis dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpal 'phel bar byed do// 
256b7(mdo): dge slong dag de nas gnas kacangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud nyams dmas par byed de/ rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung zhin po ltam sems khongs su chud ci
256b8(mdo): dmam pa'o// sdig cad khyod ni tha po rgan po 'das du byed ba gar nyams spang ba'o// rig can khyod ni dpa' bar lam ches pa pa sa yang gcig sum byung pa'o// rig cad khyod ni nad kyis nyan pa 'brog du bor ba / 
257a1(mdo): gnyis su myed pa'o// sdig can khyod ni kla bu khal gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs byed pa'o// sdig can khyod ni shing rlung gis btab pa ltar skyel ba'o// sdig can khyod ni 'dron po lam stong pa/ 
257a2(mdo): ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o// sdig can khyod ni myi dbul po bu lon can ltar dman pa bas kyang dman pa'o// sdig can khyod ni bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar dmu' cor smra ba'o// sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa/ 
257a3(mdo): myi bzo ba ltar nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'o// sdig can khyod ni seng ge'i sgras wa bros pa ltar deng bros par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni rnam par 'thor rlung gis gtord pa'i bya bzhin du deng 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o/ 
257a4(mdo): sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams zad pa ltar duso mya shes pa'o// sdig can khyod ni snod chag pa rdul gyis gang ba ltar deng rnam par spang bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sbrul la bab pa ltar
257a5(mdo): de patshar gcod par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni myi rka lag pa/ cad pa ltar stobs thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'o// dge slo// padag de ltar gnas cad ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa
257a6(mdo): bcu drug gis bdud sdig can nyams smad du byas so// dge slong dag de la byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug ni bdud sdig can zlog par byed// bcu drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
257a7(mdo): sdig can khyod ni dpal bos pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar byang chub sems dpas do mod pham par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni kyad stobs mu phul gyad stobs chen po bab pa ltar// do mod byang chub sems dpas cha pa gcod
257a8(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni srin bu me khyer la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar// do yod byang chub sems dpas zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni phub ma spar gang la rlung dmar bab pa lta
257b1(mdo): do yod byang chub sems dpapa gdor bar 'gyur ro// sdig can rjod na las se dge bapa bltar/ da yod byang chub sems dpas mdus par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig cas khyod ni ni tham sa chen po thams can
257b2(mdo): paltar de mod byang chub sems dpas 'askyel par 'gyur ro// rig can khyod na gyimadzaba'i grod byengs rgyas po chen po bab pa ltar doyod kyang chub se yo la 'dra pa gyu gi// cas khyod ni
257b3(mdo): la nyi tshan chen po bab pa ltar/ do yod byang chub sems dpas yongasu zad par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni myig yod can gsad par byas pa nor ba ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas zos par byed pa
257b4(mdo): 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni me yi tsha bas bung ba'i khyu ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas 'go 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar do mod
257b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro// sde can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma zegs pa ltar do mod byang chub mas dpas khongs su chud par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni 'brog
257b6(mdo): par las rgyags chad pa ltar// ro sod byang chub sems dpas phongs par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sme sngags 'don tu bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can
257b7(mdo): khyod ni sreg pa'i skald pas cha dang nags tshal ltar byang chub sems dpas rnyings par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtse mo la rdo rje bab pa ltar byang chub sems dpas bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'o/ 
257b8(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bsnyen bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed kyang bdud sdig can phyir ma log go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// lha'i tshogs kyis
258a1(mdo): yang dag bskul ba zos kyang bdud ni phyir log ma gyur da te/ slong zhing rgyob cig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig/ 'di ni rang nyid rgal nas nga'i yul nas gzhan yang sgrol bar/ 
258a2(mdo): byed par 'gyur/ langs te bros pa ma gtogs dge slong 'di la thar gzhan cung zad myed ces smra// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ra'i rgyal po lhun po gnas nas g.yo'i srid 'gro ba thams cad myed 'gyur srid
258a3(mdo): skar ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zla ba bcas par mkha' las sa la ltung yang srid// sems can kun kyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po skams srid kyi// nga 'dra shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug pa la
258a4(mdo): ni g.yo ba yod myi srid// bdud kyis smras pa// kho bo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rtend 'di kun dbang // lha dang lha myin tshogs pacas myi dang dud 'gro rnams// kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bol
258a5(mdo): dbang du 'gyur// kho bo'i yul na 'dug pa longs la tshig ban/ na gyis// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// gal te 'dod de/ khang khyod yin gsal bar khyod dbang sbyin// yang dag pa ltos pa
258a6(mdo): yang chos kyi dbang phyug yin// gal te ngan 'gror gyi 'gro khyod ni 'dod dbang phyug// dbang byed khyod ni lha bzhin byang chub ras thob 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa// dge sbyong bdag nyid gcig pu dgon par ci zhig byed// 
258a7(mdo): khyod kyis gang bcal de dag phrad par snga ma yin// rab 'gro shes ldan lus sogs dka' thub rab bslabs kyang // ko 'phang mchog/ de ma thob bya 'gyur khyod kyi smras// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// khro ba'i zil
258a8(mdo): non blo dang lha yul 'dod pa dang // bdag la rtag dang myi rtag snyam du gnas pa dang // yul du 'gro bas gnas pa tha rad snyam gnas pa'i// drang srong myi shes sngon du 'gro bas dka' thub spyad// de dag yang dag don
258b1(mdo): dang bral zhing skyes bu smra// khyab dang phyogs gcig ces dang kha cig tag ces smra// lus can yus byin yon tan byin dang yon ted cad// byed pa pod dang byed pa sbyin zhes ka'ad na 'dzengs// sran 'di 'dun / 
258b2(mdo): nga rgyal bcom pa sde dpung bcas// khyod pham byas te byang chub rdul byed deng thob nas// 'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byung dang mya ngan 'das// sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po bstand par bya// bdud ni 'jo/ 
258b3(mdo): shib 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun cu chub pa'i tshig tu spras pa// dge sbyong 'di zung shig/ gcig pu dkon par bor bar gyur pa 'di ni nga'i mdun nas zung la sngo ste myur du dbang du gyis// nga'i khyim du myu
258b4(mdo): song la shing sprog dang ni lcags sgrog phrugs su chug ste spo ba byed/ chug/ sdug bsngal nyen nas khu mo rnam pa mang po 'don cing lha'i/ 'khor lo yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byos// byang chub sas/ 
258b5(mdo): dpas smras pa// nam mkha' la ni ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs chanaris ris phye ste so sor bri bar nus kyang srid// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can drung ni myaM yis rab tu bsgrums te zha
258b6(mdo): bas bcing du nus kyang srid// nyis zla ba mun pa rab rib khyed byed ma'al las la la ltung bar byed pa nus srid kyi// khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang po bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas ni nga bskyod nus kyi 'gyur// 
258b7(mdo): bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa langs te lha zhes zer// dung dbang dang rdzang mchog gi sgra 'byin langs// bdud dpung shi nad tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas nA~M// kyi hud bu sdug khyod cis ma rung gyur da ces zer// 
258b8(mdo): 'jas rlung gsar dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra ba ma sem// shind tu lha gyis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os// khyod deng gsung ngo chen po rab tu brlag 'gyur te// dbang po lnga phyin lta bur bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur// tshangs pa'o/ 
259a1(mdo): dbyangs dang ka la bying ka'i sgra skad kyis// bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshogs de la spras// kyi mkhas gang zhig nam mkhal smag par byed 'dod pa// de ni shing mchog drung nas pa 'a
259a2(mdo): kloslong bam 'dod// gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul bgrang dang // gang zhig pa sku yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byind dang // skad gcig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi 'thor ba// des kyang shing drung 'dug pa la ni'o// 
259a3(mdo): kyi nus// bdud 'khros sems kyis gnya' shing gang gi bar tsam 'dug/ shubs nas byung ba'i ral gyi non po laka na thogs// dge sbyong myur longs nga'i bsam pa bzhin du song // 'od ma'i myu gu sngo ltar ngo yod
259a4(mdo): bcad da re// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// gal te stongagasums rnams 'di dag thams cad bdud kyis rab tu kang gyur da la kun kyi lag no ri bo lhun po mchog 'dra ba'i ral kyi thogs gyur da khyad
259a5(mdo): de dag nga'i ba spu bskyod par myi nus pa la gnod byed smos mye na/ sa// sun 'byin ma rengs shig dang de'u re brtags te nga yis tha rtan por dran par bya// rnga mo ban glang chen po 'go dang 'jigs
259a6(mdo): skyeg dang // myur gdug sprul myeg gdug mye bzad 'dra ba dag/ se 'brar kha dog ye mor bcas pa'i r-i 'phen cing // rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen// sprin ltar langs te phyogs bzhi
259a7(mdo): dag tu sgra sgrogs cing / rdo rje'i lce dang lcags kyi thu lum char pa 'bebs// ral gri mdung thung rno dang dgra sta dug can 'bebs// sa ni brtol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms// kha cig lag pa brgya dag gis ni
259a8(mdo): mda' brgya 'phen// kha nas myur du gdug pa'i sbrul dang me yang 'thor// chu skyes chu srin la btogs pa dag mtsho nas len// kha cig nam mkhal lding du bsgyur nas klu yang 'phen// kha cig bros nas/ lcags kyi thu lum
259b1(mdo): pa'abar ladag po mar sa pa rnams kyang 'dzin// sal lhags rnas pa'i bab tu 'khrugs par byed// 'o ka m+bu'i phung po'i dus rnam par 'am// 'jig de'i dun da de bzhin rtsa su
259b2(mdo): kye ma bu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du mchod/ rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing 'go 'bar la// klog ltar rab tu 'bar ba myig nas mngon par 'byend// bdud kyi dpung ni bsgyur da pa myi sdug byas mthong / 
259b3(mdo): nas// sems can dag pa skyes byas pa ci bzhin tog/ 'di la bdud byed stob sa byed 'gro myed bdag kyang byed// chu tha'i tshul 'dra ba'i 'jig rten gsum po 'khor// myig dang skyes pa bud byed byed cib bdag zhen
259b4(mdo): rna dang sna dang de bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus// chos 'di byed pa'o/ dung tshor ba po dang bral// brten nas skye ste nangapa yang stong zhing phyi yang stong // bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shind tu stong zhe na// 'dus
259b5(mdo): 'thun gnod sbyin des pa gang yin de dag gis// lag pa'am/ tshon cha me tog 'phreng bar mthong 'gyur ces// rtag tu bden smra/ sa de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te// de yis lag 'thil g.yon
259b6(mdo): ba dra ba mchog spras pa// sen mo zangs mdog rab mdzes chebs stong 'khor lo can// 'dzam gleng gser 'bar 'dra ba bsod nams dges bste nad pas// tshul du shes par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du byugs
259b7(mdo): mkha' las klog 'dra bar ni lag pa brkyang byas nas// tshig tu smras pa sa 'di nga'i dbang yin te// ras ni sngon chad mchog sbyin khrag khrig sna tshogs byas// slob la myi sbyin snyam ste don myed gzhar ma byas// 
259b8(mdo): chu dang mye dang rlung ni nga'i dbang yin te// tshangs pa skye dgu bdag dang skar bcas nyi zla dang // gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // bdag khrims rtul shugs byang chub yan lag 'phags pa
260a1(mdo): dab pa// sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa nga'i dbang // brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan de bzhin shes rab dang // chad myed bzhi dang de bzhin mngon zhes pa'i dbang // rim kyis byang chub khyod/ 
260a2(mdo): pa thams cad nga'i dbang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can mtha' dag ji snyed pa// de dag rnams kyi bsod nams tshul khrims ye shes dang // gtan pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa bsdoms kyang ni// de dag
260a3(mdo): ba spu brgya'i char mye phod// de yis tshul du shis par lag pa sa la brdabs// Shar ba'i snod ltar sa 'di sgra yang byung bar 'gyur// bdud kyi sgra zos nas ni sa la skyel 'gyur te// nag po'i pha lag rgyob shig zung shi/ 
260a4(mdo): sgra yang thos// lus la rtul byung gzi' brjid nyams shing ba bzhin mdog 'gyur// rga bas bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur da// brang rngu po 'don cing 'jig rten 'gon yang myed// / 
260a5(mdo): bdud kyi yid 'khrul gyur da cing sems ni byos paru gyurd// glang po rta dang bzhon po shing rta sa la ltung // srin po grul bum// dag dang sha za sngangs shing rgyug/ mgo rmongs lam myi rnyed cing kan
260a6(mdo): byed skabs kyang byed// rlung btab nags mes bya ltar bltas nas song bar gyur da// pha ma bu dang sring mo de bzhin phu mu dag/ kang na mthong zhing gang du dong zhes dri bar byed// de'i rkyend kyis de dag phan tshun 'thar
260a7(mdo): cing yod// bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur da te 'tsho ba'i skabs kyang byed// bdud dpung rgya me par bgyi 'khrugs rnyed pa de// thams cad rnam par 'thor cing za dgur gyes gyurd te// myurang tu langs la phya ba shal
260a8(mdo): ma byang can ga tu yang// tha ma la chag pa mnyan pas da sar gyur dpa/ nag bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma gyur // mthong nas smras pa gal te gson na dga' zhes mjed// shing gi lha mo po de ched
260b1(mdo): snying rje byis// chu'i bum pa thogs te nag po'i nga lag gtor// myur tu longs la phyi bshol ma byed kye nad tu song // tha ma'i tshig ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa// bdag gi thun
260b2(mdo): snyan cig phan pa ma mnyan te// sems can shi nad tu dag la nyes pa byas pas na// sdug bsngal 'jigs 'phongs mya ngan brlag dang brnyas pa dang // cir myi rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid bdag gis thos// lha mos smras
260b3(mdo): pa mya mkhas gang zhig nyes pa myed la nyes byed pa// de ni nyes dang sdug bsngal ba dang phongs pa dang // cir myi rung ba'i bya ba'i sgra dpa man nyid dang // gsad dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma rnyed par 'gyur// lha dang
260b4(mdo): lha myin mkha' lding myi ci srin po'i dbang // tshangs pa brgya bya/ na gzhan 'phrul 'og myin bcas pa dag/ 'di ltar khyod kyis 'a de 'dra'i bdud kyi dpung bcom pas// 'jig rten dpal ba rgyal
260b5(mdo): zhes de'i rgyal ba brjod// rgyan 'phreng chu bo zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan 'bul// me tog a ka ru dang rgya spos can danabye char 'bebs// sil snyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed cing
260b6(mdo): tshig brjod pa// dab po dgra tshogs rgyal rnams khyod la dkab pa mdzad par 'gyur// stan mchog 'dir ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs// rgya chen phan mdzad dpa' bo do mod byang chub brnyes// stobs
260b7(mdo): bcu ma 'dres so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas yul rnams thams cad do mod brnyes par 'gyur// bdud 'dul ched du 'dir ni g.yul ngor rab tu zhugs// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs
260b8(mdo): thas sus mthong ba// bye ba sum bcu drug dang khrag khrig nyi shu bzhi// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis smon// / bdud 'atul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// 
261a1(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpal bdud byir rgol pa bcom pa dgra btul ba g.yul ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba/ gzugs dang rgyal ma tshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas 'dod pa rnams
261a2(mdo): dben pa ldog pa kyi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa tog pa dang bcas pa// dpyod pa dang bcas pa// dben pa las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang / bad ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas ste// gnas so// 
261a3(mdo): de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing dang yongasu dang ste// sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyu rad pas/ rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
261a4(mdo): rdzogs par byas ste gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te bdel ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang
261a5(mdo): de dran pa dang ldan pa bdel ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms/ pa'o zhes brjod pa ste// dkal ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsu ma pa rdzogs par byas sto gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs te/ 
261a6(mdo): snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yong su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs
261a7(mdo): bar byas ste gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de ltar bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yong su dag pa/ yongasu byang ba 'od gsal ba nyon mongs pa myed pa// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral la/ mnyen
261a8(mdo): pa las su rung bar gnas pa/ myi g.yo bar gyur pas/ nam gyi cha stod la lha'i myig las ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par grub cing mngon par gtod to// de nas byang chub ses
261b1(mdo): dpa' lha'i myig yongs su dag pa myi'i las shi nad tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa rnams mthong ngo // las ci lta ba bzhin/ 
261b2(mdo): du 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la bskur ba 'debs pa
261b3(mdo): log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag go// 
261b4(mdo): sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par pyad pa dang / na pa// ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rna sa la bskur ba myi bdebs pa// yang dag par lta ba dag
261b5(mdo): ste/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs/ pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas/ bde'i 'gro ris kyi 'jig rtend du/ lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag ces bya bar rab tu shes so// de lta/ 
261b6(mdo): lha'i phyig rnam par dag pa phyi'i las shi nad tu 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang bde 'gror song ba dang / ngan 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang ba
261b7(mdo): po dag dpalas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nas kyi cha stod la rig pa mngon gsum du byed do// mun pa sel to// snang ba skyed do// de nas byang chub so// 
261b8(mdo): dpal de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa yong su khyang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa myed pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen par las su rung bar gnas pa/ 
262a1(mdo): g.yo bar gyur da pas/ nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi ka nas rje su dran pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub shipa// mngon par gtor to// de bdag dang sas can/ 
262a2(mdo): gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas du ma rjes su dran te/ 'di lta ste skye ba gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang / bcu dang nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / skye ba lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya dang / skye ba
262a3(mdo): stong dang / skye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba dang / skye ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / skye ba bye ba phrag stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba
262a4(mdo): brgya phrag du ma dang / skye dbye ba stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nas/ 'jig pa'i skal pa dang / chagapo'i skald pa dang / 'jig pa dang chags pa'i skal pa du ma dag kyang
262a5(mdo): rjes su dran no bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur da te/ skye/ don 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya'o// rigs na/ 'di zhes bya'o// 'dog ni 'di lta ste/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig
262a6(mdo): za'o// tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo// yun ni 'di srid gcig gnas gnas so// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo // bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos
262a7(mdo): nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig du skyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi ka nas rnam pa du rje su dran no// de nas
262a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yong su dag pa/ yong su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba nyon mongs pa myed pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa las su rung bar gnas pa
262b1(mdo): myi g.yo'i bar gyur pas nam gyi cha smad skye reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnga rdung ba'i namachod tsam na sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba nub par bya ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa des 'di snyam du bsas/ 
262b2(mdo): te sred pa yod pas lend pa 'byung ste/ lend pa'i rkyen da ni sred pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas sred pa byung / sred pa'i rkyen ni ka yin snyam
262b3(mdo): nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ tshor bar yod pas sred pa byung ste/ sred pa'i rkyen ni tshor ba yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas tshor ba byung / 
262b4(mdo): tshor ba'i rkyen de ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du ba/ sems te/ reg pa yod pas tshor ba byung ste/ tshor ba'i rkyen ni reg pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di
262b5(mdo): snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas reg pa byung / reg pa'i rkyen do ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du sems te/ skye mched drug yod pas reg pa byung ste/ reg pa'i rkyen kyi skye mched
262b6(mdo): drug yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye mched drug byung / skye mched drug gi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ byeng dang
262b7(mdo): gzugs yod pas skye mched drug byung ste/ skye mched kyi rkyen gyi phying dang gzugs yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ga pa yod pas mying dang gzugs byung / mying dang gzun
262b8(mdo): kye rkyen ni ka nga yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du phasapas te/ rnam par shes pa yod pas mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'jig rten
263a1(mdo): 'di ni 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang rga ba dang / 'chi ba dpa' chi 'pho dang / skye bar sdug bsngal bar gyurd pa yin no// 'on kyang rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba las sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen
263a2(mdo): po 'ab zhig 'di las byung bar bya ba myi shes te/ me'o dga' ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ab zhig 'di thams cad zad par bya ba shes na/ ci ma rung snyam nas de nas
263a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rga ba dang 'chi ba byung / rga ba dpa' che ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ skye ba yod pas rga shi byung ste/ rga shi'i
263a4(mdo): rkyen ni skye ba yin no snyam mo/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ kar yod pa skye ba byung / skye bo'i rkyend ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du sems te/ sred pa
263a5(mdo): yod pas skye ba byung ste/ skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du sems te/ gang / yod pas sred pa byung / sred pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des
263a6(mdo): 'di snyam sems te/ le nad pa yod pas srid pa byung ste/ srid pa'i rkyen da ni len pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas len pa byung / len pa'i
263a7(mdo): rkyen ni kang yin snyam nas/ mying dang gzugapa byung ste/ mying dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du sems te/ kang yod pas rnam pa
263a8(mdo): nam pa byung / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snya ma du sems te/ 'du byed yod pas rnam par shes pa byung ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni 'du byed yin no snyam so// de na/ 
263b1(mdo): yang byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas 'du byed byung / 'du byed kyi rkyend ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ma rig pa yod pas 'du byed byung ste/ 'du byed
263b2(mdo): kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa yin no snyam mo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ mo reg pa'i rkyend kyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyend kyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyend kyis
263b3(mdo): myang dang gzugs/ mying dang gzugs kyi rkyend kyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyend kyis reg pa/ kye nad kyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyend kyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkye nad kyis le nad pa/ len pa'i rkye nad
263b4(mdo): kyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyend kyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyend kyis/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / sme sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
263b5(mdo): te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ab zhig 'di byang bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnam sa kun 'byung kun 'byung zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du
263b6(mdo): byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ myig skyes/ rig pa skyes/ mang po shes pa skyes/ yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so// snang ba 'byung ngo // de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di
263b7(mdo): sems te// byed pas rga ni myed par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas gzho 'gags smras nas/ des 'di sum du sems te/ skye ba byed na myed par 'gyur te/ skye ba 'gags pas// zhi 'gag go snyam yo// deni
263b8(mdo): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ kang byed pas skye ba myed par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas skye ba 'gag sum nas des 'di snyam du sems te/ srid pa myed na skye ba myed par 'gyur te/ srid pa la/ 
264a1(mdo): pas skye ba 'gog snyam so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du sems te/ gang byed pa zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/ 'du byed byed par 'gyur/ kang 'gags pas 'du byed
264a2(mdo): 'gags snyam pa'i bar du'o// des 'di snyam du sems te/ ma rig pa myed pas 'du byed byed par 'gyur te/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gags so// 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go
264a3(mdo): zhes bya ba nas/ skye ba 'gags pas kau shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dnga'akhrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ang
264a4(mdo): shig 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i bar du'o// dge slong dag de ltar sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed kyi dra mang du byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ myig skyes
264a5(mdo): rig pa skyes/ mang po shes pa skyes/ yid gzhungs pa skyesashes rab skyes so// snang ba byung ngo // dge slong dag ngas de'i tshe/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes / 
264a6(mdo): 'di ni zag pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni bkra pa 'gog pa'o/ 'di ni zag pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes so/ 'di ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i ban
264a7(mdo): pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni lha'i bag pa'o// 'di ni zag pa ma lus pam 'gog go// 'di zag pa ma lus par gyi snang bar 'gyur zhing nub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ma rig pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i
264a8(mdo): kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i 'gog pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i 'gog pa'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni ma rig pa ma byas par myi snang bar 'gyur te/ nub par 'gyur ro// 
264b1(mdo): zhes bya bar de bzhin du sbyar ro// 'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so 'di ni 'du byed kyi kun 'byung po'// 'od ni 'du byed 'gog pa'o// 'di ni 'du byed 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji sra pa bzhin du rab tu/ 
264b2(mdo): shes so// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// rnam par shes pa'i 'gog pa'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
264b3(mdo): shes so// 'di ni mying dang gzugs so// 'di ni mying dang gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni mying dang gzugs 'gog pa'o// 'di ni mying dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
264b4(mdo): shes so// 'di ni skye mched drug go// 'di ni skye mched drug gi ku den 'byung ba'o// 'di ni skye mched drug 'gog pa'o// 'di ni skye ma/ ched drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba
264b5(mdo): bzhin shes so// 'di ni reg pa'o 'di ni reg pa'i kun 'byung / 'di ni reg pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni reg pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni tshor ba'o/ 
264b6(mdo): 'di ni tshor ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni tshor ba 'gog pa'o// 'di ni tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ 'di ni sred pa'o// 'di ni sred pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sred pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sred pa 'gog
264b7(mdo): par 'gro ba'i lam so// 'di ni le nad pa'o// 'di ni la dad pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni le dad pa'i 'gog pa'o// 'di ni le nad pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ 'di ni srid pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i kun 'byung ngo // 
264b8(mdo): 'di ni srid pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni srid pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni skye ba'o// 'di ni skye ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni skye ba'i 'gog pa'o// 'di ni skye ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di na nam/ 
265a1(mdo): 'di ni rga ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni dkal ba'i 'gog pa'o// 'di ni zhal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ 'di ni 'chi ba'o// 'di ni 'chi ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni 'chi ba'i 'gog pa'o// 'di ni 'aH/ 
265a2(mdo): ba'i 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di dag ni mya ngan dang smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams te/ de ltar sdug bsngal
265a3(mdo): gyi phung po chen po 'ab shig/ 'odi 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas 'gog par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug
265a4(mdo): bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i/ lam mo// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha smad kyang skya reng 'char
265a5(mdo): ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnga rdung ba'i na mchod tsam na/ skyes bu dang skyes bu dam pa dang / skyes bu mchog dang / skyes bu chen po dang / skyes / khyu mchog dang / skyes bu glang po dang / skyes bu seng ge dang
265a6(mdo): skyes bu skyes mchog dang / skyes bu dpal bo dang / skyes bu thul bod pa dang / skyes bu cang shes pa dang / skyes bu pad ma dang / skyes bu pad ma kar po dang / skyes bu lded khyer ba dang / skyes bu la lo sgyu ba bla na
265a7(mdo): byed pas 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / blta bar bya ba dang / mngon tu bya ba dang / ji yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sems kyis skad cig ga
265a8(mdo): dang ldan pa'i zhes rab kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas reg pa gsum thob bo/ dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag ba
265b1(mdo): ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis khyed rnams kyis me tog gtor cig ces byas so// de na lha'i bu gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba de dag 'dus nas/ de dag gis de dag la smras pa/ klogs
265b2(mdo): po dag sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brda' mdzad cing / bdal mngon par sprul pa mdzad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brdam mdzad kyi bar du me tog ma gtor cig/ dge slong dag de na
265b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de dag yid gnyis su gyurd pa mkhyend nas/ ki ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ der zhugs nas las kyi rgyud ni chad do// rdus ni nye ba bzhi'o// zag pa ni
265b4(mdo): skams te yang myi zag go/ lam ni chad de yang myi 'jug go/ 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zhes bya'o// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjo dzad do// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lho'i
265b5(mdo): me tog gis gtor to// de nas lha'i me tog pus mo nub tsam/ du bkram par gyurd to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mngon parardzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mun pa mud nag dang ni bral sred
265b6(mdo): pa ni rnam par sbyangs/ lta ba ni bzlog nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par 'khrugs/ zug rngu ni phyung ma dad po ni bkrol/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ni bsnyal// chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni smeng/ bag la nyal ba
265b7(mdo): rnams ni bton dang / chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni mkhyen da/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni thugs su chud/ chos kyi dbyings ni yongasasu mkhyen de/ sems can gyi khams ni rnam par bkod/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa
265b8(mdo): phung po ni sngags/ log pa nyid nges pa'i phung po ni smad/ nges pa'i phung po ni yongs su bzung / sems can gyi dbang po rnams la ni rnam par gzigs/ sems can gyi spyod pa ni yongs su mkhyen
266a1(mdo): sems can gyi nad gso ba ni thugs su chud/ bdud ci'i sman sbyard pa ni grub/ sman pa'i rgyal por ni byung sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu tha rad par mdzad pa por ni gyur da/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ 
266a2(mdo): bde ba'i 'jog pa por ni gyur da/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i khri chen po la ni bzhugs rnam par grol ba'i thabs ni brnyes/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong khyer
266a3(mdo): du ni zhugs/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang dag par ni 'dres/ chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa las dbyer byed par gyurd to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir thog pa myed pa'i skye ba dang
266a4(mdo): rga ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes 'dun pa dang po// la byang chub kyi snying po de nyid na zhugs so// dge slong dag byang chupa sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ma thag tu de nas
266a5(mdo): skad cig de nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tham cad kyi sems can thams cad skad cig de dang thang cig de dang / yud tsam de la mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur da to// 'jig rten
266a6(mdo): kye khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos spang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten dkye bar sdig pas khyab pa mun nag ces bya ba snga la bzhin no// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad nam pa dru/ du gsum
266a7(mdo): rab tu g.yos// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'gul rab tu 'grus kus tu rab tu 'gul lo// lazugs rab tu 'khrugs// kun tu rab tu lazhugs so// 
266a8(mdo): ches rab tu chem/ kun tu rab tu chem po// 'ama'u ma rab tu 'us/ kun tu rab tu 'ung ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la leg pa po zhes bya ba byis/ 
266b1(mdo): chos kyi dka' ba dag kyang bskung ngo // chos kyi dgal ba de dgas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams 'di ni rin po che'i gdugs gcig cig gis khebs par gyur da te// rin po che'i gdugs / 
266b2(mdo): las kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba byung ste/ de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dgyi khams grangs myed dpag tu byed pa dag snang bar byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha'i
266b3(mdo): bu rnams kyang kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyurd te/ sos can mkhas pa'i pad mo'i ye shes kyi mtsho las 'byung ba// 'jig rtend kyi chos rnams kyis ma gos pa byung ngo // thugs rje chen po'i sprin yang dag par
266b4(mdo): 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas khyab par mdzad nas/ 'dul ba'i skye bo'i sman bye chos kyi char/ dge bo'i nga po'i sa bon thams cad kyi myu gu skyed pa/ dad pa'i myu gru rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed
266b5(mdo): pa/ rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnam par 'byind par byed pa/ 'i char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes mdzer to// de la 'di skad ce// sa bya ste/ skyes bu seng ge de yis dbu bcas bdud btud de
266b6(mdo): ston pas bsam gtan bde ba mngon du mdzad nas ni/ gang tshe stobs bcus reg pa gsum po brnyes gyur da tshe// phyogs bcu'i sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing mang bye ba g.yos par gyur da// chos 'dod
266b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag g.yos lhags pa// / zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma bsnyel tam// bdag cag mngon gsum ci 'dra shi nad tu 'jigs dpung de/ shes rab bsod nams stob
266b8(mdo): dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom// khrag khrig zhing nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gdugs rnams bskur// des pa skyes bu chen pos bdud kyi sde rnams btul// khyed kyis gnas mchog 'chi myed bya
267a1(mdo): ngan myed pa brnyes// srid pa gsum du dam chos cha pa myurd tu ba'o// phyogs bcu'i sems can snying po rnams kyang phyag brkyang ste/ ka la bying ka'i sgra yis gsung du brjod pa ni// bdun/ 
267a2(mdo): cag ji ltar byang chub thob ltar khyod sangs rgyas// dper na mar dpa mar gyi snying khum tshungs 'dra zhing // dge slong dag de nas 'dod pa na gyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la
267a3(mdo): bzhugs pa mngon par shes pa brnyes pa dang / brnag pa yong su rdzogs pa dang / g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba
267a4(mdo): dang / dpa' ba dang / rgyal ba 'phags pa dang / skyes bu da pa/ skyes bu chen po dang / sman po'i mchog dang / zug rngul byend pa chen po dang / seng ge ltar myi snyedas shang spu ze ba zhes
267a5(mdo): byed po mye mnga' ba dang / glang po ltar thugs shi nad tu dul ba dang / dri ma gsum spangs pas dri ma myi mnga' ba dang / reg pa kA sum brnyes pas mkhyen pa po dang / chu bo bzhi las rgal bas
267a6(mdo): pha rold tu byond pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzind pas rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang / sdig pa'i chos spangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas/ 
267a7(mdo): dge slong du gyur pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas/ dge sbyong du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal bas gtsang sbra can du gyur pa dang / rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal bas
267a8(mdo): dpa' ba dang / stobs bcu mnga' bas shi nad tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung ga nas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rig nas byang chub kyi snying po'i logs su phyogs te/ 
267b1(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'di ni shing kau rgyal drung du// bdud sde mngon du pham mdzad nas// r-i rab lta bur mye g.yo bzhugs// snyems pa myi mngal 'bros myi mdzad/ 'das
267b2(mdo): ni skal ba bye ba mang du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis/ byang chub sems yang dag bsgrubs// des na 'di ni do mod mdzes// byang chub dam pa tshol ba na// 'di yis skal pa bye mang du// tshul khrims
267b3(mdo): rtul zhugs dka' thub kyis// brgya byin tshangs pa zil du brlag/ 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// bzod pa'i stobs kyis go mnams te/ sdug bsngal rnams ni dang du brangs/ des na gser mdo/
